original: Sector 2 Artillery Note
translation: 2区炮兵通知

original:
From Enclave High Command
Artillery Order #553
Sector 2

The Brotherhood of Steel have cleared the outer perimeter of the base.  Clearance has been given to use artillery strikes on Sector 2 if, and only if, all other resources have been exhausted and targets are clearly visible.  Exercise extreme caution.
translation:
自 英克雷最高指挥部
炮兵命令 #553
第2战区

钢铁兄弟会已经消灭了基地的外围。对第2战区使用炮击的清除令已被下达。假如，只是假如，在所有其他可用物资耗尽且各目标均清晰可见时发动。务必慎重。

original: Deathclaw Officer's Report
translation: 死亡爪官员的报告

original: Our detachment established basecamp outside Olney. The township's been given a wide berth, and we deployed our detainment units behind a slope to avoid being caught upwind of the deathclaw population.  We're not sure if these things use pheromones or any other kind of communication, but I'm not taking a chance.
translation: 我们的分队在奥尔尼外建立了大本营。与镇区保持了距离，我们把拘留单位部署在斜坡后面，以免在死亡爪群的上风处被发现。我们不确定这些东西是用信息素，或是其他方式交流，但我不想冒险。

original: Deathclaw Outpost Orders
translation: 关于死亡爪的前哨指令

original:
RRD-HA23-P 
WELCOME:  

1.  Establish a perimiter around township of Olney.

2.  Verify reports of DEATHCLAW population in township and debrief superiors on your findings.

3.  Acquire DEATHCLAW specimens as opportunity allows, minimizing casualties to local DEATHCLAW population and Enclave personnel.
translation:
RRD-HA23-P
欢迎：

1.  在小镇奥尔尼附近建立一个大本营。

2.  核实关于小镇中死亡之爪群落的报告然后在你的调查报告中询问长官任务。

3.  在情况允许的情况下抓获一只死亡之爪作为标本，尽量减少当地死亡之爪和人员伤亡。

original: Holy Water Pamphlet
translation: 圣水宣传单

original:
Good people of Megaton, your salvation is at hand!

We are the Apostles of Eternal Light. To heal this wounded city, we are willing to provide any and all supplicants with cleansing holy water. 

Come to our monastery in Springvale, and Brother Gerard will minister to your every need.

We will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the Water of Light.
translation:
兆吨镇善良的人们, 你们的救赎即将到来!

我们是永恒之光的使徒。为了治愈这座受伤的城市，我们愿意为所有祈求者提供洁净的圣水 。

来我们春之谷的修道院吧，杰勒德修士会满足你的一切需求。

我们将赐予渴求光明之水的人。

original: Alpha Cell Entry 01
translation: 阿尔法电池条目 01

original:
Project Code: AC-PPE-47
Report: GATS2

Project Entry 01: Deconstruction

Upon first look after dismantling of the Alpha cell, we noticed a structure similar to one of our standard voltaic cells.    After further investigation we noticed that the fluid being used as the electrolyte is of indeterminate origin and have sent samples off to our sister lab under Task: AC-PPE-47-N.
translation:
项目代码：AC-PPE-47
报告：GATS2

项目目录 01：解构

拆解阿尔法电池后，我们发现它的结构与我们的一个标准伏打电池相似。经过进一步研究，我们注意到用作电解质的液体来源不明，并已根据任务将样品送往我们的姊妹实验室： AC-PPE-47-N。

original: Incident Report 08-07-07

Incident Report 08-07-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

Fire alarm was sounded at approximately 10:05 A.M. in the vending area near Cafeteria B3. I immediately rushed to the location and encountered General Robert Dobbs kicking a Nuka-Cola machine repeatedly. General Dobbs ignored my order to stand down from his actions and drew his sidearm. He then proceeded to fire 7 shots into the machine, rupturing several bottles and piercing the coin box. After the coins began pouring to the floor, he picked up one of them and exclaimed "Stealing from a superior officer? Are you out of your MIND, soldier?" He holstered his sidearm and looked at me, then back at the machine and simply stated, "Well don't just stand there, I believe this soldier needs a medic, son."
The general was relieved of his sidearm and placed in our lockup facility until Metro D.C. Police arrived to pick him up.
translation:
事件报告 08-07-77

报告官员：哈罗德·卡拉汉

上午10:05左右，B3自助餐厅附近的自动售货区响起火警警报。我立即赶往现场，发现罗伯特·多布斯将军正在反复踢一台核子可乐贩售机。多布斯将军无视我让他停止行动的命令，拔出随身武器。随后，他向机器开了7枪，打碎了几个瓶子，并击穿了投币箱。硬币倾泄了一地，他捡起了其中的一枚大喊道：“敢偷上级级军官的钱？你疯了么，士兵？”他收起他的佩枪并看着我，而后背对着贩售机轻描淡写的说，“别光在那站着，我认为这个士兵需要个医生，孩子。”
将军被解除了佩枪，并被关进了我们的拘留所，直到华盛顿特区警察将其带走。

original: Incident Report 08-16-07

Incident Report 08-16-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

Secretary Maybel Meyers from Accounting Division called us down here and reported an altercation between two other secretaries. Sergeant Deke DaSilva and I arrived at the scene to find two female secretaries, Carol Wallace and Isabelle Franks, scuffling on the floor. We broke up the altercation and took their statements. Ms. Wallace was accusing Ms. Franks of being a "...spy for those damn Red bastards!" and stating that she overheard "...secret conversations between Isabelle and her Chinese conspirators!" Ms. Franks simply stated she was "Speaking to her husband about weekend plans." Both ladies were given a warning and sent home for the day by their supervisors.

Tensions have been running high lately ever since the incidents in Alaska, and this is just one example of the effect it is having on everyone.
translation:
事件报告 08-16-77

报告官员：哈罗德·卡拉汉

会计部秘书梅布尔·梅耶斯打电话给我们，报告说另外两名秘书之间发生了口角。我和德克·达席尔瓦警官抵达现场时，发现两名女秘书卡罗尔·华莱士和伊莎贝尔·弗兰克斯在地板上扭打在一起。我们制止了争吵，并为她们做了笔录。华莱士女士指责弗兰克斯女士是“......那些该死的红色杂种的间谍！”并说她听到了“......伊莎贝尔和她的中国同谋之间的秘密谈话！”弗兰克斯女士只是说她“在和丈夫谈论周末计划”。两位女士都受到了警告，并被她们的主管送回了家。

自从阿拉斯加的事件发生后，最近气氛一直很紧张，这只是对每个人造成影响的一个例子。

original: Incident Report 08-22-07

Incident Report 08-22-77

Reporting Officer:  Harold Callahan

A silent alarm tripped on Stairwell 117, and I immediately responded. As I approached the stairwell entrance, I heard noises as if someone was in duress. I drew my weapon and entered by kicking open the door. I discovered Ronald Bales from Intelligence and Analysis in a compromising position with Wilma Firestone, a secretary from the Accounting Division. I gave them both a warning, and told Mr. Bales that this is his fifth and final one... the next time he is discovered performing this type of activity on Pentagon property, he'll be fined and disciplinary action will be recommended.
translation:
事件报告 08-22-77

报告官员：哈罗德·卡拉汉

一个无声警报在第117楼梯井响了起来，我立即就去处理它。当我走近楼梯间入口时，我听到了嘈杂声，似乎有人受到了胁迫。我拔出武器，踢开门进入。我发现情报和分析部的罗纳德·贝尔斯正与会计部的秘书威尔玛·费尔斯通处于暧昧状态。我给了他们俩一个警告，并告诉贝尔斯先生，这是他的第五次，也是最后一次……下次再发现他在五角大楼的地盘上进行这种活动，他将被罚款，并建议对他进行纪律处分。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089\n\nRemmings over at the Museum of Technology is complaining again about the Planetarium system malfunctioning. I've replaced the playback unit on that thing 3 times now. Seems like the system keeps crashing and trying to restart itself, then crashes again... keeps repeating that cycle until it's completely rebooted. I suggest that we acquire a new type of system in next year's budget. The cost of replacing it now and fitting a new system is cheaper than the amount we've spent shoving in replacement parts.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089\n\n在科学博物馆的游客又在抱怨天文馆系统失灵了。我已经把那个回放单元替换过三次了。看来似乎系统依然会崩溃，并试图自动重启，然后再次崩溃...不断重复这种循环直到它完全重新启动。我建议在明年的预算里加入一项购买新系统的费用。相对于更换它重新安装一个新系统会便宜不少。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0086\n\nBrantseg over at the National Archives is requesting a new brain software package for their "TJEFF002 Thomas Jefferson" Protectron. The original software was wiped and replaced with a radio uplink and frequency scanning software package which is simply receiving and broadcasting local radio stations. I suggest we encrypt the next brain package so this type of software purchase is not necessary.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0086\n\n国家档案馆的布兰特赛格正在申请一个新的脑波软件包给他们的“TJEFF002 托马斯·杰斐逊”型保护者。原有的软件被删除并替换上了一个无线电上行链接及频率扫描软件包用以取代单向接收和发送本地的无线电站点的功能。我建议我们对以后的脑波数据包加密，所以这类软件是没有必要购买的。

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0089
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0089

original: Museum Authority Log MA-0085\n\nWe've logged a fourth request from Dr. Gillian Taylor over at the National Aquarium regarding a new tank she wishes to be constructed for her whale exhibition. I've already spoken to Director Barnicky, and he maintains that a new exhibit is out of the question and the current one is becoming far too expensive to maintain. Director Barnicky has already spoken to the San Francisco Aquarium, and they have agreed to begin construction of an appropriately sized tank and viewing area for Dr. Taylor's whales. He's also negotiated with that facility to have Dr. Taylor transferred, and I support this decision.
translation: 博物馆管理处日志 MA-0085\n\n我们已经记录第四个关于吉莉安·泰勒博士在国家水族馆建造新型水箱的要求了，她希望能进行鲸鱼展览。我已经和巴尼金主任谈过 ，他坚持认为，进行一个新的展览是不可能的因为当前的维护已经过于昂贵了。巴尼金主任已经和旧金山水族馆交涉过，他们已经同意开始建造一个适当大小的水箱用于展览泰勒博士的鲸。他已经工厂达成协议并移交泰勒博士，我支持这个决定。

original: Sorry, My Darling
translation: 对不起，亲爱的

original: Lag-Bolt's Note
translation: “方头螺栓”的便条

original:
Hey Lags!

This your big bro! Hope you got the package. I had two of these things specially made for us in Virginia by The Tailor. He's a master at this stuff. I know you and your chick will love it. Try not to wear her out too fast, if you catch my drift.

Hugs,
Lug-Nut
translation:
嘿！方头！

是我啊，你的大哥！希望你收到了包裹。我在弗吉尼亚州请裁缝为我们特制了两件这样的东西。他是这方面的大师。我知道你和你的妞会喜欢的。别让她太累了，你懂我的意思吗？

抱抱，
“轮毂螺母”

original: Big Town Mission Report

original: Big Town Mission Report:\n\nMission failure. Ambushed by Mutants. Lost one initiate, caravan driver, and mule. Survivor in critical condition at Citadel.
translation: 大镇任务报告:\n\n任务失败。遭到变种人伏击。损失一名新兵、一名商队车夫和一匹骡子。幸存者处于危急状态留在大本营。

Mission successful.

任务完成。

 [我们本来仅仅只是来建条管道的。 - B.]

original: Entry 1
translation: 记录 1

original: This place is a total disaster. Hopefully I’ll get this distribution system set up soon and I can get back to the Citadel. Shouldn’t take more than two weeks. I’ve already been in consultation with the  Rivet City Council. They have tentatively agreed to take over the Water Distribution Network for us once we’ve worked out the kinks. Something tells me there’s going to be more than a few of those.
translation: 这个地方真是一团糟。真希望我能很快建立好配送系统然后回到大本营。完成这件事应该不会用到超过两周的时间。我已经和铆钉城议会开始磋商。他们初步决定在我们解决这个问题后接管供水管网，但是我感觉问题可不止这一点点。

original: Entry 2
translation: 记录 2

original: I think Rothchild is really upset with me this time. He sent me Scribes who apparently failed their Cartography training. I don’t have time for this.
translation: 我想罗斯查得这次是真对我失望了. 他送来的学士明显连制图学都没过关. 我可没时间为这个磨叽.

original: Entry 3
translation: 记录 3

original: I’m getting practically no cooperation. Rothchild ignores my messages. And the  Knights stuck with delivery duties are more than a little resentful. I don’t want to have to send them out anymore than they want to go.
translation: 我几乎得不到任何合作。罗斯查德无视我的信息。而那些负责送货的骑士们更是怨声载道，我不想再让他们去了。

original: Entry 4
translation: 记录 4

original: Dr. Li left today. Went up north to the Commonwealth. What a bitch.  She couldn’t handle the fact that even these morons Rothchild sent me were capable of improving upon her work. It’s no wonder she never got the thing working without help in the first place. Anyway, to hell with Dr. Li. Good riddance.
translation: 李博士今天离开了。北上去了联邦。这个烂婊子。事实上她连罗斯查德送来的白痴都可以改善的工作都处理不了。难怪她一开始没有人帮她就做不好这东西。无论如何，去他娘的李博士。老子解放了。

original: Entry 5
translation: 记录 5

original: First casualty reported today. I know compared to the death tolls of the war it will barely register back at the Citadel. But still… I hate being responsible, even indirectly, for another man’s death. It brings back unpleasant memories.
translation: 今天第一份伤亡报告。我明白相比在战争中的死去的人数，这点伤亡几乎不会登记回大本营。但是我依然厌恶背负这责任，即使是间接的。它唤起了我不愉快的回忆。

original: Entry 6
translation: 记录 6

original: So many caravans missing in action. The Rivet City escorts I can understand. They haven’t had much blooding, holed up in that boat of theirs. Sure, I’ve gotten more Initiates than full fledged Knights, since it’s all hands in the war. But still, even a couple of heavily armed Initiates should be able to handle escorting a mule and driver across the wastes.
translation: 这么多运输队在行动中失踪了。我能理解铆钉城的押运队。躲在船里头的他们从来没见过那么多鲜血。当然，鉴于这种全面战争的状态，我手上的新兵比老练的骑士还多。但是即使是一队武装过的新兵也应该可以处理这点护送一队牲口和车夫穿越废土的小事啊。

original: Entry 7
translation: 记录 7

original:
So this Ghoul from Underworld, Griffon, offered to pay me for shipments of water. Lyons wouldn’t approve, but I don’t care. We need the caps and the technology he’s offering. I can use it to fund the other deliveries.

One day Lyons will come to his senses and agree that selling the water is the smartest thing. Let supply and demand fuel the delivery system. This bleeding heart charity of his is going to bring down the Brotherhood. We’re at war! We shouldn’t be expending resources on delivering water. At any rate, we can do that after we wipe out the Enclave. Sometimes I wonder if Lyons has gone senile.

I should delete this entry in case someone important audits my files. Ah, screw it. It might be time for me to leave the Brotherhood, anyway. Not sure where’d I go, though.
translation:
于是这个来着冥界的尸鬼，格里芬，提出花钱雇我运水。里昂斯不同意，不过我才不在乎。我们需要他提供的瓶盖还有科技。我可以用它来筹建另一支运输队。

终有一天里昂斯会明白并同意卖水是最明智的事。让供需来给运输系统增添动力。他的妇人之仁最终将会断送兄弟会。我们正处在战争时期！我们不该在送水的事情上耗费资源。至少，在我们可以在打垮英克雷之后再做。有时我纳闷里昂斯是不是老糊涂了。

我应该删除这个条目以防万一有什么大人物查我的帐。啊，该死的的。总之，或许是我该离开兄弟会的时候了。尽管我不知道自己该何去何从。

original: Entry 8
translation: 记录 8

original: I dno’t rember teh last time I slept for more than tihrty minutes.  I’m so damn tired jkhkjkjsdfg sdfgssdfgsd  ha. apparently I just nodded off and hit my face on the keyboard. I can’t take this anyomre!!!!11!!
translation: 我都不记得上次我睡够30分钟是哪辈子的事了。我真他妈的累死了jkhkjkjsdfg sdfgssdfgsd哈。看来我是打了个盹脸摔在键盘上了。我再也受不了啦！！！！11！！

original: Entry 9
translation: 记录 9

original: Where the hell is everyone? So many caravans still MIA.
translation: 每个家伙都死到哪里去了？如此多的商队依然音讯全无。

original: Entry 10
translation: 记录 10

original: Lepelletier keeps sending me dispatches requesting additional resources. I don’t have anything for her. Not sure they’ll be able to handle this water distribution after all. Great. I’ll be stuck here forever.
translation: 莱佩莱捷不断送信来向我索要额外的资源。我已经没什么东西好给她了。不知道他们到底能不能处理好这次供水计划。棒呆了。我要永远困死在这儿了。

original: Entry 11
translation: 记录 11

original: I'm ignoring Megaton's requests for more water until I can determine what the hell happened. The caravan reported in, successful. I have no reason to doubt the report.
translation: 在我确定到底发生了什么事之前，我不会理会兆吨镇要更多水的要求。旅队都报告了，事办成了。我没有理由怀疑这份报告。

translation: 当前任务

坎特伯雷社区：在外驻扎

杜科夫的老窝：战斗中失踪

银新台：在外驻扎

戴夫共和国：战斗中失踪

铆钉城：返回, 任务成功

特佩尼大厦：战斗中失踪

original: Entry 12
translation: 记录 12

original: Heard that the kid who helped start the Purifier finally woke up.
translation: 听说那个帮助开启净水设施的孩子终于醒来了。

original: Entry 13
translation: 记录 13

original: I think Lyons suspects something. He must have a plant here. How the hell would he know about the “missing” water shipments? I’ve been stonewalling him. How the hell does he have time to worry about us with that war going on?
translation: 我认为里昂斯在怀疑着什么。他必须得在这有个工厂。他到底是怎么知道运水货物失踪的破事的？我一直被他碍手碍脚。到底要怎么搞才能让那老鬼有时间去继续操心我们和战争的事？

original: Entry 14
translation: 记录 14

original: I’m seriously considering murdering these Project Purity lab coats. Ungrateful, whining, good-for-nothing, bothersome ingrates the lot of them.
translation: 我曾经考虑过干掉所有参与净水工程的研究员。这群忘恩负义，牢骚满腹，又没出息，又烦死人的白痴。

original: Entry 15
translation: 记录 15

original: I wish somebody would fix that damn leak! The dripping is driving me crazy!
translation: 我希望有人能去修修那个漏洞! 滴水声都快把我逼疯了!

original: Entry 16
translation: 记录 16

original: I give up. This is hopeless.
translation: 我放弃。没希望了。

original: Entry 17
translation: 记录 17

original: Wow… Megaton’s gone. I know I was complaining about them… but, all those people! Erased in a single moment in time… I can't imagine.
translation: 哇噢，兆吨镇消失了。我记得我曾经埋怨过他们……但是，所有人! 一瞬间全被核谐了……真是无法想象。

original: Petty Cash
translation: 零钱

original: 24 caps (no that’s not a typo)
translation: 24枚瓶盖(不，那没弄错)

original: Available Requisitions
translation: 可申请物品清单

original:
Available Assets:

1 Plasma Rifle
2 Power Armor Suits
4 Assault Rifles
1 Mini-gun
1 Missile Launcher (3 missiles)
6 Medkits
20+ Chems (various)
translation:
可用资产:

1把 等离子步枪
2套 动力装甲
4把 突击步枪
1挺 多管机枪
1把 火箭弹发射器（含3枚火箭弹）
6套 医疗包
20多份 化学药物（数种）

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nWe're still having a bit of trouble getting the new SYL-02 Xoted Mainframe adapted to our train drive systems down here. It's going to take another 72 hours to get it fully up and running. I've been pulling triple shifts for the last two days already AND the supervisors are constantly on our backs blaming us for the delays when THEY bought an incompatible system. I wish that I could get to sleep and just get this over with...this is only high school bullshit. I'm lost, I'm freaking and everybody knows... everybody's watching.
translation: 机械师：D.T.\n\n我们在使新的SYL-02 Xoted主机适配这里的列车驱动系统方面仍有一些问题。还需要72个小时才能完全运行。在过去的两天里，我一直都是三班倒，而主管们却一直在背后指责我们，说我们买了一个不兼容的系统，却造成了延误。我真希望能好好睡一觉，把这一切都解决了……这简直就是高中生的胡闹。我崩溃了了，我吓坏了，每个人都知道……每个人都在看。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nThe switch track over between Adams Air Force Base and the White House main line is sticking again. I've dispatched a crew to repair it. I expect the line to be down no more than maybe a day. We can shunt all the trains to the alternate inbound line and just run them on half schedule or something for now. Just a suggestion.
translation: 机械师：D.T.\n\n亚当斯空军基地和白宫主干线之间的轨道转换又出问题了了。我派了一组工作人员去修理。我预期线路将在一天之内恢复通畅。现在我们可以分流所有列车入站的备用线并让他们按照列车时刻表的半数运行或诸如此类的临时举措。这只是我的一个建议。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nAfter debating for a few days, the powers that be have decided to change out the vocal interface on the Xoted Mainframe from male to female. Why? So they can give it a cute acronym and name it "Margot." Then they can trot it around for the press so we can all see where our hard-earned taxpayer dollars went. Wow, what a colossal waste of my time. Now I have to pull the mainframe's circuit array and flush the memory all to get a new voice installed... great, just great.
translation: 机械师：D.T.\n\n经过几天的讨论，当局决定将Xoted主机上的发声界面从男性改为女性。为啥呢？这样他们就能给它取个可爱的缩写并命名为“玛格特”。然后他们就可以在媒体上大肆宣扬，让我们都看看，我们辛辛苦苦挣来的纳税人的钱都花到哪儿去了。哇哦，真是浪费我的时间。现在，我不得不抽出主机电路阵列并清除内存以安装新的音频界面…太棒了，真是太棒了。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nOh, today was a beauty. I was called up to the Senatorial Lounge near the White House station and someone decided to make a political statement by spray painting graffiti all over the walls inside the Lounge containing more than a fair share of Chinese racial slurs. They must have broken in while it was closed and did the damage. Hooray for security... they really dropped the ball on this one. Never send a robot to do a man's job I say. I spent the better part of the day scrubbing walls clean of that filth and installing new fixtures. Joy.
translation: 机械师：D.T.\n\n嗷，今天真是个好日子。我被叫到白宫站附近的参议员休息室，因为某人决定发表政治声明，在休息室的墙壁上到处喷涂涂鸦，其中不乏对中国人的种族诽谤。他们一定是趁休息室关门的时候闯进去搞破坏的。为安保叫好……他们在这件事上真的掉链子了。我说，永远不要派机器人去做人类的工作。我花了大半天时间把墙壁上的脏东西擦干净并安装了新设备。喜悦。

original: Mechanic: D.T.\n\nWe got the new Sentinel Unit up and running today. Pretty bad-ass. Not only does it have maintenance capability, so I can remote command it to do repairs, but it also is a great riot suppression unit... we can use it if we ever have any protesters break in down here again. Finally, a worthwhile addition to the robot fleet.
translation: 机械师：D.T.\n\n我们今天启动了新的哨兵单位。漂亮的坏家伙。它不但有维修能力，我能远程操作它进行维修工作，而且还是一个强大的镇暴单位…如果再有抗议者闯入这里，我们就可以用它了。终于，机器人舰队又添一员猛将了。

original:
Hey downstairs - 

This new guy you sent to help out is awful. I mean, he can barely tie his shoes. This is advanced technical equipment up here, and I can't have him work on it. He'll probably end up accidentally calling an orbital strike down on the base or something.

Here's an idea - how about you send the guy that cleans the toilets up here and I can give him the job instead. Is it really that hard to find decent help?
translation:
嘿，楼下的 -

你派来的那个新伙计真是太糟糕了。我的意思是，他甚至都没办法绑好自己的鞋带。我这儿是先进技术部门，我可不能让他继续在这儿工作。他很可能一不小心就搞出像让卫星轨道炮发射摧毁这儿或者别的类似的事情。

我有个主意 - 不如你派他去扫厕所怎样?而你再给我再找个能工作的人来替代。这是个两全其美的法子吧？

original:
Hey downstairs, it's me again - 

Are we ever going to get a tech up here to work on this satellite tracking equipment? I swear it's offline every couple of days, and then it's literally hours of work before I have the system online and linked up to the satellite again.

This is ridiculous.
translation:
嘿，楼下的，又是我 -

到底什么时候在这个卫星追踪设施里我们才能得到一个真正的技术人员？我发誓这玩意儿每两三天就自动离线一次，然后我就得把所有的工作时间花在把系统重新联线到卫星上。

真是荒谬。

original:
Guys - 

Strike two. This is the second dimwit you've sent up here, and I'm getting tired of it. I thought he was ok at first, but by lunchtime his Mentats had worn off and he could barely hold a conversation let alone work on a satellite control terminal. I can't have a junkie up here spacing out as soon as his pills wear off.

Fix this.
translation:
伙计 -

俩混球了。这已经是你扔到这里的第二个蠢蛋了, 我已经开始烦这套了。一开始我还觉得他蛮不错的，没想到还没等到吃午饭他的曼他特药效就过了，之后他连正常说话都办不到更别说一个人好好待在卫星通讯终端上工作了。我不能忍受一个瘾君子待在我这里，在他的药瘾彻底戒掉前把他带了滚。

快搞定这破事。

original:
ROBOTS ARE FREAKING OUT! - 

About fifteen minutes ago, all of the robots in the place just went haywire and started attacking everyone. The guards and the new guy managed to lock them in the storage area, but we need someone up here to sort them out immediately.

What's going on down there anyway?
translation:
该死的机器人！ -

大约十五分钟前，所有位置上的机器人突然出现故障并开始攻击所有人。警卫和新来的伙计设法把他们锁在了储藏区，但我们需要有人马上把机器人问题彻底解决掉。

究竟发生了什么事情？

original: Dunbar's Note
translation: 邓巴的便条

original:
If you're reading this, it's because you might be able to help.

We're thinking about branching out. Underworld was a good start, but we've found an even safer place for us to set up a new place to call home.

Old Olney.

No one ever goes there. No one would ever think to look for us there. There's tons of space under the town. So we're looking for a few strong backs to help knock down some walls, clear some space underground, and help get things up and running.

-S
translation:
如果你正在看这份笔记，那是因为你也许能帮上忙。

我们正在考虑关于扩展的事。冥界是个好的开始，但我们找到了一个更安全的，能建一个能称之为家的地方。

老奥尔尼。

没人会去那里。没人会想到去那里寻找我们。镇子的地底有大量的空间。我们正在寻找一些强健后背，以协助我们打通一些墙壁，清理出一些空间，帮我们把事情办好。

-S

translation: DLC03BS1RothchildGreetD

original: Hopefully I found something that can help you.
translation: 希望我找到了些对你有帮助的东西。

original: It could've been worse. They could have attacked the Citadel.
translation: 事情可能会更糟。他们本可以袭击大本营的。

original: I'm sorry about the robot. There wasn't anything anyone could've done.
translation: 机器人的事我很抱歉。当时谁都无能为力。

original: I'm on my way back to the Citadel now.
translation: 我正在回大本营的路上。

original: I found something, but I'm not sure what.
translation: 我找到了些东西，不过我不知道是什么。

original: I found some encrypted data on one of their terminals.
translation: 我在他们的终端里找到了些加密的数据。

original: Okay, I'm going.
translation: 好吧，我去。

original: This isn't what I signed up for.
translation: 我加入可不是为了这个。

original: Hey, wait! You said you didn't need my help!
translation: 嘿，等等！你说过你不用我帮助的！

original: What am I looking for?
translation: 我要找什么？

original: That's why I'm here, actually. Bigsley sent me.
translation: 实际上，我来这就是因为这个。比格斯利派我来的。

original: I'm a decent shot. Need another hired gun?
translation: 我枪法不错。要雇我吗？

original: I thought Rivet City security was a police force, not a military organization.
translation: 我以为铆钉城的保安只是警察，而不是军事组织。

original: "Military operations"? You've got be kidding. Rivet City security are chumps.
translation: “军事行动”？你开玩笑吧。铆钉城的保安都是些蠢蛋。

original: Sounds like you could use some help. What do you need?
translation: 听起来你需要帮助。你需要什么？

original: Hire me and your problems are as good as gone.
translation: 雇我，你的问题就解决了。

original: Yeah, not interested in dying. Good luck to you and your men.
translation: 是啊，我可没兴趣去送死。祝你们好运。

original: You sound pretty certain this particular caravan will be attacked.
translation: 听你的口气，你很确定这支旅队会遭到袭击。

original: If we do get attacked, and I do find a ringleader, then what?
translation: 如果我们真的受到攻击，而我又找到了他们的头目，然后呢？

original: I'm getting paid, right?
translation: 我有报酬吧？

original: All right, I'll protect the caravan and track down the attackers.
translation: 好，我会保护运输队，找出袭击者。

original: Where do I find the caravan again?
translation: 再说一次到哪找运输队？

original: I'm going to pass on this one. Find someone else.
translation: 我还是不干了。去找别人吧。

original: Is that a Plasma Rifle you've got there? I could use that on the mission.
translation: 你那是把等离子步枪吗？我可能会用得上。

original: I'm afraid I'm going to need to get paid up front.
translation: 恐怕你要先付钱给我。

original: Understood.
translation: 明白。

original: Can you at least tell me what I'll be getting?
translation: 你至少能告诉我会得到什么吧？

original: I have some questions about my mission.
translation: 我有几个关于我的任务的问题。

original: I'm nobody you need to worry about.
translation: 我不是你要担心的人。

original: I'm your worst nightmare!
translation: 我是你最恐怖的噩梦！

original: <Say nothing.>
translation: <沉默不语>

original: I came for the job. You still hiring guns?
translation: 我来找工作。你们还要人吗？

original: "Mirelurk stew."
translation: “泥沼蟹炖菜。”

original: Pass phrase? I don't know anything about a pass phrase.
translation: 通行口令？我不知道什么口令。

original: Ummm... oh yeah, the pass phrase. It's "Eye patch"!
translation: 呃……哦，对了，通行口令是“眼罩”！

original: "Open sesame"?
translation: “芝麻开门”？

original: I'm here to send you and your gang into retirement. Got any last words?
translation: 我是来送你和你们帮派退休的。有什么遗言吗？

original: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ01Recording
translation: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ01Recording

original: A guy named Split Jack. Not to worry. He's dead now.
translation: 一个叫“撕裂”杰克的家伙。不用担心。他已经死了。

original: A guy named Split Jack. Not to worry. I sent him and his gang packing.
translation: 一个叫“撕裂”杰克的家伙。不用担心。我送他那帮人回老家了。

original: I killed the ringleader. You owe me big time, lady.
translation: 我杀了头目。你可欠我一个大人情，女士。

original: I dealt with the ringleader. They're gone now. You owe me big time, lady.
translation: 我解决了头目。他们已经走了。你可欠我一个大人情，女士。

original: What do you mean you'll make "arrangements"?
translation: 你说的“安排”是什么意思？

original: I want my money, and I want it now.
translation: 我要我的钱，现在就要。

original: You're not trying to stiff me, are you?
translation: 你不是想耍我吧？

original: Officer Lepelletier said you'd be rewarding me...
translation: 莱佩莱捷警官说你会给我奖励……

original: I still don't understand why the Brotherhood isn't just selling the water.
translation: 我还是不明白为什么兄弟会不直接卖水。

original: What's Rivet City getting out of helping the Brotherhood?
translation: 铆钉城帮兄弟会能得到什么好处？

original: I'm done playing your guessing game.
translation: 我不想玩你的猜谜游戏了。

original: Do I really have to guess?
translation: 我一定要猜吗？

original: Look, just tell me the price or I'm leaving.
translation: 听着，告诉我多少钱，不然我就走了。

original: Fine. Take my 10 caps already.
translation: 好吧。这就给你10个瓶盖。

original: I don't know, 40 caps?
translation: 我不知道，40个瓶盖？

original: I don't know, 40 caps?
translation: 我不知道，40个瓶盖？

original: 30 caps?
translation: 30个瓶盖？

original: 20 caps?
translation: 20个瓶盖？

original: 10 caps?
translation: 10个瓶盖？

original: Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
translation: 好。这是10个瓶盖。给我一瓶“神奇的”沌净水。

original: Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
translation: 好。这是10个瓶盖。给我一瓶“神奇的”沌净水。

original: I think I'll pass. Thanks anyway.
translation: 我要走了。谢谢。

original: How much are you selling them for?
translation: 这一瓶多少钱？

original: Got a free sample I could try?
translation: 有免费样品吗？

original: Tell you what. I'll trade you a piece of blue sky for a bottle.
translation: 这样吧。你免费给我来一瓶。

original: You got a nice head of hair. For a Ghoul, I mean.
translation: 我是说，作为一个尸鬼，你的头发真不错。

original: Is that any different from regular Aqua Pura?
translation: 这和普通的纯净水有什么不同吗？

original: DLC03EncounterADTopic
translation: DLC03EncounterADTopic

original: I need a break. Olney was tougher than I thought.
translation: 我要休息一下。奥尔尼比我想象的要难对付。

original: I'm good to go. What's next?
translation: 我准备好了。接下来干什么？

original: Olney? No, I don't think so.
translation: 奥尔尼？不行，我不去。

original: You want me to go all the way to Olney?
translation: 你想让我去奥尔尼？

original: Olney Powerworks? What's there?
translation: 奥尔尼电力厂？那儿有什么？

original: I don't get paid? At all? This gig sucks.
translation: 我没有报酬？一点也没有？这工作烂透了。

original: You don't have much of a sense of humor, do you?
translation: 你没什么幽默感，对吧？

original: Sorry, it was just a joke.
translation: 抱歉，只是开个玩笑。

original: Do I get paid for it?
translation: 我有报酬吗？

original: Any job you've got, I can do.
translation: 你有什么工作，我都能做。

original: I'm ready for more. What do you need?
translation: 我准备好了。要我干什么？

original: That doesn't sound like much of a leader talking.
translation: 这听起来可不像是一位领导者说的话。

original: Everyone here believes in you, and in the Brotherhood. We can do this.
translation: 这里的每个人都相信你，相信兄弟会。我们能行的。

original: We have to keep fighting them. We can't back down now.
translation: 我们必须继续战斗，现在不能退缩。

original: Now's not really the time to be getting cold feet.
translation: 现在可不是退缩的时候。

original: Well, it's too late to turn back now.
translation: 唔，现在要回头也晚了。

original: You couldn't have known this would happen. No one knew.
translation: 你不可能知道会发生这种事。没人会知道。

original: I might like a bottle of Aqua Cura. How much are you selling them for?
translation: 我想来一瓶沌净水。你卖多少钱？

original: Here's 10 caps. I'll take a bottle.
translation: 给你10个瓶盖。给我来一瓶。

original: DLC03WQ02GreetingB2aPoor
translation: DLC03WQ02GreetingB2aPoor

original: Well, if I had 10 caps, I might buy a bottle.
translation: 好吧，如果我有10个瓶盖，我可能会买一瓶。

original: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoorCanPay
translation: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoorCanPay

original: Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
translation: 好。这是10个瓶盖。给我一瓶“神奇的”沌净水。

original: Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
translation: 好。这是10个瓶盖。给我一瓶“神奇的”沌净水。

original: Look, I'm not really interested in buying your Aqua Cura.
translation: 听着，我真的不想买你的沌净水。

original: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoor
translation: DLC03WQ02GreetingPoor

original: I don't quite have 10 caps.
translation: 我连10个瓶盖都没有。

original: Care to tell me where this water operation of yours is located?
translation: 能告诉我你们的供水公司在哪里吗？

original: Relax. I don't care. Take these morons for all their worth. I'm just curious.
translation: 别紧张。我没有别的意思。你怎么骗这些白痴都行。我只是好奇而已。

original: There's nothing wrong with my Pip-Boy. You sir, are a liar.
translation: 我的哔哔小子什么问题也没有。你是个骗子。

original: You're clearly up to something. There's no denying it. Talk. Now!
translation: 你肯定在隐瞒什么。不要抵赖了。现在就说！

original: Pip-Boy analysis shows that your Aqua Cura is irradiated. Interesting...
translation: 我的哔哔小子分析出你的沌净水里有辐射。有意思啊……

original: Griffon's up to something with the Aqua Pura. What do you know about it?
translation: 格里芬在那些纯净水上做了手脚。你知道些什么？

original: Just making conversation. I really don't care where you got the stuff.
translation: 只是聊聊天。我没兴趣知道你的货都是从哪来的。

original: I'd have thought giving Aqua Pura to a Ghoul would seem like a waste.
translation: 我还以为把纯净水给尸鬼是一种浪费呢。

original: I'm not interested in making trouble. I'm just curious where you got the water.
translation: 我不是来找麻烦的。我只是好奇你的水是从哪来的。

original: I'm curious. Where'd you get all this Aqua Pura?
translation: 我很好奇。你的这些纯净水是哪来的？

original: You can get Aqua Pura for free. Why pay for yours?
translation: 我们能免费拿到纯净水。为什么还要我们付钱买？

original: No. I mean, you just changed the name? Or did you do something to it?
translation: 不。我是说，你只是换了个名字？还是说你动了下手脚？

original: So... Any thoughts on the Enclave?
translation: 那么……对英克雷有什么看法？

original: DLC03WQ02GriffonSalesPitch20
translation: DLC03WQ02GriffonSalesPitch20

translation: DLC03WQ02GriffonSalesPitch

original: Forget all that. Just give me 300 caps this once, and we'll call it even.
translation: 算了。给我300个瓶盖，我俩就算扯平了。

original: Fine, 20/80 in your favor. But if you stiff me, you'll regret it.
translation: 好吧，我们二八分。不过你要是敢赖账，我会让你后悔的。

original: DLC03WQ02EndBlackmail1
translation: DLC03WQ02EndBlackmail1

original: We split the profits 50/50 or this will end badly for you.
translation: 我们五五分，不然有你好看。

original: 40/60 in your favor.
translation: 我们四六分。
三七分？

original: Look. I won't expose your lies... but only if you start selling real Aqua Pura.
translation: 听着。我不会揭穿你的谎言……但是你必须开始卖真正的纯净水。

original: I've seen your bottling operation. The jig is up.
translation: 我看过你们的装瓶作业了。把戏结束了。

original: Either you tell them, or I tell them. Your call.
translation: 要么你告诉他们，要么我来。你自己选。

original: That's NOT Aqua Pura. If you want my silence, you'll have to buy it.
translation: 这不是纯净水。你想要我闭嘴，那就要给我点好处。

original: A guy named Split Jack is behind the attacks.
translation: 一个叫“撕裂”杰克家伙在幕后操纵这一切。

original: It's time for someone else to take charge. You and me. Right now. Time to die.
translation: 你的位置该换人打理了。你和我，就现在，死期到了。

original: They're not going to pay you to protect something they're giving away for free.
translation: 他们可不会付钱让你们保护他们免费派发的东西。

original: So what's the score?
translation: 情况怎样了？

original: DLC03WQ03Scene1
translation: DLC03WQ03Scene1

original: DLC03WQ03Scene2
translation: DLC03WQ03Scene2

original: DLC03WQ03Scene3
translation: DLC03WQ03Scene3

original: DLC03WQ03Scene4
translation: DLC03WQ03Scene4

original: The Apostles of Eternal Light? Is that just you?
translation: 永恒之光使徒？只有你一个？

original: Thanks, but I'll pass. I've had bad luck with cults.
translation: 谢谢，还是算了。我遇上迷信的东西就没好事。

original: I'm sure you mean well, but this has to stop.
translation: 我知道你本意是好的，但这一切必须停止。

original: You know this water is full of radiation, right?
translation: 你知道这些水充满了辐射吧？

original: Sounds like a nice little setup you've got. Have fun poisoning people!
translation: 看来你这个小骗局弄得不错。祝你毒害群众愉快！

original: Spreading tainted water under the guise of helping humanity? I can relate.
translation: 打着帮助人类的幌子散播污染的水？我能理解。

original: Luminescent Mother, I need to speak with you about your holy water.
translation: 荧光母亲，我要和你谈谈你的圣水。

original: I'm putting an end to your twisted cult, right now.
translation: 我现在就给你们这变态的邪教划上句号。

original: Slow down. What happened here?
translation: 别急。怎么回事？

original: It's okay. You couldn't have known.
translation: 没事的。你不可能知道的。

original: I'll look into it. Where did you get the water?
translation: 我会调查的。你的水是从哪来的？

original: Sounds to me like you wanted him dead.
translation: 在我看来，你是想让他死。

original: Tell me about your order.
translation: 跟我说说你的修道会。

original: Why are you doing all of this?
translation: 你为什么要这么做？

original: Where did you get your water?
translation: 这些水都是哪来的？

original: How do you make your "holy water"?
translation: 你们是怎么制作"圣水"的？

original: How do you make your "holy water"?
translation: 你们是怎么制作"圣水"的？

original: Ever think about letting people bring in empty bottles to fill with Aqua Pura?
translation: 有没有想过让人们带着空瓶子来装纯净水？

original: Mind if I ask some questions about your role in all of this?
translation: 你介意我问一些关于你工作的问题吗？

original: DLC03AudioLDFFE02
translation: DLC03AudioLDFFE02

original: DLC03AudioLDFFE03
translation: DLC03AudioLDFFE03

original: Uh, never mind.
translation: 呃，算了。

original: Guns.
translation: 枪。

original: Boards.
translation: 板子。

original: Pipes.
translation: 管子。

original: Knives.
translation: 刀子。

original: DLC03WQ01DuelTopic
translation: DLC03WQ01DuelTopic

original: DLC03WhiteFlagGreet
translation: DLC03WhiteFlagGreet

original: Yeah, I killed him. But I'm here to set up a "protection" deal with the gang.
translation: 对，我把他干掉了。不过我想和你谈谈"保护费"的问题。

original: Not good enough. 500 caps now, and more when I say it's time for more.
translation: 这不行。先给500个瓶盖，下次我还会来要多点的。

original: It's a deal. I'll call off the attacks.
translation: 成交。我会取消袭击的。

original: Never mind. I was just kidding.
translation: 没事。我只是开玩笑。

original: The protection contract costs a mere 200 caps per week.
translation: 保护费只要每周200个瓶盖。

original: Pay 500 caps now, and I'll call off the attacks.
translation: 现在支付500瓶盖，我就取消袭击。

original: So long. I'll see you in a week.
translation: 咱们下周见。

original: Come on, I know you've got something more. Quit holding out on me.
translation: 来吧，我知道你还剩了点。别再装了。

original: Give me more. Or I'll bust you upside the head.
translation: 再给多点。不然我就把你的脖子拧下来。

original: Not good enough. Give me your caps, or I'll take them from your corpse.
translation: 这不行。把你们的瓶盖都给我，省得我在你们尸体上搜。

original: Ahem. If it wasn't for me, there'd be no protection racket.
translation: 呃哼。如果不是我，你们连保护费都没机会交。

original: DLC03WQ03MeitnerPanic
translation: DLC03WQ03MeitnerPanic

original: Accident, huh? Why should I believe that?
translation: 意外，哼？我为什么要相信你？

original: DLC03WQ03MeitnerReact1
translation: DLC03WQ03MeitnerReact1

original: DLC03WQ03BeggarDies2
translation: DLC03WQ03BeggarDies2

original: DLC03WQ03BeggarDies1
translation: DLC03WQ03BeggarDies1

original: Everyone's dead, you stupid tin can!
translation: 所有人都死了，你这愚蠢罐头盒！

original: Hmmm. Suit yourself. Seems like a waste of time.
translation: 嗯…。随你的便。看起来只是浪费时间。

original: That seems admirable, but hardly necessary.
translation: 这似乎令人钦佩，但几乎没有必要。

original: DLC03BS3MargotDone
translation: DLC03BS3MargotDone

original: So what exactly did these unidentified things damage in here?
translation: 那么，这些不明物体到底破坏了什么？

original: DLC03BS3
translation: DLC03BS3

original: DLC03CitTalk4Neg
translation: DLC03CitTalk4Neg

original: DLC03CitTalk5
translation: DLC03CitTalk5

original: DLC03CitTalk4
translation: DLC03CitTalk4

original: DLC03CitTalk3
translation: DLC03CitTalk3

original: DLC03CitTalk2
translation: DLC03CitTalk2

original: DLC03CitTalk1
translation: DLC03CitTalk1

original: This has gone on too long. Time to die.
translation: 这一切都够了。准备受死吧。

original: I don't want to have to fight you.
translation: 我不想伤害你们。

original: If you don't stop, I'll have to make you stop. Forcibly if I have to.
translation: 如果你还要这么做，我会亲自让你停手。有必要的话我会动用武力。

original: Please, you're endangering innocent people who think your water is safe.
translation: 停手吧，你们正危害那些以为你们的水是安全的无辜平民。

original: You can't trick people into enlightenment. They have to accept it knowingly.
translation: 你不能把人骗来进行启发。他们应该由自己决定是否接受。

original: You need to stop contaminating the Aqua Pura for your holy water.
translation: 你不能再为了制造圣水而去污染纯净水了。

original: Isn't there some way I can convince you to stop?
translation: 我没法劝你停止这一切吗？

original: Your "holy water" is poisoned with radiation.
translation: 你们的"圣水"已被辐射毒化了。

original: I need to enter the monastery.
translation: 我要进你们的教堂。

original: Look, I'm not going to irradiate myself to get into your church.
translation: 听着，我不会为了进教堂而辐射自己的。

original: There. I've gotten a little irradiated. Can I go in now?
translation: 那么，我已经受了点辐射。现在我能进去吗？

original: Come on, I'm irradiated. Let me in now.
translation: 别这样，我已经受过辐射了。让我进去吧。

original: I am consumed with Atom's Light. Let me into your monastery.
translation: 我已充满了原子之光。让我进你们的教堂。

original: Okay, I tried asking nice. Let's do this the hard way!
translation: 好吧，我好声好气你不听。现在我要来硬的了！

original: You mean I have to be irradiated to be allowed inside?
translation: 你是说我要进去就要先受辐射？

original: I need to get into your monastery.
translation: 我要进你们的教堂。

translation: 好吧，够了。

translation: 扰频器是怎么工作的？

translation: 这到底是个什么东西？

original: I hear you can help me get into Old Olney.
translation: 我听说你能帮我进入老奥尔尼。

original: Old Olney is a dangerous place. Is there anything I could have to help me?
translation: 老奥尔尼是个危险的地方。有什么东西能帮到我的吗？

original: Enough cultist crap. This is sick.
translation: 别再跟我说这些邪教的疯话了。真变态。

original: You mean, you turn people into Ghouls?
translation: 你是说，你把人转化成了尸鬼？

original: Turning people into Ghouls? But that requires an amazing amount of radiation!
translation: 把人变成尸鬼？那可需要很高剂量的辐射！

translation: 你知不知道格里芬把真正的纯净水藏起来，然后卖有辐射的水？

original: Thought you'd like to know. Griffon's dead.
translation: 我猜你很想知道这个。格里芬死了。

translation: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01

original: I've got to ask... why am I going through the Presidential Metro alone?
translation: 我得问问……为什么我要独自通过总统地铁？

original: Sounds like I'm walking into the airbase blind.
translation: 听起来像是叫我盲目的冲进空军基地。

original: What can I expect to find in the Presidential Metro?
translation: 在总统地铁里有些什么？

original: What else can you tell me about the fight against the Enclave?
translation: 关于对抗英克雷的战斗，你还有什么能告诉我的吗？

original: Directions to the Presidential Metro would be helpful, Tristan.
translation: 你告诉我怎么去总统地铁就行了，特里斯坦。

original: I'll lend Officer Lepelletier a hand, but fees may be incurred.
translation: 我会去帮莱佩莱捷警官的，不过这是要收费的。

original: I'll see what assistance I can offer Rivet City security.
translation: 我过去看看我能帮铆钉城警卫做点什么。

original: I'm not a fan of Rivet City or risking my life. Good luck with all that.
translation: 我不是很喜欢铆钉城，我不会为此冒险。祝你好运。

original: As long as I get paid, you'll get your problem solved.
translation: 只要我收到了报酬，你的问题就会解决。

original: I'm not going to help you with Megaton. I've got better things to do.
translation: 兆吨镇的事我不会帮你。我有更重要的事要做。

original: I'll see what I can do about Megaton.
translation: 我会看看我能为兆吨镇做什么。

original: Let me ask you about something else.
translation: 我来问点其他事情吧。

original: What's your job down here?
translation: 你在这里做什么工作？

original: What does your name stand for?
translation: 你的名字代表什么？

original: I'd like to ask some questions about you.
translation: 我想问些关于你的问题。

original: What's the current status of the Presidential Metro?
translation: 总统地铁现在是什么状况？

original: What's going on with the purifier?
translation: 净水器怎么样了？

original: DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines
translation: DLC03BS1RothchildMapLines

original: All I know is that you need my help. Again.
translation: 我只知道你又要找我帮忙。

original: He said you'd give me the details.
translation: 他说你会告诉我细节。

original: I've learned a little bit, but was hoping you could tell me more.
translation: 我已经了解了一点，希望你能和我详细的讲讲。

original: DLC03StiggsWhyHelp
translation: DLC03StiggsWhyHelp

original: You're really helpful. Why should I trust you?
translation: 你突然这么帮助我。我为什么要信任你？

original: DLC03StiggsAboutSatelite
translation: DLC03StiggsAboutSatelite

original: How do I get to the Satellite Tower?
translation: 我怎么才能去到卫星发射塔？

original: DLC03StiggsRoboXPert
translation: DLC03StiggsRoboXPert

original: All of the robots are run off of a V-31 Mainframe?
translation: 所有的机器人都是由一台V-31的主机来控制的？

original: DLC03StiggsAboutPast
translation: DLC03StiggsAboutPast

original: DLC03StiggsAboutDefenses
translation: DLC03StiggsAboutDefenses

original: What type of defenses are upstairs?
translation: 上面有什么样的布防？

original: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpMean
translation: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpMean

original: The only reason you're still alive is because I want information.
translation: 你活着的唯一原因就是我还要点情报。

original: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpFriendly
translation: DLC03StiggsInfoPumpFriendly

original: Likewise. I was wondering if you could answer a few questions.
translation: 我也是。我想你能不能回答几个问题。

original: DLC03StiggsImNotGoingToHurtYou
translation: DLC03StiggsImNotGoingToHurtYou

original: I wasn't planning on it.
translation: 我可没打算动你。

original: DLC03StiggsYeahImGoingToHurtYou
translation: DLC03StiggsYeahImGoingToHurtYou

original: Yeah, I'm going to hurt you.
translation: 对，我要杀了你。

original: DLC03StiggsWhatAreYouDoing
translation: DLC03StiggsWhatAreYouDoing

original: What are you doing down here?
translation: 你在这干什么？

original: DLC03EMBDClawUnresponsive
translation: DLC03EMBDClawUnresponsive

original: DLC03EMBReleaseDClaw
translation: DLC03EMBReleaseDClaw

original: DLC03BS3MargotHello
translation: DLC03BS3MargotHello

original: Is there anything else I can do to help the Brotherhood?
translation: 我还能帮兄弟会什么忙吗？

original: So, what happens to the Brotherhood now?
translation: 那么，兄弟会现在怎么样了？

original: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd02a
translation: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd02a

original: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01a
translation: DLC03BS3PilotTalkGoodEnd01a

original: I've got blood samples to turn in.
translation: 我带回了些血样。

original: How is Liberty Prime holding up?
translation: 自由先锋现在怎么样？

original: DLC03StiggsWhereMainframe
translation: DLC03StiggsWhereMainframe

original: So where exactly is the mainframe?
translation: 那么主机具体在什么位置？

original: DLC03AudioBoSOrders
translation: DLC03AudioBoSOrders

original: I'm not in the mood for a long story. Never mind.
translation: 我今天可不想听什么长篇故事。算了。

original: I'm interested. Continue...
translation: 我很感兴趣。继续……

original: That's all I was curious about.
translation: 知道这些就够了。

original: What's your take on Elder Lyons?
translation: 你觉得里昂斯长老如何？

original: You look pretty tired.
translation: 你看起来很累啊。

original: So what Order of Scribes are you part of?
translation: 你是在学士的哪个部门工作的？

original: So how'd you get stuck with this job?
translation: 工作上碰到了什么棘手的问题了？

original: Where's Doctor Li?
translation: 李博士去哪了？

original: Let's discuss some other matters.
translation: 来说点别的吧。

original: I was going to ask you something but I forgot what it was.
translation: 我忘了我要问你什么。

original: Is it hard bottling all that water? Or is it all done by machines?
translation: 把所有的水装瓶很困难？还是说让机器完成所有工序？

original: Ever think about letting people bring in empty bottles to fill up?
translation: 有没想过让大家带空瓶子来装水？

original: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraB
translation: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraB

original: How long do you think it'll take to purify the basin?
translation: 你觉得要多久才能彻底净化整个池子？

original: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraA
translation: DLC03WQAboutAquaPuraA

original: So do you know why they call it Aqua Pura?
translation: 你知道为什么要叫它纯净水吗？

original: How's the reconstruction of Liberty Prime going?
translation: 自由先锋重建的怎么样？

original: DLC03WQGriffonHintKarma
translation: DLC03WQGriffonHintKarma

original: I know you've got something set up. Don't worry, I won't tell your superiors.
translation: 我知道你正在偷偷的干些什么。别担心，我不会告诉你上司的。

original: I know you've got something set up. Don't worry, I won't tell your superiors.
translation: 我知道你正在偷偷的干些什么。别担心，我不会告诉你上司的。

original: What's next for the Pride?
translation: “骄傲”接下来要干什么？

original: So, have we totally wiped out the Enclave?
translation: 那么，我们彻底消灭英克雷了吗？

original: I found some Sensor Modules for you.
translation: 我给你拿了些传感器模块。

original: I have Cameras for you, Scribe Rothchild.
translation: 我给你带了相机，罗斯查德学士。

original: Okay, okay... I'm coming.
translation: 好的，好的……我来了。

original: Yes, ma'am!
translation: 是，长官！

original: Anything you say. We can talk back at the Citadel.
translation: 听你的。我们可以回大本营再说。

original: Actually, I completely forgot about you.
translation: 实际上，我都忘了你是谁了。

original: Not really. Your father said you'd pull through.
translation: 没有。你的父亲和我说过你已经康复了。

original: I'll say! You look much better.
translation: 当然了！你看起来好多了。

original: Thanks. That's all for now.
translation: 谢谢。先这样。

original: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ02GriffonExplains
translation: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ02GriffonExplains

original: DLC03BS1PrimeFollowerLines
translation: DLC03BS1PrimeFollowerLines

original: DLC03StiggsLeaveTopic
translation: DLC03StiggsLeaveTopic

original: I can't believe you made me drink that crap. I had no idea. You're so dead.
translation: 你竟敢让我喝这种垃圾。我都不知道是什么东西。你死定了。

original: Oh... I've made a huge mistake...
translation: 噢……我犯了大错……

original: Wait a minute... are you saying this "Holy Water" is irradiated Aqua Pura?
translation: 等一下……你是说这些"圣水"是辐射过的纯净水？

original: There must be something I can do to convince you.
translation: 我肯定能做什么来劝服你的。

original: I am the Prophet of Atom. Stop irradiating water.
translation: 吾就是原子先知。立刻停止污染这些纯水。

original: What makes you so sure you're right, anyway? Who are you to speak for Atom?
translation: 你为什么这么确定你是对的？你凭什么替原子说话？

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: Where's Doctor Li?
translation: 李博士在哪？

original: DLC03WQ03Sermon
translation: DLC03WQ03Sermon

original: You'll see the true power of Atom when I detonate that bomb in Megaton.
translation: 当我引爆兆吨镇的核弹之时，你们就会见到真正的原子之力了。

original: Fawkes can start the purifier.
translation: 福克斯可以启动净化器。

original: Charon can start the purifier.
translation: 卡戎可以启动净化器。

original: I'll have RL-3 start the purifier.
translation: 我会让RL-3启动净化器。

original: DLC03AudioHolotapeNN
translation: DLC03AudioHolotapeNN

original: Who does your hair? It looks rather similar to mine, doesn't it?
translation: 谁帮你做的头发？看上去和我的一模一样，不是吗？

original: Why are you down here?
translation: 你们为什么在这里？

original: If there are so many Deathclaws around, how'd you survive?
translation: 如果附近有那么多死亡爪的话，你们是怎么活下来的？

original: I'm not afraid of Deathclaws.
translation: 我可不怕死亡爪。

original: I'm looking for Olney Powerworks. You know where that is?
translation: 我正在找奥尔尼电力厂。你知道在那儿吗？

original: Oh, great. Ghouls. I hate ghouls.
translation: 哦，太棒了。尸鬼。我讨厌尸鬼。

original: Who are you? What are you doing in here?
translation: 你是谁？在这干嘛？

original: Full house today, Doc. What's wrong with everybody?
translation: 今天这里这么多人啊，医生。大家这是怎么了？

original: What's wrong with everybody? I didn't think Ghouls got sick.
translation: 大家这都是怎么了？我不认为尸鬼也会生病。

original: Something going around, Doc? The clinic seems pretty full today.
translation: 出了什么问题吗，医生？你的诊所今天有这么多人。

original: What's with all the patients? You seem busier than usual.
translation: 这些病人都怎么了？你看起来比平常要忙多了。

original: Doc, it's crowded in your clinic. Something going around I should worry about?
translation: 医生，你的诊所里到处都是人。发生什么事情了吗？

original: DLC03SarahAngry
translation: DLC03SarahAngry

original: You're going to help me, or I'm going to kill you.
translation: 你们必须帮助我，否则我就杀了你们。

original: You're never going to make it.
translation: 你不会成功的。

original: Can you help me get to Olney Powerworks?
translation: 你能帮我么去奥尔尼电力厂吗？

original: Officer Lepelletier said you'd be rewarding me...
translation: 莱佩莱捷警官说你会给我奖励……

original: DLC03RewardMegaton
translation: DLC03WQRewardMegaton

original: Megaton's destroyed. I suppose their water shipment isn't much of concern now.
translation: 兆吨镇已经炸没了。你再也不用担心给他们送水的问题了。

original: I've stopped the cult that was stealing Megaton's water.
translation: 我制止了偷兆吨镇水的邪教。

original: Take it Back!
translation: 失去的，夺回来！

original: Speak with Sarah Lyons for the mission briefing.
translation: 向莎拉·里昂斯了解任务的细节。

original: Prepare for battle, and then report to Sarah Lyons.
translation: 做好战斗准备之后向莎拉·里昂斯报到。

original: Follow Liberty Prime as he makes his way to the Purifier.
translation: 跟随自由先锋，杀出通往净化器的血路。

original: Reach the Project Purity Control Room.
translation: 进入净水工程的控制室。

original: Secure the Project Purity Control Room.
translation: 确保“净水工程”控制室的安全。

original: Activate Project Purity!
translation: 启动净水工程！

original: Follow Elder Lyons to the Citadel Lab.
translation: 跟随里昂斯长老前往大本营的实验室。

original: Cycle the airlock.
translation: 打开气闸门。

original: Tell your follower to start the purifer.
translation: 让你的同伴去启动净化器。

original: Project Impurity
translation: 不洁之水

original: Infect the Project Purity water supply... Or not.
translation: 使用病毒污染净水工程的供水系统……或者不这么做。

original: You have infected the Project Purity water supply.
translation: 你成功污染了净水工程的供水系统。

original: You have turned the FEV virus over to Elder Lyons.
translation: 你把FEV病毒交给了里昂斯长老。

original: The Power of the Atom
translation: 原子之力

original: Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb.
translation: 解除兆吨镇的原子弹。

original: Rig Megaton's atomic bomb to explode.
translation: 设法引爆兆吨镇的原子弹。

original: Report to Lucas Simms in Megaton.
translation: 向兆吨镇的卢卡斯·西姆斯报告。

original: Report to Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
translation: 向特佩尼大厦的伯克先生报告。

original: Activate the detonator at Tenpenny Tower.
translation: 在特佩尼大厦启动引爆器。

original: Receive reward from Mister Burke in Tenpenny Tower.
translation: 找住在特佩尼大厦里的伯克先生领赏。

original: Disarm Megaton's atomic bomb... or rig it to explode.
translation: 解除兆吨镇的原子弹……或者引爆它。

original: Report to Lucas Simms' son, Harden, in Megaton.
translation: 将成功解除核弹的消息告诉卢卡斯·西姆斯的儿子哈登。

original: [Optional] Ask Leo Stahl at the Brass Lantern about buying Mentats.
translation: [可选]在铜顶附近向利奥·斯塔尔购买曼他特。

original: [Optional] Meet Leo Stahl at the water treatment plant for Mentats .
translation: [可选]为曼他特到水处理场找利奥·斯塔尔。

original: [Optional] Loot Leo Stahl's stash at the water treatment plant for Mentats.
translation: [可选]找到利奥斯塔尔的藏在水处理厂的曼他特。

original: DLC03CreatorQuest
translation: DLC03CreatorQuest

original: Death From Above
translation: 天降死神

original: Speak with Scribe Rothchild.
translation: 和罗斯查德学士谈谈。

original: Assist Paladin Tristan during the assault.
translation: 在进攻期间协助圣骑士特里斯坦。

original: Retrieve data from the Satellite Relay.
translation: 从卫星中继站查找数据。

original: Deliver the data to Scribe Rothchild.
translation: 将数据交给罗斯查德学士。

original: Report to Elder Lyons.
translation: 向里昂斯长老汇报。

original: Meet Paladin Tristan at the Rockland Car Tunnel.
translation: 在洛克兰德汽车隧道同圣骑士特里斯坦会面。

original: Shock Value
translation: 轰雷掣电

original: Speak with Paladin Tristan.
translation: 和圣骑士特里斯坦谈谈。

original: Find the ruins of Olney Powerworks.
translation: 寻找奥尔尼电力厂的遗址。

original: Acquire a Tesla Coil.
translation: 获取特斯拉线圈。

original: Deliver the Tesla Coil to Paladin Tristan.
translation: 将特斯拉线圈交给圣骑士特里斯坦。

original: Report to Paladin Tristan for your next assignment.
translation: 向圣骑士特里斯坦汇报以获取你的下一个任务。

original: (Optional) Speak with Scribe Vallincourt in the Citadel Lab.
translation: (可选) 在大本营实验室同瓦林考特学士谈谈。

original: (Optional) Use Enclave-controlled Deathclaws to your advantage.
translation: (可选) 利用英克雷掌控的死亡爪为你而战。

original: DLC03Encounters
translation: DLC03Encounters

original: Who Dares Wins
translation: 勇者胜

original: Enter the Presidential Metro.
translation: 进入总统地铁。

original: Locate the Exit to Adams Airforce Base.
translation: 找到亚当斯空军基地的出口。

original: Retrieve your orders and equipment from the Resupply Crate.
translation: 从补给板条箱中取出你的命令和装备。

original: Enter the Enclave Mobile Platform.
translation: 进入英克雷移动平台。

original: Destroy the Enclave Mobile Platform with an Orbital Strike.
translation: 用卫星轨道炮摧毁英克雷移动平台。

original: Escape from the Enclave Mobile Platform.
translation: 撤离英克雷移动平台。

original: Board the Captured Vertibird.
translation: 登上虏获的飞鸟。

original: (Optional) Clear the security breach in the Presidential Metro.
translation: （可选）清理在总统地铁的安全漏洞。

original: Find the Access Terminal to lower the ramp on the Mobile Platform.
translation: 找到接入终端降下移动平台的坡道。

original: DLC03 non-quest
translation: DLC03 non-quest

original: DLC03 Citadel Conversations
translation: DLC03 Citadel Conversations

original: Audio Holotapes for DLC03
translation: Audio Holotapes for DLC03

original: [Move this into WQ03] Discover what's happened to Megaton's water shipment.
translation: [将此条移动到WQ03] 调查兆吨镇的水运输出了什么问题。

original: Protecting the Water Way
translation: 保护水路

original: Meet with Officers Davis and Lorin along the river north of Project Purity.
translation: 同戴维斯警官和洛林警官在净水工程北方的河边会面。

original: Discover who is ordering the attacks on the caravans.
translation: 找出针对旅队的袭击是受何人指使的。

original: Deal with Split Jack and his gang.
translation: 料理“撕裂”杰克及其帮众。

original: Report to Officer Lepelletier that the job is done.
translation: 向莱佩莱捷警官报告工作已完成。

original: Consult with Officer Lepelletier at Rivet City.
translation: 到铆钉城与莱佩莱捷警官商量。

original: Ask Bigsley for a reward for helping Officer Lepelletier at Rivet City.
translation: 帮助了铆钉城的莱佩莱捷警官，向比格斯利索要报酬。

original: Report to Officer Lepelletier that the job is done, OR extort her for "Protection" money.
translation: 向莱佩莱捷警官报告工作已完成，或者向她勒索“保护”费。

original: Collect caps from gang at Wilhelm's Wharf once a week.
translation: 每周向维尔海姆码头的帮派分子收取瓶盖。

original: The Amazing Aqua Cura!
translation: 神奇的沌净水！

original: Discover what Bigsley at Project Purity knows about Griffon's water supply.
translation: 调查“净水工程”的比格斯利对格里芬供水的了解。

original: Discover what Griffon at Underworld is doing with Aqua Pura.
translation: 调查“冥界”的格里芬在利用纯净水做些什么。

original: Discover the location and proof of Griffon's bottling operation.
translation: 找到格里芬灌装窝点的位置及证据。

original: Confront Griffon about the operation in the Museum Authority building.
translation: 到博物馆管理处大厦制止格里芬的行为。

original: Discover who is supplying Griffon with Aqua Pura.
translation: 调查是什么人在为格里芬提供纯净水。

original: Holy Water
translation: 圣水

original: Ask about holy water at the Monastery of Eternal Light.
translation: 到永恒之光修道院询问圣水的事。

original: Investigate the area around Megaton to learn about the water situation.
translation: 调查兆吨镇周围地区，以了解水情。

original: (Optional) Become irradiated to gain entrance to the Monastery.
translation: （可选）接受辐照以进入修道院。

original: Stop the Apostles of Eternal Light.
translation: 阻止永恒之光使徒。

original: Report back to Bigsley.
translation: 向比格斯利汇报。

original: Drink the Holy Water.
translation: 喝下圣水。

original: Speak with Brother Gerard.
translation: 同杰勒德修士谈话。

original: Gain entrance to the Monastery.
translation: 进入修道院。

translation: 英克雷基地背景任务

original: The Here and Now perk immediately grants an additional experience level, complete with all the advantages that brings.
translation: “马上升级”这个能力可以让你立刻升一级, 并完全享受升级之后带来的所有好处。

original: When you take the No Weakness perk, all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats that are less than 5 are instantly increased to 5.
translation: 选择“毫无破绽”能力, 你所有尚未达标的S.P.E.C.I.A.L.属性都会立刻提升至5。

original: With the Rad Absorption perk, your radiation level slowly decreases on its own over time.
translation: 拥有“辐射吸收”能力，你的辐射等级会随时间流逝缓慢下降。

original: You've figured out on your own how to build all the custom weapons! With the Warmonger perk, all custom weapon types become available to you without the schematics.
translation: 你独立研究出了所有自制武器的制作工艺! 拥有“战争贩子”能力, 无需设计图也能制造所有的自制武器。

original: You are such a Party Boy that you no longer suffer the withdrawal effect from alcohol addiction.
translation: 作为一个派对男孩，你已经不会再受到酒精上瘾的负面作用影响了。

original: You are such a Party Girl that you no longer suffer the withdrawal effect from alcohol addiction.
translation: 作为一个派对女孩，你已经不会再受到酒精上瘾的负面作用影响了。

original: Although you are still notified when you get Minor Radiation Poisoning, you do not suffer any ill effects from it.
translation: 尽管你受到次级辐射感染时仍会收到提示, 但你不再受到任何负面效果影响了。

original: With the Nerves of Steel perk, you regenerate Action Points much more quickly than you normally would.
translation: 拥有“钢铁意志”能力, 你的行动点数能更快恢复。

original: With the Puppies! perk, if Dogmeat dies, you'll be able to get a new canine companion from his litter of puppies. Just wait a bit, and you'll find your new furry friend waiting outside Vault 101.
translation: 拥有了“狗狗！”能力，如果狗肉死了，你就能从他的一窝小狗中得到一个新的狗伙伴。只需稍等片刻，你就会发现你的新朋友正在101号避难所外面等着你。

original: You sleep deeply no matter where you are. You get the Well Rested benefit of +10% XP for eight hours no matter what bed you sleep in.
translation: 不管在哪里，你都能睡得很熟。你获得额外10%的经验值，只需要睡足8小时，无论你是在哪张床上睡的。

original: Take the Almost Perfect perk, and all S.P.E.C.I.A.L. stats are instantly raised to 9.
translation: 当获得“几近完美”能力, 你所有尚未达标的S.P.E.C.I.A.L.属性都会立刻提升至9。

original: With the Nuclear Anomaly perk, whenever your Health is reduced to 20 or less, you will erupt into a devastating nuclear explosion. Note that any allies in the vicinity will also suffer the effects of the blast!
translation: 有了“核子异常”额外能力，每当你的生命值降至20或更低时，你就会爆发毁灭性的核爆炸。请注意，附近的任何盟友也会受到爆炸的影响！

original: When you choose the Devil's Highway perk, your Karma is instantly set to Very Evil.
translation: 当选择了“恶魔之路”额外能力，你的业会立即变为非常邪恶。

original: When you choose the Karmic Rebalance perk, your Karma is instantly set to Neutral.
translation: 当选择了“业力再平衡”额外能力，你的业会立即变为中立。

original: When you choose the Escalator to Heaven perk, your Karma is instantly set to Very Good.
translation: 选择“天堂捷径”能力, 你的善恶值将立刻变成非常善良。

original: You have unlocked the secret to creating Nuka-Cola Quantum. With this perk, every ten Nuka-Colas in your inventory is immediately converted into a Nuka-Cola Quantum.
translation: 你已解开了创造量子可乐的秘密。有了这项额外能力，你的库存中每有十瓶核子可乐，就会立即转化为一瓶量子可乐。

original: 2 WEEKS LATER GOES HERE
translation: 两周后再到这里来。

original: Turn off the Repulsion Field? (Science 80)\nSet a timed charge? (Explosives 50)\nSmash the Control Panel?
translation: 关闭斥力场？（科学 80）\n设置定时炸弹？（爆破 50）\n砸毁控制面板？

original: Turn on the Repulsion Field?\n(Science %.0f or higher required)
translation: 开启斥力场？\n(须要科技技能 %.0f 或更高)

original: Your repair skill allows you to disarm the Radiation Box.
translation: 目前的修理技能足以拆除辐射发生器。

original: Use the console in the front car to travel in the opposite direction.
translation: 使用前进方向车头的控制台以向反方向行驶。

original: A fuse is required to power the train.
translation: 需要一枚保险丝来恢复列车的动力。

original: This door can't be opened while the power is out.
translation: 电力中断时此门无法开启。

original: Officer Lepelletier is dead.
translation: 莱佩莱捷警官死了。

original: Griffon is dead.
translation: 格里芬死了。

original: Dogmeat's puppy has died.
translation: 狗肉的小狗已经死亡。

original: Dogmeat's puppy is waiting outside of Vault 101.
translation: 狗肉的小狗正在101避难所外面等你。

original: Broken Steel has been loaded. Your level cap has been raised to 30.
translation: 断钢已成功载入。你的等级上限升至30级。

original: Continued consumption of FEV-laced water will be fatal.
translation: 持续饮用含有FEV的水将是致命的。

original: Nothing to see here, outsider.
translation: 这没什么好看的，外来人。

original: Nothing to report.
translation: 没什么要报告的。

original: Keep moving, Wastelander.
translation: 不要停下来，废土客。

original: Move along, outsider.
translation: 一边去，外来人。

original: Everything's above board.
translation: 一切都光明磊落。

original: We're all clear here.
translation: 这里解决了。

original: We've got this area locked down.
translation: 我们已经封锁这一区域。

original: You can get all the water you want for free. The Brotherhood's giving it away at the Purifier. Hadn't you heard?
translation: 你可以免费弄到水。兄弟会在净化器那儿白送呢。你没听说吗？

original: Look, bud, this water's for Rivet City. Go get your own from the Purifier if you want some.
translation: 听着，哥们儿，这水是属于铆钉城如果你也想要谁的话可以自己去净化器那儿随便取。

original: Back off. I'm not looking for any trouble.
translation: 退后。我不想惹麻烦。

original: The purified water's killing all the mirelurks living in the Basin.
translation: 纯化水正在杀死池子中的泥沼蟹。

original: Lucky me, I get to pull out the floaters and roast them.
translation: 我真走运，我得把这些残骸弄上来都烤了。

original: You may want to stand back, unless you've got a strong stomach.
translation: 你最好靠后站，除非你能忍住不恶心。

original: I gotta finish burning these floaters before they foul up the water.
translation: 我得赶紧烧掉这些残骸免得它们污染水源。

original: Funny how the purified water is actually killing them.
translation: 真有趣，纯化水是怎么杀掉他们的。

original: I never realized how many of these things were living down there.
translation: 我从没意识到这里居然有这么多这种东西？

original: Hey, feel free to take a shot at any lurks you see in the Basin.
translation: 嗨，下次再看到池子里有蟹人的话，尽管开枪吧。

original: They're all dying -- don't like the clean water, I guess.
translation: 它们正濒临死亡 -- 我猜，它们不喜欢清洁的水。

original: Easier to just pop 'em in the head. Otherwise they die on the bottom and don't float up until they're good and ripe.
translation: 射它们的头会更容易些。否则它们会死水底，要多很久才会浮上来的。

original: Not the most exciting job I ever had, but you gotta admit, it beats pulling the floaters out of the Basin. Ha ha ha.
translation: 我这工作说不上有意思，但是你得承认，把漂浮物从池子的水里弄出来可真恶心啊。哈哈哈。

original: Let me know if you see any live ones.
translation: 如果你看到有活着的话就告诉我。

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要干嘛？

original: Can you believe these Brotherhood assholes? They won't give us enough water to last until the next shipment!
translation: 你能相信那些兄弟会的混蛋么？在下一批货之前他们不打算提供我们水了！

original: We're not going to let them leave with that water though. We need it.
translation: 我们不会让他们带走水的。我们需要它。

original: What are they going to do, anyway? Kill us for stealing some free water?
translation: 他们想怎么样？因为偷了点免费的水就杀了我们？

original: Whew! I didn't think they'd just open up on us like that. Trigger happy bastards!
translation: 嘿呦！我没想到他们会这样对我们开火。爱乱开枪的杂种！

original: Shit, if the Citadel hears about this... we gotta clean up this mess before word gets around...
translation: 该死，要是让大本营知道了……我们得在消息传开之前收拾这个烂摊子……

original: I'm kinda busy here, alright?
translation: 我现在有点忙，行行好可以吗？

original: Don't you realize by now, you'll get nothing from me, you damn dirty merc!
translation: 到现在你还不明白吗，从我这里你什么也得不到，你这肮脏的佣兵！

original: Wait a minute... who are you? Hey, help me out of here! These Talon apes nabbed me while I was scouting the place.
translation: 等等……你是谁？嘿，快救我出去！这群鹰爪的畜生在我侦察这片区域的时候抓住了我。

original: I could probably free myself in a few more minutes, but why don't you save me the trouble and just let me loose?
translation: 其实在给我一点时间的话我自己也能逃出去，但你为何不帮个忙，现在就给我松绑？

original: Thanks, friend. But I've still got work to do.
translation: 谢谢，朋友。但我还有工作要做。

original: Now that's what I call a good day's work.
translation: 这才是我说的大买卖。

original: Talon Company's been ambushing our water caravans. I guess they thought we wouldn't figure out who was doing it.
translation: 鹰爪公司持续地伏击我们的运水商队。我猜他们以为我们查不出是谁在捣鬼。

original: As soon as Paladin Jensen gets back from scouting the base, we're going to level the place. Kill every last one of those scumbag mercs.
translation: 一等詹森圣骑士侦查完基地回来，我们就踏平这里。把这些该死的佣兵都杀光。

original: Talon Company's going to be sorry they messed with the Brotherhood. Now what the hell is taking Jensen so long?
translation: 鹰爪公司将会对招惹兄弟会感到后悔的。不过说起来詹森怎么他妈的去了那么久？

original: Come on, it's gonna be fun.
translation: 来啊，一定会很有趣的。

original: I think there's still some more Talon boys hiding around here.
translation: 我想这儿仍然有很多鹰爪的小崽子藏在附近。

original: See if Talon Company messes with the Brotherhood again.
translation: 看看鹰爪公司还敢不敢再来招惹兄弟会。

original: This is what happens to people who fuck with the Brotherhood.
translation: 这就是跟兄弟会作对的下场。

original: Damn slavers! Just what we need, another pissed off gang of wasters gunning for our water.
translation: 该死的奴隶贩子！正好，又一伙讨厌的暴徒来抢水了。

original: We've taken over some of the water caravans from the Brotherhood. I thought we could handle it, but ... we'll be lucky to make it back alive.
translation: 我们从兄弟会那里接了几只运水商队。我想我们能应付，但是 ……能不能平安回来就要看运气了。

original: I just want to get back to Rivet City without getting my head blown off.
translation: 我只希望能够平平安安地回到铆钉城。

original: Are you going our way? We sure could use some extra firepower.
translation: 你跟我们同路么？多支枪总是好的。

original: I gotta find a less dangerous line of work, like Yao Guai wrangling.
translation: 我得找份不那么危险的工作，像是与妖怪争辩。

original: I'm going to kill Lepelletier if I ever get back to Rivet City alive. This is a damn suicide mission!
translation: 如果我还有命回铆钉城的话我一定要杀了莱佩莱捷。这任务简直是他妈的自杀！

original: We're all going to die. They all want to kill us. It's hopeless, you understand? Hopeless!
translation: 我们都会死的。他们全都想杀了我们。这根本毫无希望，你知道吗？毫无希望！

original: Why the hell did I ever sign up for caravan duty?
translation: 我他妈的是怎么想的签了那该死的运水合同的？

original: Sorry, we don't need whatever you're selling. This caravan is on a tight schedule.
translation: 对不起，我们不需要你卖的任何东西。这只商队的行程很紧凑。

original: We're running water caravans for the Brotherhood, hadn't you heard? Rivet City is bringing water to the Wasteland!
translation: 我们是替兄弟会运水的商队，你还没听说？铆钉城正给废土带去净水！

original: The water's not for sale. All spoken for already. Don't mess with us if you know what's good for you.
translation: 这水是非卖品。早就说过了。如果你识相点就不要惹我们。

original: I've got nothing to say to wastelander scum like you.
translation: 我跟你这种废土客没话可说。

original: Please pardon our dust; we are currently experiencing maintenance issues within the Presidential Metro system.
translation: 请原谅我们的灰尘；我们目前正在对总统地铁系统进行维护。

original: If you require event information or directions, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
translation: 如想获取事件信息或方位，请询问信息处官员。

original: If you have any questions regarding the Presidential Metro, please speak to an information kiosk officer.
translation: 如果您对总统地铁有任何疑问，请向信息亭工作人员咨询。

original: Move along please.
translation: 情走开。

original: Please note that the use of firearms within this facility is a direct violation of 17 federal laws. Have a good day.
translation: 请注意，在本设施内使用武力，将被视为违反第17好联邦法令。祝您愉快。

original: Please continue along. If you have any questions, seek an information kiosk officer at any one of the stations.
translation: 请通过。如有任何问题，请与站内信息处官员联系。

original: Interfering with a Presidential Metro Automated Unit is a crime. Please move along.
translation: 干扰总统地铁自动化单位是犯罪行为。清走开。

original: Have a good day, and thank you for riding the Presidential Metro.
translation: 欢迎乘坐总统地铁，祝您愉快。

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已关闭。祝您愉快。

original: Scanning potential intruder... Senate Identification detected. Unlocking access point and logging identity in mainframe.
translation: 扫描潜在入侵者中……议员身份确认。正解锁进入点并登陆身份至主机。

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天我能为您做些什么，议员？

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已不再可用。祝您愉快。

original: Welcome back, Senator. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来，议员先生。今天我能为你做些什么？

original: Welcome back. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来。今天我能为你做些什么？

original: America will never fall to Communist invasion.
translation: 美国不会被共党攻占的。

original: Death is a preferable alternative to Communism.
translation: 选择死亡也比选择共产主义更好。

original: Tactical assessment: Red Chinese victory... impossible.
translation: 作战评估: 中国红军胜利……不可能。

original: Freedom is the sovereign right of every American.
translation: 自由是每个美国人的权利。

original: Oh man, don't hurt me! I just work here!
translation: 噢老兄！别伤害我！我只是个在这儿干活的！

original: Oh, hey. You're back. Do you need anything else?
translation: 哦, 嗨。你回来了，你还需要什么吗？

original: What can I do for you?
translation: 我能为你做什么？

original: It's pretty busy down here right now, but I'll help if I can.
translation: 我现在非常忙，但我会尽力帮你的。

original: Did you need something?
translation: 你是不是需要些什么？

original: What do you need?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: Can I be of assistance?
translation: 我有什么能帮你的么？

original: If there's anything I can do to help, please just say so.
translation: 如果有什么我能帮到你的，请不要客气。

original: Did you need something?
translation: 你是不是需要些什么？

original: Good to see you.
translation: 很高兴见到你。

original: Things are as busy as ever. What do you need?
translation: 这儿总是很忙。你想要什么？

original: This really isn't the best time... Did you need something?
translation: 这真有点不是时候……你需要什么吗？

original: Ah yes, is there something you wished to discuss?
translation: 哦对了，你有什么想跟我商量吗？

original: Ha! I told those bastards you could do it!
translation: 哈！我告诉过那些混蛋你能做到的！

original: Oh, there were doubters inside the Citadel to be certain, but Lyons was behind you all the way and that was good enough for me.
translation: 哦，毫无疑问在大本营内仍有人对你抱有怀疑，但是里昂斯一直很支持你，而这对我来说已经足够。

original: I can't think of a better compliment but to simply say the Brotherhood would be almost nothing without you.
translation: 我实在不知道该如何表达我的感激之情， 我只能说如果没有你兄弟会将一事无成。

original: Thank you, from all of us.
translation: 我们所有人都要感谢你。

original: Something else on your mind?
translation: 还有什么话要说？

original: When I first saw you long ago in that alley in Chevy Chase, I thought you were just some trashy Wastelander. I'm glad I was wrong.
translation: 很久之前，当我第一次在彻维彻斯的小路上看到你时，我还以为你是个一文不值的废土客。但很高兴我错了。

original: My father thinks the world of you... and so do I. If things were different, maybe we could have had time to become friends...
translation: 我父亲很欣赏你……我也是。如果不是在这种环境下的话，也许我们能有时间交个朋友……

original: Anyway... I wish you the best of luck and I hope you stick around for a while. We need people like you to help us finish what we've started here!
translation: 不管怎么说啦……我还是希望你能平安无事，还有……我希望你能在这里多呆几天。我们需要你这样的人来帮助我们完成未尽的事业！

original: Hey there. What did you need?
translation: 嗨，你好。你需要点什么？

original: Well, I suppose we have you to thank for the sudden influx of equipment pouring in from the ruins you left behind at Adams Air Force Base.
translation: 嗯，我想我们应该感谢你，因为你突然带来了大量从亚当斯空军基地废墟中获取的装备。

original: These items will help keep us one step ahead of our enemies in the Wasteland and hopefully start my reconstruction effort.
translation: 这些物资能够帮助我们在废土中保持对敌人的优势，并有望启动我的重建工作。

original: Mark my words, Prime will walk again. It may take months or even years, but we'll get him back together.
translation: 记住我的话吧，先锋一定会重新站起来的。这可能需要数月甚至数年，但我们会让他重新站起来的。

original: If you're inclined to help us with that effort, just let me know.
translation: 如果你想要帮我们干这个，尽管说。

original: Yes? I'm quite busy, so please be brief.
translation: 有事么？我很忙，所以请长话短说。

original: You did it! You actually did it!
translation: 你做到了！你真的做到了！

original: Do you have any idea how famous you're gonna be? You're being inscribed in all of our records as, well... as a hero!
translation: 你知不知道你将会变得多有名吗？我们已将你作为一个英雄载入我们的史册！

original: Hey, if there's anything you ever need, I'm your gal!
translation: 嘿，如果你需要什么，尽管说！

original: Hey! What's up?
translation: 嘿！怎么了？

original: I'm sorry, but I'm busy, okay?
translation: 我很抱歉，但是我现在很忙，好吗？

original: What should I do? He asked for water, and I thought I was helping him, not killing him!
translation: 我该怎么办？他要水喝，我以为我是在帮他，而不是杀他！

original: I can't handle this. Just leave me alone.
translation: 这我管不了。请别来烦我。

original: Look, I didn't mean to kill him, okay?
translation: 听着，我没想杀了他，明白吗？

original: Walk in Atom's Holy Glow.
translation: 徜徉在原子的荣光下吧。

original: Weary traveler, welcome to the monastery of the Apostles of the Eternal Light.
translation: 疲惫的旅行者啊，欢迎来到永恒之光使徒修道院。

original: Oh, but you must be parched from your travels! Please, accept this gift: holy water, blessed by our order.
translation: 哦，旅途劳顿，你一定口渴了吧！请接受这份馈赠: 我主赐福的圣水。

original: We must drink deep of the Water of Light, so that it may sanctify our tongues, and render us purified for discourse!
translation: 我们应痛饮这圣光之水，以洗净我们的喉舌，让我们能够表达纯洁的思想！

original: Ah, I can see the glint of Atom's Light in your eyes! You have purified your tongue with the holy water, so now we may speak.
translation: 啊，我能在你眼中看到原子之光的闪烁！你已用圣水洗净了你的喉舌，现在我们可以谈话了。

original: How may this servant of the Eternal Light serve you?
translation: 我这个永恒之光的仆人能为你做些什么呢？

original: You must cleanse your tongue of unseemly speech by drinking deep of the holy water. Then we may speak.
translation: 你必须饮下圣水，洗净舌头上的污言秽语。然后我们才能谈话。

original: Cleanse your tongue with the holy water. For we must speak with seemly tongues when we make mention of Atom's Light.
translation: 用圣水洗净你的喉舌。因为在我们谈论原子之光的时候必须言辞得体。

original: May Atom light your path, traveler.
translation: 愿原子为你指引前路，旅行者。

original: Welcome to our monastery.
translation: 欢迎来到我们的修道院。

original: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for casual visitors, I'm afraid.
translation: 哦，天哪！我没想到会有朝圣者来我们的圣地！恐怕我们还没准备好接待临时访客呢。

original: You must have made quite an impression on Brother Gerard. He's a lovely boy, but rather strident. I hope he wasn't a bother.
translation: 我想你已经给杰勒德修士留下了深刻的印象。他蛮可爱的，就是太吵了。希望他没有打扰到你。

original: But where are my manners? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. What can I do for you, my dear?
translation: 我竟然忘了我的礼节？我是圣母居里三世，我负责领导永恒之光使徒。我能为你做些什么，亲爱的？

original: Oh, my! I wasn't expecting a pilgrim to our shrine! We're hardly prepared for visitors, I'm afraid.
translation: 哦，天哪！我真没想到会有朝圣者来到我们的圣地！恐怕我们还没准备好接待访客呢。

original: And you didn't come here with peaceful intentions, did you? Oh, poor Brother Gerard. He was rather too strident, but he deserved better than that.
translation: 而你并非本着平和至善意前来的，不是吗？哦，可怜的杰勒德修士啊。他确实太尖刻了，即便如此他也不该遭如此对待。

original: But that's no excuse for rudeness, now is it? I'm Mother Curie the Third, and I lead the Apostles of the Eternal Light. Why have you come to us?
translation: 但这并不能作为粗鲁的借口，不是吗？我是圣母居里三世，我领导着永恒之光使徒。你为什么来找我们？

original: My Lord. I can not bear to look upon your shining face... I am unworthy...
translation: 我的主啊。我简直无法直视你那光芒万丈的脸庞……我不配……

original: We will spread our word without this holy water. The Light of Atom need not be spread through deceit.
translation: 我们将不会再用这圣水来传诵我们的教义。原子之光不需要靠欺诈来传播。

original: Yes, my child?
translation: 什么事，我的孩子？

original: Do you have something you wish to say?
translation: 你有什么想要说的么？

original: Our veins flow with Atom's Eternal Glow.
translation: 我们的血液中流淌着原子那永恒的光芒。

original: Grrrr...
<sniffing>
Grrrrrloooow
translation: 咯……咯……（光辉）

original: <gurgle>
translation: <咯咯>

original: Arrrr-taaahm.
translation: 啊……特姆（原子）

original: Are you well, dear?
translation: 你还好吗，亲爱的？

original: The water she gave me... it... there's something... wrong...
translation: 她给我的水……里面……有点……不对…劲……

original: Arrrggghhhh!
translation: 啊呃呃呃！

original: We came to Megaton to preach of the Eternal Glow...
translation: 我们来到兆吨镇是为了宣讲原子的光辉……

original: I saw Atom's Holy Light. I TOUCHED Atom himself! I felt his warm embrace!
translation: 我看到了原子的圣光。我亲手触摸得到了原子！我感受到了它的温暖！

original: Mother Curie she... she changed... I changed, too, but I'm still myself. Poor Mother Curie... she saw the face of Atom and it drove her mad.
translation: 圣母居里她……她变了……我也变了，但我仍是我自己。可怜的圣母居里……她看到了原子的真实面目，这令他疯了。

original: I don't know what to do! I think I'll stay here; pray to Atom. Pray for his guidance, for he has made me of the Eternal. The undying. I am his now.
translation: 我不知道该怎么办！我认为我要呆在这; 向原子祈祷。祈求它的指引，因为是他让我获得了永恒。如今我已经是永恒而不朽的了。我现在完全属于他。

original: I have been created anew by Atom's transmuting fire.
translation: 我已被原子的转生之火重新塑造了。

original: I must stay here. Pray and think. Think and pray. It will come to me. What must be done. Soon Atom will reveal his plan to me. Yes. Yes. Yeeeees!
translation: 我必须留在这里。祈祷和沉思。沉思和祈祷。它终将来到我面前。此乃我必须完成的使命。不就原子就将向我揭示它的宏伟蓝图。是的。是的。是—的—！

original: Atom in my head. Atom in my heart. Atom is in all things. Atom is all things. Atom... Atom... Atom...
translation: 原子在我身。原子在我心。原子在万事万物中。原子即是一切。原子……原子……原子……

original: Any progress on the Megaton situation?
translation: 兆吨镇的情况有什么进展么？

original: Have you heard about that new cult? They took our water! Here, read this. It's one of their pamphlets.
translation: 你听说过那新兴的邪教么？他们拿走了我们的水！来，看看这个。这是他们的小册子。

original: I don't have your money yet. Once a week, remember?
translation: 我现在没钱给你。每周一次，记住了吗？

original: Come back in a few days.
translation: 过几天再来。

original: Oh, I hadn't seen you in so long. I thought you died. Um... I stopped setting aside money for you... um, here. Take this. It's all I have to spare.
translation: 噢，很久不见啊。我还以为你死啦。呃……所以我就没留你那份儿……嗯，给你。拿着这些。我只剩这些了。

original: Now get out of here before my customers take notice.
translation: 现在在我的顾客们发现之前快点离开吧。

original: You're really going to blackmail me? <sigh>
translation: 你真想敲诈我啊？<叹气>

original: Here. Take it. I'll see you next week. Now get out of here before my customers notice what's going on.
translation: 给你。拿着。下周再见。现在在我的顾客发现之前赶紧离开这里。

original: Is it that time already? Fine. Here's your money.
translation: 这么快就到日子了？好吧。这是你的钱。

original: Now get out of here. I'm trying to earn some money.
translation: 现在快离开吧。我正在拼命挣钱呢。

original: I believe our business is concluded, friend.
translation: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。

original: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, sir! Thank you for stopping by!
translation: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位先生，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！

original: I believe our business is concluded, friend.
translation: 我认为我们的买卖已经结束了，朋友。

original: See here folks: another happy customer. A great day to you, too, ma'am! Thank you for stopping by!
translation: 看看吧乡亲们: 又有一位顾客满意而归啦。这位美女，同样地，祝您愉快，！感谢您的光临！

original: Well, hello there Smoothskin! Step right up. Have you come to savor the great taste of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
translation: 哇哦，你好啊，光皮肤！上这儿来。请问你品尝过沌净水那美妙绝伦的滋味了吗？

original: Did you manage to scrounge up the 10 caps? It's a small price indeed for the Amazing Aqua Cura!
translation: 手头有10个瓶盖吗？对于神奇的沌净水来说这实在是太便宜了！

original: Welcome back! I trust you've changed your mind and have come for your very own bottle of the Amazing Aqua Cura?
translation: 欢迎回来！我就知道你改变主意啦，想给自己买上一瓶神奇的沌净水？

original: Ah, I hope there's nothing wrong with your Aqua Cura. Remember, all sales are final... um, now how can I help you, dear returning customer of mine?
translation: 啊，希望你的沌净水没什么问题。记住，一经售出概不退货……嗯，那么我能帮你什么忙吗，我亲爱的常客？

original: Welcome back. What can I do for you?
translation: 欢迎回来。我能为你做些什么？

original: He lied to us.
translation: 他对我撒了谎。

original: He got exactly what he deserved.
translation: 他绝对是罪有应得。

original: Can't sucker anyone else now, can he?
translation: 再也不能对任何人摇尾乞怜了，不是吗？

original: I believed his lies... but now he's dead.
translation: 我曾经相信过他的谎言……但现在他死了。

original: I can't believe it.
translation: 我真的无法相信。

original: I don't know what to say.
translation: 我不知道该说什么。

original: Little busy at the moment, smoothskin.
translation: 我现在有点忙，光皮肤的。

original: Shhh!
translation: 嘘！

original: They came out of nowhere. I need to get back to report to Lepelletier. She'll want to know what happened. Thanks for the help!
translation: 他们不知从哪里冒出来的。我得回去向莱佩莱捷报告。她会想知道发生了什么事。谢谢你的帮助！

original: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
translation: 我警告过你不要回来的。我不吃这套。

original: Quit wasting my time. If you're here to help with the caravan, great. Otherwise, get out of here before I have you arrested.
translation: 别再浪费我的时间了。如果你是来帮助商队的，那很好。否则，在我把你给抓起来之前滚蛋。

original: I'm not interested in playing games with you. So unless you're here to offer a hand: GO - A - WAY!
translation: 我没兴趣跟你玩。所以如果你不是来帮忙的: 给- 我 - 滚！
