original: Look buddy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
translation: 听着伙计。我是个女忙人。我没时间听你胡扯。我正忙着协调这里的军事行动 如果你不介意的话？

original: Look missy, I'm a very busy woman. I don't have time for your bullshit. I'm busy coordinating a military operation here. So if you don't mind?
translation: 听着小姐，我很忙。我没工夫听你那些废话。所以如果你不介意的话，我正忙着调节一次军事行动。

original: If you're here looking for water, I'm afraid I can't help you.
translation: 如果你是来这找水的，我恐怕帮不了你。

original: All the water is at Project Purity. If you want a hand out, head over to the Jefferson Memorial and ask for Scribe Bigsley.
translation: 所有的水都在净水工程那儿。如果你想得到帮助，去杰斐逊纪念馆找比格斯利学士。

original: Now, if you'll excuse me, I'm busy coordinating military operations.
translation: 现在，恕我失陪，我正忙着协调军事行动。

original: I have nothing to give you. Go speak with Bigsley at Project Purity if you need a reward.
translation: 我没有东西可给你。如果你想要奖赏去跟净水工程的比格斯利谈谈。

original: Well, did you take care of whoever's behind the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 嗯，你解决了袭击旅队的幕后黑手了吗？

original: Well, did you find out who's behind the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 那么，你查到到底是谁在幕后指使袭击商队了吗？

original: Shouldn't you be out there, dealing with the attacks on the caravans?
translation: 你现在是不是应该在外面，处理针对商队的袭击事件啊？

original: Damnit, I'm too pissed to talk now. Got to blow off some steam.
translation: 该死，我现在气得都说不出话来了。我得放松放松。

original: Damnit boy! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
translation: 该死的，小子！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。

original: Damnit girl! Like I told you, just one rule: "Do what the hell I say." We're a gang. We all wear Metal Armor. So put it on already.
translation: 该死的，小妞！我跟你说过，只有一条规矩 "我说什么，你就他妈的做什么。"我们是一个帮派。我们都穿金属装甲。所以赶紧给我把它穿上。

original: What is it? Take a seat and relax already. You're making me nervous.
translation: 怎么了？快坐下放松，你搞的我很紧张。

original: You're one of the new recruits, eh? And look at that. Already wearing the gang uniform.
translation: 你是个新兵，是吗？快看看那边那个。已经穿上了帮派的统一制服了。

original: You best know the pass phrase though, or you're dead.
translation: 你最好知道通行口令，否则你就死定了。

original: Who the hell are you?
translation: 见鬼，你是谁？

original: Killed the boss fair an' square. Good job kid. Normally that'd make you the new boss, but we're all tired of bosses.
translation: 光明正大地干掉了老大。干的好，孩子。按理说你现在是新老大了，但我们已经受够了老大什么的了。

original: But, we liked Split Jack's plan. So if you can get that bitch at Rivet City to buy into our "protection services" we'll split the take with ya.
translation: 但是，我们觉得“撕裂”杰克的计划不错。所以如果你能让铆钉城那个婊子继续购买我们的“安全服务”的话，我们就算你一份。

original: So we don't need ya to be our leader. But we will cut you in on the protection racket. IF you can get Lepelletier to sign on.
translation: 所以我们不需要你当我们的老大。但是如果你能让莱佩莱捷签合同的话，我们会算你一份。

original: We got nothing to talk about until you've gotten Lepelletier to give us the protection contract. Now, git!
translation: 在你从莱佩莱捷那儿给我们争取来安保合同之前，我们没什么好谈的。现在，滚吧白痴！

original: Another new recruit? Quit bothering me. Talk to the boss. Split Jack.
translation: 又是一个新兵？别来烦我。去跟老板说。他是撕裂杰克。

original: Get out of my face.
translation: 立刻从我眼前消失。

original: If you're looking for Davis and Lorin, they're already on their way north. Follow the River from Project Purity.
translation: 如果你在找戴维斯和洛林，他们已经在北上的路上了。从净水工程沿着河流走。

original: Got to hand it to you kid. That was a brave thing you did, risking your life to start the Purifier.
translation: 不得不佩服你，孩子。你冒着生命危险启动了净化器，真是勇敢无畏。

original: But, do you know you've made my life a living hell? I'm guessing not.
translation: 但你知道你把我的生活搞得一团糟吗？我猜你不知道。

original: The hero of the Wasteland probably has more important things to worry about.  Don't you?
translation: 看来我们的废土英雄还有更重要的事要担心。不是吗？

original: Can't say I blame you kid-o. I wouldn't have risked it either. That Sarah on the other hand, she's got a bleeding heart like her old man.
translation: 到不能说我是在埋怨你。换作是我我也不会冒险。但是莎拉就不同了，他跟他家老爷子一样是个软心肠。

original: Oh, and bravo for giving her that code to the Purifer. Since then, my life's been a living hell.
translation: 噢，还给了她净化器的密码，。从那之后，我的生活就乱了套了。

original: And I have YOU to thank for that.
translation: 而这一切都是拜你所赐。

original: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
translation: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。

original: Thanks to you and that little friend of yours cranking up the Purifier, my life's become a living hell.
translation: 多亏了你和你那小朋友启动了净化器啊，我的生活现在简直成了个地狱。

original: But the heroes of the Wasteland probably don't care about THAT.
translation: 但是咱们废土的大英雄好像不会在乎这些。

original: Did Lyons give you a little congratulatory speech? Then, you won't mind if I don't offer you one.
translation: 里昂斯对你宣读什么感谢致辞了吗？那么，如果我不那么做你不会介意吧。

original: Thanks to you helping get the Purifier up and running, my life's become a living hell.
translation: 多谢你帮助启动了Purifier，我的生活现在变得活像个地狱。

original: But you probably don't care about THAT.
translation: 但是你应该不会关心这等闲事吧。

original: Look, kid. I really don't have time for your games. If you're here to help, great. If not, then I really need you to find someone else to pester.
translation: 听着，孩子。我真的没空跟你玩。如果你是来这儿帮忙的，很好。如果不是，那我真的希望你另找个人去烦。

original: What?! I've got a bagillion things to deal with at the moment, and wasting my time with you is not one of them.
translation: 什么？！我还有一堆一堆的重要事情要处理呢，而跟你在这儿闲扯可不在此列。

original: Is there something else?
translation: 还有什么事吗？

original: There isn't someone else you could bother?
translation: 你就不可以去烦其他人吗？

original: What is it this time?
translation: 这次又是怎么了？

original: Yes?
translation: 怎么了？

original: Don't bother Bigsley. He's not having a very good day.
translation: 别去劳烦比格斯利了。他今天过得不怎么样。

original: <Sigh>
translation: <叹气>

original: If it's not one thing, it's another. Well, got to run.
translation: 如果不是这一件事，就是另一件事。总之，得走了。

original: This water delivery business is a complex affair.
translation: 这运水生意可是个复杂的买卖。

original: So much to do, so little time to do it.
translation: 事儿太多，时间又太少。

original: No use talking to me. No use talking to the boss either. Oh well. Guess you're out of luck.
translation: 跟我说没用。跟老板说也没用。好吧。看上去你运气不佳。

original: I'm so glad I got drafted to be part of Lyons' little Water Delivery Team. No really, I can't tell you what a wonderful opportunity this all is.
translation: 我非常“荣幸”能成为里昂斯的运水队伍的一员。不仅如此，我都没法跟你形容这是多么千载难逢的“大好机会”。

original: I'd stay away from the boss. He's in one of his moods again.
translation: 我得离老板远点。他看上去又不爽了。

original: Hey, good to see you! I heard you had a bit of a problem getting the purifier started... Sorry about that. We're looking into exactly what happened.
translation: 嘿，很高兴见到你！我听说你在启动净化器遇到了点麻烦……深表同情。我们正调查到底发生了什么事。

original: Anyway, it's great to see you on your feet again. We wouldn't be here now without you!
translation: 不管怎么说，看到你能康复可真好。如果不是你我们此刻就不会站在了里了！

original: If there's anything you need, just let me know.
translation: 如果有什么需要，尽管说。

original: Just can't stay away, can you?
translation: 你就离我远一点，行不行？

original: Well, I guess it's good you're not dead. And I guess I should say thanks for getting us running.
translation: 好吧，我想看到你没死我该高兴。而且我想我该谢谢你帮了我们大忙。

original: Look, I'm busy. Can we do this some other time?
translation: 听着，我现在很忙。我们能不能等会儿再管它？

original: Sorry, can't stop to chat.
translation: 对不起，实在没有时间停下来聊天。

original: Since Dr. Li left, we've all had so much more to do. Who knew she did so much?!
translation: 自从李博士走了以后，我们总是有太多工作要做。这之前谁意识到她如此不可或缺？！

original: I wish those Scribes would leave us alone. They just get in the way.
translation: 我希望那些学士们别来烦我们。他们一直在帮倒忙。

original: Bigsley's making this more complicated than it needs to be.
translation: 比格斯利把一切搞得越来越复杂了。

original: So much to do... so much to do...
translation: 太忙了……太忙了……

original: A yup. We'll get on outa here soon as we're done drinking up this free booze. Driving water is dangerous. Want to get liquored up first. Ahaha.
translation: 对头。等我们喝完了我们就上路。运水可是很危险的。上路之前怎么也得来个一醉方休啊。啊哈哈哈哈。

original: Can't beat free booze. I was gonna drive my Brahmin up that way anyway. That Rivet City chick's giving me an escort to boot!
translation: 谁能拒绝免费畅饮呢。反正我都要带着我的双头牛上路的。而且那个铆钉城的鸡崽子托我护送一批货！

original: Heard more than a few of these water caravans go missing.
translation: 听说有不少这样的运水商队都有去无回了。

original: Once we exhaust this supply of free beer, then we'll get going.
translation: 等我们喝完了这些啤酒，我们就走。

original: Hope those security guards know what they're doing. The last group to leave here seemed a little young to be guarding anything.
translation: 希望那些保安知道他们在做什么。最后要离开的那一批人年纪有点小，真的很难胜任护卫的。

original: Sit down. Grab a beer. It's free!
translation: 请坐。来瓶啤酒。免费的！

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 此进入点已不再可用。祝你愉快。

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 此进入点现已关闭。祝你愉快。

original: Any last minute questions?
translation: 还有什么问题吗？

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天有什么需要帮忙的吗，议员先生？

original: Scanning potential intruder... Senate Identification detected. Unlocking access point and logging identity in mainframe.
translation: 正在扫描潜在入侵者……议员身份确认。正进行进入点解锁，并将身份登入主机。

original: How may I assist you today, Senator?
translation: 今天需要什么帮助么，议员先生？

original: This access point is now locked. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点现已关闭。祝你愉快。

original: This access point is no longer accessible. Have a good day.
translation: 该进入点已不再可用。祝你愉快。

original: Welcome back, Senator. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来，议员先生。我今天能为你做点什么？

original: Welcome back. How may I assist you today?
translation: 欢迎回来。我今天能为你做点什么？

original: Warning, due to a major security breach, this system is on code red alert status. Prepare for security check.
translation: 警告，由于出现重大安全漏洞，本系统处于红色警报状态。准备接受安全检查。

original: Attempting to identify local access user... Identification failed.
translation: 正尝试识别本地访问用户……识别失败。

original: This access point is restricted only to authorized personnel. Please identify yourself.
translation: 本访问点仅限授权人员访问。请表明身份。

original: What the hell? The whole place... it's... it's gone!
translation: 这他妈的怎么回事？这儿整个地方……全……全完了！

original: It was you... you did this! You goddamn murderer! You've killed them all!
translation: 是你……是你干的！你这可恶的凶手！你把他们都杀了！

original: Kill this traitor! Kill him!
translation: 杀了这叛徒！杀了他！

original: When I first met you some time ago, I was leery of your motivations and even more concerned with your methods.
translation: 从我第一次见到你起，我就怀疑你的动机还有你的行事作风。

original: At the battle for Project Purity, you proved yourself... and any doubt that I had about you dissipated on that day.
translation: 在净水工程争夺战中，你证明了你自己……而我对你的所有怀疑都在那天烟消云散了。

original: Now, with the Enclave in ruins and with you to thank for it, I'm almost at a complete loss for words.
translation: 如今，英克雷已覆灭，我们也要感谢你为我们所作的一切。然而此刻我却不知道该说什么好。

original: I feel proud to call you one of our own, and I promise that what you've done here today will be recorded by our scribes as a historic moment.
translation: 把你当成我们中的一员我感到十分骄傲，而我向你保证你今天所做的一切将会被我们的学士们作为一件重大的历史时刻而记录下来。

original: On behalf of the Brotherhood of Steel and on behalf of the free people of this Wasteland, I thank you.
translation: 我代表钢铁兄弟会，代表生活在这片废土上的人民，感谢你。

original: Come on, soldier. Move like you've got a purpose and get aboard!
translation: 动作快，士兵们。雷厉风行，马上登机！

original: Move, move. Get on the Vertibird!
translation: 快，快。快上飞鸟！

original: Surprised to see me?
translation: 看到我很意外？

original: I hope you're ready for your next assignment.
translation: 我想你已经准备好接下一趟活了。

original: You found a Tesla Coil?
translation: 你找到特斯拉线圈了？

original: Excellent. I'll see to it that this reaches the scribes immediately.
translation: 好极了。我会确保它立即被送达学士那。

original: You've done good work, soldier.
translation: 你干得很好，士兵。

original: Are you ready for your next assignment? We don't have time to spare.
translation: 你准备好接受下一个任务了么？我们时间紧迫。

original: If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
translation: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。

original: Nice work back there. Let's hope the scribes can do something useful with the information you retrieved.
translation: 干得漂亮。希望学士们能用你取回的信息做些有用的事。

original: Unfortunately, we don't have time to sit around and wait for the analysis.
translation: 很遗憾，我们没时间坐等分析结果了。

original: Based on what I've seen of you so far, there's an assignment I believe you're well suited for.
translation: 基于目前我对你的了解，这有份我认为非常适合你的任务。

original: In the interest of time, we'll skip the congratulations and get to work.
translation: 时间关系，我们还是省掉庆祝继续工作吧。

original: You've gotten yourself through some pretty rough spots before, and I'm hoping you can do it again.
translation: 你已经完成了一系列艰巨的任务，我希望你能再帮一次忙。

original: I requested you specifically for this assignment. I think you're well suited for it, and I need someone I can count on.
translation: 我特别指定你来完成这个任务。我认为你是非常合适的人选，而我需要一个能靠得住的人。

original: If we're going to have any chance of taking down their vertibirds, we need a Tesla Coil. Report back immediately if you locate one.
translation: 若我们想要在对付飞鸟的时候取得优势，那我们就需要一个特斯拉线圈。如果你找到的话立刻向我报告。

original: Hey, talk to Wint, okay? I'm just following his lead.
translation: 嘿，去跟温特谈，行吗？我只是服从他的命令。

original: I'm not even supposed to be here! Just talk to Wint.
translation: 我压根就不该在这儿！去跟温特谈。

original: I just want to get out of here. You feel like chatting, you talk to Wint.
translation: 我只想离开这儿。你想聊天，找温特聊去。

original: What the...?
translation: 怎么……

original: How the hell'd you get in here, smoothskin?
translation: 你他妈的是怎么进来的，光皮肤的？

original: See you around, kid.
translation: 再会了，小子。

original: I hope the scrambler is useful for you. If not, I hope you can run very, very fast.
translation: 我希望这个扰频器能够起作用。否则的话，我希望你能跑得很快，很快。

original: I'm still very, very busy. Is this important, or can it wait?
translation: 我还是非常、非常忙。这事儿很重要吗，还能等等吗？

original: Hey, you're awake! All right! Paladin Tristan is just inside. He's waiting for you.
translation: 嗨，你醒了！太好了！特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。他在等你。

original: Head on in. Tristan is waiting for you.
translation: 快请进。特里斯坦正在等你。

original: I'm sorry, I'm very busy right now. Far too much to analyze. Perhaps one of the other Scribes could help you?
translation: 我很抱歉，我现在很忙。还有很多东西要分析。也许其他的学士可以帮助你？

original: Please, speak with Elder Lyons. I have enough to deal with right now.
translation: 对不起，有事请找里昂斯长老。我现在够忙的了。

original: Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
translation: 诶呀，诶呀。看看谁活过来了。

original: Some of us were starting to wonder if you and Sarah were going to pull through.
translation: 我们有些人开始怀疑，你和莎拉是否能挺过来。

original: Well, well. Look who's back amongst the living.
translation: 诶呀，诶呀。看看谁活过来了。

original: Didn't expect to see you. After dragging your ass back to the Citadel, I thought you might be comatose forever.
translation: 没想到会见到你。在把你拖回大本营后，我还以为你会永远昏迷不醒呢。

original: Kind of surprising that you managed to survive, but with all her training, Sarah didn't.
translation: 你能活下来有点出乎意料，但莎拉受过那么多训练，却没活下来。

original: Tell me you've got something, anything we can use.
translation: 你一定知道些什么，有什么我们可以用得上的。

original: Unless you've got something, get inside there and get me some information! We need to know what the hell they just pulled on us!
translation: 除非你还有什么有用的消息，不然回去给我挖些有用的信息出来！我们需要知道我们到底他妈的遇到什么鬼事儿了！

original: We need to find out what the hell just happened.
translation: 我们得搞清楚刚才到底发生了什么。

original: There's no time to talk - get your ass inside that base, and help the troops locate the source of their transmission. Now solider, NOW!
translation: 没时间多说了——麻溜进基地，帮助部队找到他们通讯源。现在，士兵。马上！

original: What the hell...
translation: 这他妈的……

original: I trust you've spoken with Rothchild? I hope he can make some headway with the data you recovered.
translation: 我相信你跟罗斯查德谈过？我希望他能从你取回的数据中获得些许进展。

original: With our primary weapon destroyed, we risk losing our momentum and jeopardizing the entire campaign.
translation: 随着我们主要武器被毁，我们冒着失去势头和危及整个战役的风险。

original: I must admit, I now wonder whether moving ahead with this operation was an error in judgment.
translation: 我必须承认，我现在怀疑继续这次行动是不是判断有误。

original: Paladin Tristan sent word that you'd be returning with something useful for us. Please, find Scribe Rothchild before you do anything else.
translation: 特里斯坦圣骑士说你会带回来对我们有利用价值的东西。请马上去和罗斯查德学士谈谈。

original: I'd hoped that you would be off assisting Paladin Tristan. What do you need?
translation: 我希望你最好去帮助下特里斯坦圣骑士。你需要什么？

original: If you haven't yet done so, please see Rothchild soon.
translation: 如果你还没去见罗斯查德，现在请快去。

original: Careful now, careful. Don't move too quickly. Everything's fine. You're safe... You're in the Citadel.
translation: 小心点，小心。动作别太快。一切都很好。你很安全……你在大本营里。

original: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
translation: 我都开始以为你可能再也醒不过来了，尽管有人保证不会这样。

original: I've been coming down here every day to see both you and my daughter. It's good that at least one of you has recovered.
translation: 我每天都会过来看你和我的女儿。还好你们中至少有一个恢复了。

original: Easy now, take it slow. Don't move too quickly. It's all right, you're in the Citadel now. Relax.
translation: 放轻松，慢点。别走得太快。一切都过去了，你现在已经在大本营了。放松。

original: I was starting to think you might never wake up, despite assurances to the contrary.
translation: 我都开始以为你可能再也醒不过来了，尽管有人保证不会这样。

original: It's good to see you on your feet again.
translation: 看到你能康复可真高兴。

original: Good to see you. We can use all the help we can get.
translation: 很高兴见到你。我们可以利用任何可能的援助。

original: Glad to see you're back on your feet.
translation: 很高兴看到你康复了。

original: Let's hope this goes as smoothly as the last few operations.
translation: 让我们祈祷这次的实验和以前的几次一样顺利吧。

original: Don't worry. Tristan's done a great job so far.
translation: 别担心。目前为止特里斯坦做得很好。

original: Okay, let's keep this tin can rolling. Fire support, people! Stay on it!
translation: 好的，让这铁家伙狂飙起来。火力支援，所有人！注意啦！

original: Keep your eyes on the robot! Take out anything it doesn't!
translation: 睁大眼睛关照下机器人！有什么它没打着的就帮它给清理掉！

original: Prime will do most of the heavy work. Just don't get in his way.
translation: 先锋 会顶在前面。别挡它的道就行了。

original: Let's hope whatever the hell that is, it's actually useful.
translation: 不管那是什么东西，但愿它能真正派上用场。

original: The Scribes need to see what you've got. Get back to the Citadel.
translation: 学士们得看看你搞到了什么。把它带回大本营去。

original: Get that data back to the Citadel now!
translation: 现在，赶紧带着那数据回大本营！

original: Don't interrupt my flow here. Just pay attention.
translation: 别在打乱我的节奏。你保持警惕就行了。

original: I just... I can't believe it. All those years of work. All of it, for what? One botched operation?
translation: 我只是……我无法相信。这么多年的努力。所有的一切，都是为了什么？一场搞砸了的行动？

original: I'm still waiting on the debriefing from Tristan, but I'm not sure it even matters. With Prime gone...
translation: 我还在等特里斯坦的汇报，但我都不知道还等什么。先锋都不在了……

original: I'm gonna burn every one of these devil-headed bastards to the ground for what they did to Liberty Prime!
translation: 我要把这帮邪恶的渣滓烧成灰烬，一个不留以报自由 先锋被毁之仇！

original: You just find something we can use. I'll take care of the rest.
translation: 你只需要找些我们能用的东西。剩下的我来解决。

original: They knew we were coming.... How did they know we were coming?
translation: 他们知道我们要来……他们怎么知道我们要来？

original: You see anything? There's got to be something in here we can take back to the Citadel.
translation: 你发现什么了吗？这儿肯定有什么东西值得我们带回大本营的。

original: We've got to find out what they just attacked us with. Keep your eyes peeled.
translation: 我们必须弄清楚他们刚刚是用什么攻击我们的。给我把眼睛睁大点了。

original: Watch yourself in here. Who knows what they're gonna throw at us next.
translation: 保持警惕。天知道他们还会用什么来对付我们。

original: Right in front of the map, if you please. I'd like you to get a good look at it.
translation: 就在地图的前面，如果你不介意的话，我想让你好好看看。

original: Well, it's good to see that you're on your feet again.
translation: 嗯，看到你又站起来了可真好。

original: I assume Lyons is immediately throwing you to the wolves?
translation: 我猜里昂斯是立刻把你往火坑里推？

original: Has he told you what's been going on while you've been resting?
translation: 他有没有告诉你，你休息期间都发生了些什么？

original: If there's anything else you'd like to know, I'll tell you what I can. Otherwise, Paladin Tristan will be waiting.
translation: 如果你还想了解其他情况，我会告诉你我知道的一切。没有的话，特里斯坦圣骑士正在等着你呢。

original: I'll alert him that you're on your way.
translation: 我会通知他你已经在路上了。

original: Hey, it's you!
translation: 嘿，是你！

original: Paladin Tristan is just inside. You should report to him right away; he's been waiting for you.
translation: 特里斯坦圣骑士就在里面。你最好现在就向他报告; 他正等着你呢。

original: If you're going to have him start the purifier, hurry up.
translation: 如果你想让他启动净水器，那就快点。

original: This better work...
translation: 他能干得更好...

original: <Cough.>
translation: <咳嗽。>

original: Aaaaggghhh.
translation: 啊啊啊啊。

original: It hurts... burns... inside... all over...
translation: 好痛……像火烧……在身体里……到处……

original: I can't... breathe... right... my chest... huuuuurts.
translation: 我不能……呼吸……在……胸口……痛……。

original: What's happening... to me. <Cough.>
translation: 我这是……怎么了。<咳嗽。>

original: Doc Barrows says I'm crazy, but I think it's that damn Aqua Cura making everybody sick. Myself, I ain't touching the stuff again.
translation: 巴罗斯医生说我疯了，但我觉得就是那该死的沌净水让大家都病了。我绝对不会再碰那玩意了。

original: You may want to clear out of Megaton if you can. Lots of folks in town are sick, and nobody knows what's causing it.
translation: 你最好离兆吨镇远点。镇上很多人都病了，没人知道是怎么回事。

original: Backstabbed us and sold us out, did ya?
translation: 陷害我们，把我们全都出卖了，是不是？

original: You're gonna pay for that.
translation: 你会付出代价的。

original: Backstabbed us and pocketed the money yourself, did ya?
translation: 陷害我们还把钱独吞了，是不是？

original: You're gonna pay for that.
translation: 你会付出代价的。

original: What? We thought you died or something. You haven't been around in so long... we divvied up your cut already.
translation: 什么？我们还以为你八成是死了呢。你很久没到这来了……我们早把你那份儿给分摊了。

original: Ah, sorry 'bout that. We'll start holding your cut for you again. But you got to come see us at least once a month. Or we'll assume your dead.
translation: 啊，对此我很抱歉。我们会重新替你存着你的那份。但是你必须至少每月来取一次。不然我们就会当是你已经挂了。

original: You're here for your cut?
translation: 你来这要你的那份？

original: Here ya go. Don't spend it all in one place.
translation: 给你，别一次花个精光了。

original: It ain't time to cut you in yet. We're still collecting the caps. Come back in a few days.
translation: 现在还不是拿你那份的时候。我们还在筹钱呢。过几天再来。

original: I warned you not to come around. I will not be extorted.
translation: 我警告过你不要再来了。我可不是个任人敲诈的软柿子。

original: You've helped me so much, it seems wrong to ask, but can you spare any more water?
translation: 你帮了我大忙，真难启齿，但你能多给我些水吗？

original: I'll never forget you. Thank you for your help.
translation: 我永远不会忘记你。谢谢你的帮助。

original: I hate to ask but... do you have any more water?
translation: 我讨厌索求，但……你能多给我些水吗？

original: You've saved my life. Thank you, stranger. I hate to ask you this, but times are hard...
translation: 你救了我的命。谢谢，陌生人，我讨厌向你索求，但时势很艰难……

original: Can you spare any more water?
translation: 你能多给我些水吗？

original: Get that airlock cycled, soldier, before we're all blown to kingdom come!
translation: 在我们被炸上天国之前，士兵，切换空气联锁阀。

original: So this is it? You just quit, give up on Uncle Sam and America? You make me puke.
translation: 所以就这样了？你就这么退出了，放弃了山姆大叔和美国？你真令我作呕。

original: This is where the hard decisions are made, soldier. Where history is written.
translation: 这是一个该做出艰难抉择的时刻，这一刻将载入史册，士兵。

original: If you don't cycle the airlock, I can't start the purifier.
translation: 你若不切换空气联锁阀我就无法启动净水器。

original: This is an unpleasant situation to find ourselves in.
translation: 我们的情形真令人不愉快。

original: I find your refusal to act to be in conflict with my sense of self-preservation.
translation: 我觉得你拒绝采取行动和我的自我保护的感觉相冲突。

original: Hurry and cycle the airlock, so I can start the purifier!
translation: 我要把净水机打开了,你快点把空气阀关掉!

original: This is a dire predicament. What shall we do?
translation: 这是一个可怕的困境。我们该怎么做？

original: Don't you think someone should start the purifier, after coming all this way? Letting ourselves be blown up seems... Irrational.
translation: 都走到这一步，你不觉得该有个人去启动净水器？让我们被崩飞这.... 没什么道理。

original: I suppose this is goodbye, friend.
translation: 我想我们应该说再见了,朋友

original: This appears to be the point where we part ways.
translation: 看来我们在这点有些分歧。

original: You've got a job to do, soldier. No time for chit-chat!
translation: 干你的活去。没时间闲聊！

original: Well, so much for celebrating.
translation: 庆典结束了。

original: One of us is going to have to go in there and turn the damned thing on. And whoever does it isn't coming back out.
translation: 我们其中一人必须进去打开那该死的东西。无论是谁，必定有去无回。

original: Not exactly how I imagined going out, you know?
translation: 其实我可不是这么想的，你懂吗？

original: So, what should we do? Draw straws?
translation: 那，我们应该怎么办？抽签？

original: You're reporting to Sarah from here on out. Don't let her down.
translation: 从现在起你向莎拉报告，别让她失望。

original: The time for talk is over. Now, you must act. Go to the purifier. Make your father proud!
translation: 谈话时间结束。现在，你必须行动。去找净化器。让你父亲为你自豪！

original: For Elder Lyons!
translation: 为了里昂斯长老！

original: Good luck!
translation: 好运！

original: Project Purity is as good as ours!
translation: 净水工程已经是我们的了！

original: Welcome to the Citadel. Just remember -- you're a guest in our home. I expect you to behave yourself.
translation: 欢迎来到大本营。请记住 — 你是我们的客人。我希望你遵守规矩。

original: Glad to see you and that egghead Li made it here in one piece. I heard what happened at that purifier. Hell of thing.
translation: 很高兴见到你和书呆子李安全到了这。我听说净化器那的事。真是见鬼。

original: Hrm? Yes, hello. I've heard about you. We don't get many strangers here in the Citadel, especially those who walk about unescorted.
translation: 嗯？啊，你好。我听说过你。我们大本营没什么陌生人，特别是那些没护卫到处走的人。

original: I am Scribe Bowditch. If you require something, simply ask.
translation: 我是鲍蒂奇学士。如果你要什么，就请说。

original: "Knowledge is the beginning of wisdom, not the end of it." One of my favorite quotes. Its author has been lost to us.
translation: “知识是智慧的开始，而不是结束。”这是我最喜欢的引述。其作者已经无从考证。

original: How can I help you, outsider?
translation: 我能帮你什么，外来人？

original: What do you want, outsider?
translation: 你要什么，外来人？

original: Uhm... I don't think that Paladin Gunny would be very happy if he saw me talking to an outsider.
translation: 嗯……我不觉得圣骑士甘尼看见我和外来人说话会很高兴。

original: Stand down, civilian.
translation: 退下，平民。

original: Name's Paladin Bael. What do you need, civilian?
translation: 我是圣骑士贝尔。你需要什么，平民？

original: What aid can I offer you, outsider?
translation: 我能提供你什么帮助，外来人？

original: Shh. Not too loud. I don't really want people to know that we're doin' business.
translation: 嘘。轻点。我可不想让别人知道我们在做交易。

original: There rest of these guys around here might not want anything to do with you, but I got no problem with you... well, not with your caps at least.
translation: 其余那些家伙或许不愿和你打交道，但我可不介意……至少不介意和你的钱打交道。

original: Hey, good to see you again. What do you need?
translation: 嗨，很高兴见到你！需要些什么？

original: I'm not in the mood for you, asshole.
translation: 没心情搭理你，你这混蛋！

original: Pardon the mess.
translation: 乱七八糟的，请原谅。

original: I really need to clean this place up.
translation: 我真该把这地方打扫一下了。

original: Damn. I hope I can find that again.
translation: 该死。但愿我能再找到它。

original: Woops.
translation: 哇哦。

original: What?
translation: 干嘛？

original: You got a problem?
translation: 你有问题？

original: What are you looking at?
translation: 你在看什么？

original: Stay away from me! I don't want whatever you smoothskins are infecting us with!
translation: 离我远点！我不想被你们光皮肤给传染了！

original: The one advantage of being a Ghoul was never getting sick. I guess they've taken that away from us too.
translation: 作为尸鬼的一个好处就是从来不会生病。就连这点好处他们也要从我们身上剥夺走。

original: Have you seen the Chop Shop? Full of sick Ghouls... I wonder who's next?
translation: 你看见排骨店了吗？全都是生病的尸鬼……我不知道下一个会是谁？

original: No offense, but I don't want whatever's going around. So just keep your distance, okay?
translation: 没有冒犯你的意思，但是我不想让任何人靠近。所以请保持你的距离,好吗？

original: I thought things were finally starting to get better around here. But now everyone's getting sick and nobody knows what to do.
translation: 我还以为情况终于好转了呢。但是现在每个人都病了而没有人知道该怎么办。

original: You better stay away from me. I think I may be sick. It's like a... burning in my guts. Damn, it hurts!
translation: 你最好离我远点。我想我病了。就好像……我的内脏在着火。该死，真疼！

original: If you feel you're getting sick, quarantine yourself at the clinic, immediately.
translation: 如果你觉得你病了，立刻到门诊来进行隔离，一刻也不要耽搁。

original: Let's do this just like the last time. Nobody needs to try and prove anything out there.
translation: 让我们就像上次那样做吧。没必要尝试或证明什么。

original: Everybody goes home after this, you understand? I don't want any screw-ups out there.
translation: 这之后大家都回家去，你明白了吗？我不想有什么麻烦。

original: Everything should be in place by now. Even if they know we're coming, it won't matter.
translation: 这会儿一切都应该就位了。就算他们知道我们要来了，也没关系。

original: It's good to see you again.
translation: 再见到你真是太好了。

original: Brother...
translation: 兄弟……

original: Hey, have you got a second?
translation: 嘿，有时间吗？

original: So, uhh...
translation: 那么，嗯……

original: Listen, I've got a question.
translation: 听着，我有个问题。

original: Can I talk to you for a moment?
translation: 能和你聊两句吗？

original: Scribe Rothchild is going to need an update on your progress. Have you sent a report recently?
translation: 罗斯查德学士想要知道你的工作进度。你最近发过报告了么？

original: I was wondering when you'd show up.
translation: 我刚才还在想你什么时候才能出现呢。

original: Just when I thought I had a moment to think.
translation: 就在我以为我能静静的呆会儿想想问题的时候。

original: This better be good.
translation: 这最好行的通。

original: What now?
translation: 现在呢？

original: Hello.
translation: 你好。

original: Hi.
translation: 嗨。

original: Hail.
translation: 致敬。

original: Ahem.
translation: 呃哼。

original: Whew. Long day.
translation: 呼。漫长的一天。

original: The boss is in one of his moods again.
translation: 老大又闹情绪了。

original: Think I caught the boss napping at his desk again.
translation: 我猜是我又碰到老大在桌上打盹了。

original: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand boy.
translation: 你知道，我加入兄弟会可不是为了当跑腿儿的。

original: You know, I didn't sign up with the Brotherhood to be an errand girl.
translation: 你知道，我加入兄弟会可不是为了当跑腿儿的。

original: Gah! One more day of this and I'm gonna eat a bullet.
translation: 嘎！再这样一天，我就要吃子弹了。

original: Has Lyons forgotten about the war with the Enclave? What the hell are we doing here, really? We have better things to do.
translation: 里昂斯是不是忘了和英克雷的战争了？说真的，我们他妈的到底在这儿干什么？我们有更好的事要做。

original: I'm not 100% sure it's safe to go in there.
translation: 我都不是100%确定进去里面是否安全。

original: You know, these chairs aren't very comfortable.
translation: 你知道，这些椅子不是很舒服。

original: Bigsley could really cut us some slack.
translation: 比格斯利真的可以放我们一马了。

original: The mercenary caravan has returned. They ran into some trouble - Sir? Scribe Bigsley? Is everything alright, sir?
translation: 雇佣旅队回来了。他们遇到麻烦了- 长官？比格斯利学士？没事吧，长官？

original: Sir. Some messages arrived for you.
translation: 长官。有你的消息。

original: I just came back from the Citadel.
translation: 我刚从大本营回来。

original: Scribe Bigsley? I've finished the corrections to the map.
translation: 比格斯利学士？我完成了地图的修正。

original: Sir, the "lab coats" report a delay in the next batch of water.
translation: 长官，“白大褂”报告说下一批次的水要推迟了。

original: One of the scientists fell off some scaffolding and broke an arm.
translation: 一名科研人员从脚手架摔了下来，断了只胳膊。

original: The caravan never returned, sir.
translation: 旅队再也没回来，长官。

original: A caravan's returned.
translation: 一支旅队回来了。

original: Important messages for you, sir.
translation: 长官，有你的重要信息。

original: Sir. The next shipment of water is buttoned up and ready to go.
translation: 长官。下一批次的水已经装好可以出发了。

original: Sir?
translation: 长官？

original: What the hell are we doing here, really? We have better things to do.
translation: 说真的，我们他妈的到底在这儿干什么？我们有更好的事要做。

original: Great. Another water beggar.
translation: 得了，又一个讨水乞丐。

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: Get outa my face.
translation: 从我眼前消失。

original: What are you looking at?
translation: 你在看什么？

original: Step right up!
translation: 都走近点！

original: The Amazing Aqua Cura!
translation: 神奇的沌净水！

original: Water...
Atom light your path, friend.
translation: 原子照亮前路，朋友。

original: May the Light be your beacon.
translation: 原此光指引你。

original: Rest in the Glow, friend.
translation: 沐浴那光辉之中吧，朋友。

original: Grrrr...
<sniffing>
Grrrrrloooow
translation: 咯……咯……（光辉）

original: <gurgle>
translation: <咯咯>

original: Arrrr-taaahm.
translation: 啊……特姆（原子）

original: Be at peace, dear.
translation: 保持平静，亲爱的。

original: Strive for the Eternal Light.
translation: 为了永恒之光。

original: May Atom be with you, always.
translation: 愿原子常伴你左右。

original: Nice work, soldier... nice work.
translation: 干的好，士兵……干的好。

original: What brings you back to the Citadel?
translation: 是什么让你回到大本营了？

original: You look like you've seen some travel. Stop and talk with me a moment.
translation: 看来你经历了不少事吗。来和我聊两句。

original: Well, I'll be a son-of-a-bitch. You actually pulled it off.
translation: 好吧，我快成混蛋了。你竟然把它推迟了。

original: Back, huh? Hope you've been Mutie killing.
translation: 什么，回去？我看你真该去见识见识Mutie杀手。

original: Hey, good to see you back.
translation: 嘿，很高兴再次见到你。

original: Well done! Well done indeed!
translation: 干得好！干的真不错！

original: Welcome back, my friend.
translation: 欢迎回来，我的朋友。

original: Ah, so nice to see you back at the Citadel.
translation: 啊，看到你再次光临大本营可真好。

original: You did it! You did it!
translation: 你成功了！你成功了！

original: So, what did you break this time?
translation: 那么，你这会又弄坏什么了？

original: You're back!
translation: 你回来了！

original: I have need of you. Speak to me when you have a moment.
translation: 我想找你帮个忙。有空的时候来找我。

original: Ah, it's you. I hope you've brought something useful.
translation: 啊，是你。希望你带回了有用的东西。

original: You're back? Did you find anything of use to us?
translation: 你回来了？你找到什么对我们有用的东西了么？

original: This is Rivet City water, bud. Now get out of my way.
translation: 这是铆钉城的水，小崽子。现在给我滚。

original: If you want some water, go get it from the Purifier yourself. This is ours now.
translation: 如果你想要点水，自己去净化器那儿弄去。这些是我们的了。

original: It's not for sale. Every drop is for Rivet City residents only.
translation: 这水是非卖品。每一滴都只属于铆钉城居民。

original: Move it, bud. Can't you see I'm busy?
translation: 滚蛋，小崽子。没看见我很忙吗？

original: I hate to complain about free water, but the Brotherhood are being damn stingy with it.
translation: 我不喜欢整天挑免费水的刺儿，但是兄弟会越来越抠门了。

original: I don't know why they don't just build a pipeline. Schlepping bottles of water back and forth is the worst kind of stupid.
translation: 我真搞不明白为什么他们不直接建根水管呢。装在瓶子里一车一车地运来运去简直是我见过的最蠢的主意了。

original: Stand back, unless you want mirelurk crud all over your boots.
translation: 退后，除非你想被蟹人的渣滓弄得你满脚都是。

original: Just my luck to pull mirelurk duty three days in a row...
translation: 只是我幸运的连续三天负责这蟹人的工作了……

original: Shh. If you spook the lurks I'll never get out of here.
translation: 嘘。如果你惊吓了蟹人，那我就再也出不去了。

original: The lurks get real shy when they're sick. You gotta wait for 'em to poke their noses up.
translation: 蟹人生病的时候会非常的胆小。你得等他们浮出水面。

original: Dammit! If I could just twist my wrists a little more...
translation: 该死！只要能再转一下手腕……

original: Almost got it... damn it!
translation: 就差一点……该死！

original: I don't know what the Council was thinking. The Brotherhood should be delivering this water.
translation: 我不知道委员会怎么想的。兄弟会应该负责运水。

original: We're getting our asses kicked out here. I don't know why we have to do the Brotherhood's scut work.
translation: 我们在这儿简直是自找苦吃。我真想不明白为什么要我们来做兄弟会的倒霉工作。

original: This is a damn suicide mission...
translation: 这任务简直就是他妈的自杀……

original: What's that? Don't you see it -- right over there!
translation: 那是什么？你没看见么 -- 就在那儿！

original: Did you hear that? Dammit, they're everywhere!
translation: 你听见了么？该死，它们到处都是！

original: Rivet City is providing water to the Wasteland. Spread the word.
translation: 铆钉城 现正向整个废土提供水源。放话出去。

original: Anybody messes with this caravan, gets the business end of my gun. Got it?
translation: 有谁胆敢惹这只商队，我这把枪就是他最后的归宿。听到了吗？

original: We don't want any trouble.
translation: 我们不想惹麻烦。

original: Brother...
translation: 兄弟……

original: I've been meaning to ask you...
translation: 我一直想问你……

original: Got a second?
translation: 有空吗？

original: So...
translation: 那么……

original: Hey, let me ask you something.
translation: 嗨，让我问你些问题。

original: Outsiders in the Citadel. Such a pleasure...
translation: 大本营里的外来人。幸会……

original: Rothchild, a word please.
translation: 罗斯查德，借一步说话。

original: If you have a moment, Scribe Rothchild...
translation: 如果你有时间，罗斯查德学士……

original: I saw that you completed your tests. What results are you seeing?
translation: 我看见你完成你的测试了。你期待得几分？

original: Scribe Rothchild wants a report on your tests. Have your results posted?
translation: 罗斯查德学士想要你的测试报告。你的结果出来了吗？

original: Switches are showing green. Ambulatory systems look good.
translation: 开关显示绿色。流动系统看上去正常。

original: The weapons systems are showing red on startup. We'll have to spend the rest of the day scrubbing the system before we can try again.
translation: 武器系统启动显示为红色。在我们再次尝试之前，我们必须把剩余的时间都花在清理系统上。

original: There's been a shutdown in the port shoulder systems -- looks like the gyros are locked up again. It'll take a few hours to clean it out.
translation: 舱门轴臂系统关闭了 — 看上去像是仪器又被锁住了。看来需要几个小时来清除故障。

original: I made a little bit of progress with Prime's locomotion capacitor, but now his IFF system is, um... unpredictable.
translation: 我在质数普莱姆的运动电容方面略有建树，但是他的敌我识别系统，嗯……不可预知啊。

original: Please be careful. I would hate to lose you again.
translation: 请小心点。我可受不了再一次失去你了。

original: Get that data!
translation: 找到那些数据！

original: Watch yourself.
translation: 看好你自己。

original: Be careful.
translation: 小心。

original: I'll be waiting for that Tesla coil, if you can find one.
translation: 我会等着那特斯拉线圈，如果你真能找到一个的话。

original: Good luck, and please be careful.
translation: 祝你好运，路上小心。

original: Logging out. Have a good day.
translation: 退出登陆。祝你愉快。

original: This is it... let's make this one count.
translation: 就是它……让我们把这个也算上。

original: We're all with you. Stay safe.
translation: 我们与你同在。注意安全。

original: Good luck.
translation: 祝你好运。

original: Understood.
translation: 明白。

original: Roger that.
translation: 知道了。

original: Yeah, I hear ya.
translation: 好吧，我知道。

original: Got it. Thanks.
translation: 懂了。谢谢。

original: Catch you around!
translation: 再见！

original: Good. I could use a moment to myself.
translation: 很好。我可以自己待一会了。

original: I won't stop you.
translation: 我不会阻止你的。

original: I think I might just close my eyes for a moment or two.
translation: 我想我现在该小睡一会。

original: If I'm lucky, I might be able to get some work done.
translation: 如果走运的话，我可能还能完成某个工作。

original: Have a nice day... or is it nighttime? Can't tell. Think they put me in an office without windows on purpose.
translation: 祝你今天愉快……还是晚上愉快？看不出来。总觉得他们是故意给我安排了一件没窗户的办公室的。

original: Okay. Hopefully that's the last distraction for awhile.
translation: 好报。希望这是这段时间里最后的烦心事。

original: You're telling ME that?
translation: 你在跟我说这个？

original: Tell me something I don't know.
translation: 说点我不知道的。

original: Tell me about it.
translation: 说来听听。

original: You're preaching to the choir.
translation: 你这是在给唱诗班布道呢。

original: <Sigh>
translation: <叹气>

original: I hope I get reassigned soon.
translation: 我希望能不久之后被重新分配。

original: Think I might just not show up tomorrow. I mean, what's the worst that can happen? I get fired?
translation: 我猜我明天不会再出现了。我的意思是，还有什么更糟糕的事情吗？我被开除？

original: I'm tired of this. I miss the Citadel.
translation: 我受够这些了。我想很怀念大本营。

original: No kidding.
translation: 不开玩笑。

original: Yeah, sure. Whatever.
translation: 是的，当然。随便了。

original: Good luck out there.
translation: 祝你平安。

original: All right. But sit down and shut up. All your bouncing around is making me nervous.
translation: 好吧。但是坐下然后老老实实把嘴闭上。你在这儿晃来晃去弄的我很是心烦。

original: Good. I was tired of your yapping.
translation: 好的。我已经受够了你的嚷嚷了。

original: Bye.
translation: 再见。

original: Come back before supplies run out!
translation: 记得再来啊，我们就快断货啦！

original: Remember: Aqua Cura, it's simply AMAZING!
translation: 记住: 沌净水，就是这么神奇！

original: I'm getting out of here.
translation: 我要走了。

original: May Atom's Light guide you.
translation: 愿原子的圣光指引你。

original: Thank you for choosing wisdom over violence.
translation: 感谢你选择了理智而非暴力。

original: May you know Eternal Light.
translation: 愿你能了解永恒之光。

original: Until we meet again. Do take care.
translation: 在我们下次见面之前。请保重。

original: Goodbye. Please come back if you find anything interesting.
translation: 再见。如果你找到什么有趣的东西请不要忘了回来找我。

original: Don't be a stranger around here... you better come back and visit the Citadel once in a while!
translation: 在这儿不要见外……你最好常回大本营来看看！

original: All right, we'll see you later. Keep your eyes peeled for Muties.
translation: 好吧，我想我们会再见面的。睁大眼睛当心Muties。

original: Always a pleasure to have you around...
translation: 我们随时恭候您的光临……

original: It was nice meeting you, but I have to get while the getting's good. Maybe I'll see you around.
translation: 见到你很高兴，但我想我还是在还有机会的时候赶紧逃吧。也许我会再见到你的。

original: Logging out. Have a good day.
translation: 正在退出登陆。祝你愉快。

original: Come on, boys! Let's get 'em!
translation: 上啊，伙计们！干掉他们！

original: <bark!>
<bark!>
I don't want to have to kill you, but I will!
translation: 我并不必杀你,但我会这么干的!

original: Had enough?
translation: 还不够吗？

original: Arrrgh!
No water for slavers, is that it?
translation: 奴隶贩子没水喝，不是吧？

original: You dumbfucks. You should've just given us the water.
translation: 你这贱货。你刚才就该给我们水。

original: If you won't give us the water, we'll just have to take it!
translation: 你要是不给我们水，那我们只能抢了！

original: Just hold still a minute, and I'll put you out of your misery...
translation: 就再忍一小会，我马上就让你从痛苦中解脱…

original: This one's still got a little life in it.
translation: 这家伙还差半口气。

original: Not quite dead yet, eh?
translation: 还没死透，唉？

original: Agh!
translation: 啊！

original: Ooof!
translation: 噢！

original: Ouch!
translation: 哎呦！

original: Help!
translation: 救命！

original: Save yourselves!
translation: 救救自己吧！

original: How dare you!
translation: 你好大的胆子！

original: That's not yours, now is it?
translation: 这不属于你，对不对？

original: Thief!
translation: 小偷！

original: Next time do try to be civil. Thank you.
translation: 下次拜托温柔点。谢谢。

original: What do you think you're doing?
translation: 你以为你在干嘛？

original: Thief!
translation: 小偷！

original: What are you doing?
translation: 你在干什么？

original: Stop it!
translation: 停手！

original: Murderer!
translation: 凶手！

original: Ahhhrgh!
translation: 啊啊啊！

original: Look out!
translation: 小心！

original: Need a little help over here!
translation: 这儿需要人帮个忙！

original: I got your free water right here! Ha ha ha ha!
translation: 我找到你的免费水啦！哈哈哈哈！

original: You guys are unbelievably stupid.
translation: 你的人真是蠢阿。

original: Aaauuuggghhhh...
translation: 啊啊啊…

original: This is our water now, asshole. Back off or else.
translation: 这水现在归我们了，混球，滚远点。

original: Aha!
translation: 啊哈！

original: There you are!
translation: 你在这儿啊！

original: What's that?
translation: 那是什么？

original: Must be imagining things... I really need a nap.
translation: 又眼花了…我真该打个盹了。

original: Guess I imagined that.
translation: 猜猜我在想啥。

original: Well, now that little distraction is over. Back to work.
translation: 好了，现在小小的娱乐活动结束了。回去工作。

original: Woops. That got out of hand quick. They shot first, right?
translation: 糟糕。那么快就一发不可收拾了。他们先动手的，对吧？

original: One more for the barbecue.
translation: 烧烤的新材料。

original: I'll find you eventually!
translation: 我终究会逮着你的！

original: Well, that's that.
translation: 好点，就是这。

original: There you are!
translation: 在这儿！

original: Nice try asshole. Come back in a week, you'll get your next cut of the take then.
translation: 干的不错混球。下礼拜再来拿你的分红。

original: Fluctuations in your vocal tones indicate your statements are fallacious.
translation: 你发音中的起伏表明你的陈述有所隐瞒。

original: Further attempts at deception will result in immediate response by security forces.
translation: 如若发现有任何进一步欺骗的企图，安保系统将立刻采取行动。

original: Repeating query: Please identify yourself.
translation: 重复询问：请表明身份。

original: If I did, I wouldn't tell you. I'm just doing what I'm told to do by Lyons. Even if I don't like doing it.
translation: 如果我做了，我是不会告诉你的。我只是在做里昂斯叫我做的。即使我不愿意这么做。

original: Absolutely not. Any more stupid questions?
translation: 完全不是，还有什么愚蠢的问题吗？

original: I'm the boss of this gang. We do what I say. Don't forget that.
translation: 别忘了，我是这个帮的老大。在这儿我说的算。

original: Oh I'm sorry! I'm fresh out of free samples. Try again tomorrow!
translation: 哦不好意思！免费样品已经送光了。明天再来吧！

original: You know kid, you really ought to have proof before you go around insulting people like that.
translation: 你知道吗，孩子，你真的应该先找到真凭实据再在这儿到处辱骂别人。

original: Now, if you don't mind, why don't you take your baseless accusations elsewhere. I have important business to conduct.
translation: 现在，如果你不介意的话，为什么不带着你那些毫无根据的罪名上别出去闹呢。我还有很重要的工作要做呢。

original: My business arrangements are private.
translation: 我的商业计划是保密的。

original: Are you kidding?
translation: 你是在开玩笑吗？

original: No way. Try again.
translation: 没门。有种再试试。

original: I'm afraid not. 20% seems more than fair to me.
translation: 我看恐怕不行。20%在我看来已经够多的了。

original: Your Light is strong, but only the truly Luminescent may enter our monastery. Please return when you are closer to Atom.
translation: 你的光芒很强，但只有真正的光芒才能进入我们的修道院。当你更接近原子时，请再回来。

original: You judge what you do not understand. By introducing them to Atom's Light, we are saving them from a life of misery.
translation: 你在对你不懂的事物妄加评判。通过将他们引领向原子之光，我们正将他们从苦难的人生中拯救出来。

original: My orders are to deliver the rest of this water to Big Town, and I'm damn well going to do it.
translation: 我的任务是把剩下的水送到大镇，而我正想动身呢

original: I don't think so. They're giving the water away -- why would they make trouble over us taking a little extra?
translation: 我不这么认为。他们正把水白送出去-- 为什么他们仅仅为了这么做就如此这般地找我们麻烦呢？

original: Hmmm...
translation: 嗯…

original: I'll find you.
translation: 我会抓到你的。

original: You're here somewhere.
translation: 你跑不了的。

original: Talk to Scribe Jameson. She is our keeper of the Scrolls. She will want to know what you have found.
translation: 和詹姆森学士谈谈。她是我们的卷轴保管人，她会想知道你找到了什么。

original: <aroo?>
<aroo?>
<aroo?>
<aroo?>
<bark!>
<bark!>
Your sense of humor sucks.
translation: 你的幽默感可真糟。

original: Fine, 2-1-6. I got it. Guess I'll see you around.
translation: 好的，2-1-6。我知道了。我想我能看到你在附近。

original: I wish that were true. Really, I do. But you heard Doctor Li. We have to do this right now, or who knows how bad it'll be.
translation: 我希望有，真的。不过你听到李博士说的了。我们必须立刻这么做，没人知道后果会多严重。

original: One of us has to go in there.
translation: 我们中的一个必须进去。

original: I'm not arguing, believe me.
translation: 我不是在讨论，相信我。

original: But one of us has to go in there now. We don't have time to stand around and talk about it. Who's it going to be?
translation: 不过我们中的一个必须立刻进去。我们没有时间站着讨论了。谁去做？

original: Here's the latest news. Unemployment is down, stocks are up, and the U.N. has just declared global peace forever! Now the real news. *Sigh*
translation: 最新消息。失业率下降，股市上涨，联合国刚刚宣布全球永久和平！现在才是真正的新闻。*叹气*

original: Everyone ready for the Capital Wasteland's latest news? Me neither, but it's that time again.
translation: 大家准备好听首都废土的最新新闻了吗？我还没有，但又到了这个时候。

original: What rhymes with "shoes" and often gives you the blues? That's right, it's time for the cashews! Okay, that doesn't really rhyme. How 'bout… news?
translation: 什么与“鞋子(shoes)”押韵，经常让你感到忧郁？没错，就是腰果(cashews)！好吧，这并不押韵。那......新闻(news)怎么样？

original: Let me ask you something, children. You hungry for some 200-year old Salisbury steak, or you hungry for some news? I'm guessing news. Here ya go.
translation: 孩子们，我问你们。你是想吃200年的索尔兹伯里肉饼，还是想听新闻？我猜是新闻。开始啰。

original: Don't lose hope, children. Don't ever lose hope! The kid from Vault 101, the Wasteland's one true Messiah, still walks among us! Just listen to this.
translation: 不要失去希望，孩子们。永远不要失去希望！101号避难所的孩子，废土唯一真正的救世主，还活在我们中间！听好了。

original: Ah, that kid from Vault 101. Only a true Mortal could get involved in so many adventures, make so many damn caps! Behold, the latest tribulation.
translation: 啊，那来自101号避难所的孩子。只有“真正凡人”才能参与如此多的冒险，拥有如此多的该死的瓶盖！看呐，最新磨难。

original: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, she may look like us, but she calls Hell home. She is legion, and her deeds are legend. Like this one.
translation: 魔王就在我们中间，孩子们。哦，她也许长得像我们，但她把地狱当家。她是一个军团，她的事迹是传奇。就像这个。

original: The Devil walks among us, children. Oh, he may look like us, but he calls Hell home. He is legion, and his deeds are legend. Like this one.
translation: 魔王就在我们中间，孩子们。哦，他也许长得像我们，但他把地狱当家。他是一个军团，他的事迹是传奇。就像这个。

original: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got her latest exploits.
translation: 孩子们，我们可能永远也到不了天堂，但至少我们有自己的尘世天使在我们中间行走。我带来了她的最新战绩。

original: We may never get to Heaven, children, but at least we've got our own Earthly Angel walking among us. And I've got his latest exploits.
translation: 孩子们，我们可能永远也到不了天堂，但至少我们有自己的尘世天使在我们中间行走。我带来了他的最新战绩。

original: Neither light, nor dark, not good nor bad, there's one who truly walks down the middle of life's road.  Here's an update on that Gray Stranger.
translation: 非明非暗，非好非坏，一个人真实走在人生道路的中。下面是“灰色陌客”的最新消息。

original: It's gotten to the point where that piece of shit from Vault 101 can't even be considered human. Am I right? Here's the latest on that Demon's Spawn.
translation: 已经到了101号避难所里的那坨屎，都不能算是人的地步了。我说的对吗？这是恶魔再生人的最新消息。

original: Only one person can bring a hint of sunshine to this dim and dreary Wasteland. Children, I bring you an update on… the Lightbringer.
translation: 只有一个人能给这昏暗沉闷的废土带来一丝阳光。孩子们，我为你们带来了……“光明使者”的最新消息。

original: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew she was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
translation: 现在大家都知道101号避难所的那个小伙是个自私的财迷，但谁知道她一直这么忙呢？听听这个。

original: By now everyone knows that the kid from Vault 101 is a no-good, selfish Moneygrubber, but who knew he was keeping so busy? Listen to this.
translation: 现在大家都知道101号避难所的那个小伙是个自私的财迷，但谁知道他一直这么忙呢？听听这个。

original: Think you'll rest when you're dead, children? Not if that refugee from Vault 101 has anything to say about it. Here's the latest on the Soultaker.
translation: 孩子们，你们以为死了就会安息吗？不会，如果那个来自101号避难所的流民有话要说，就不会了。这是关于“夺魂者”的最新消息。

original: Call her the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross her path. Here's a new update.
translation: 称她“宁静先驱”，101号避难所的那个孩子通常会纠正她所犯下的错误。这是最新消息。

original: Call him the Herald of Tranquility, that kid from Vault 101, usually righting any wrongs that cross his path. Here's a new update.
translation: 称他“宁静先驱”，101号避难所的那个孩子通常会纠正他所犯下的错误。这是最新消息。

original: Looks like ol' 101 has become quite the Person of Refinement, mostly by taking people's hard-earned caps in exchange for... anything. Take a listen.
translation: 看来老101已经成为一个精致之人了，主要通过拿别人的血汗钱来换取...任何东西。听听看。

original: If you've been wondering if that Instrument of Ruin from Vault 101 has been wreaking any new havoc, let me give you the latest scoop.
translation: 如果你一直在想，101号避难所的“毁灭工具”是否又造成了新的破坏，那就让我来告诉你最新消息。

original: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and she's been busy.
translation: 我们的废土可能是一团糟（因此得名），但有一个人是我们熟知的秩序象征，她一直很忙。

original: Our Wasteland might be a frigging' mess (hence the name), but there's one person we've come to know as a Symbol of Order, and he's been busy.
translation: 我们的废土可能是一团糟（因此得名），但有一个人是我们熟知的秩序象征，他一直很忙。

original: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? She's at it again.
translation: 如果你厌倦了无人问津，恐怕你来错地方了。还记得老101吗？冷漠典范？她又来了。

original: If you're tired of nobody giving a crap, I'm afraid you've come to the wrong place. Remember ol' 101? The very Model of Apathy? He's at it again.
translation: 如果你厌倦了无人问津，恐怕你来错地方了。还记得老101吗？冷漠典范？他又来了。

original: We all know the Capital Wasteland is an anarchist's wet dream, and a certain Agent of Chaos doesn't help matters much. Here's an update.
translation: 我们都知道，首都废土是无政府主义者的梦想之地，而某位“混乱特工”的出现并没有起到多大作用。以下是最新消息。

original: We may not have superheroes - those two wackos near Canterbury Commons don't count - but we do have our very own Champion of Justice. Listen up.
translation: 我们可能没有超级英雄--坎特伯雷社区附近的那两个疯子不算--但我们有自己的正义卫士。听好了。

original: It shouldn't surprise anyone that the Capital Wasteland's most notorious Hero for Hire is in the headlines once again.
translation: 首都废土上最臭名昭著的“雇佣英雄”再次成为头条，大家应该不会感到意外。

original: If you have trouble sleeping, maybe it's because that kid from Vault 101 has become the Stuff of Nightmares, and is out there, walking among us.
translation: 如果你失眠，也许是因为那个来自101号避难所的小伙变成了“噩梦之物”，就在那儿，游荡在我们中。

original: In today's vicious Yao Guai eat Yao Guai world, the exploits of a certain Friend of the People are usually cause for rejoicing.
translation: 在当今这个妖怪吃妖怪的险恶世界里，某位人民之友的功绩通常会引起人们的欢欣鼓舞。

original: Now you'd think that Loner from Vault 101 would stay out of the spotlight, but I guess some people just can't help themselves.
translation: 你可能觉得101号避难所的“小孤独”不会出现在聚光灯下，但我想有些人就是忍不住。

original: Now I know you're sick to death of hearing my horror stories, but what's a Three Dog to do when that Consort of Discord keeps causing so much mayhem?
translation: 我知道你们听了我的恐怖故事都快烦死了，但当那个“纷争配偶”不断制造混乱时，“三狗”该怎么办呢？

original: Fear not, my poor lost flock! For the Shepherd of Vault 101 has come to guide you to the promised land! Maybe. Listen to this.
translation: 不要害怕，我可怜的迷途羔羊！因为101号避难所的“牧羊人”来指引你们去应许之地了！也许吧。听听这个。

original: I've got new reports in on that wayward soul from Vault 101, the Capital Wasteland's infamous Egocentric. Check this out.
translation: 我收到了关于101号避难所那个落魄灵魂的新报告，就是那首都废土臭名昭著的“利己者”。看看这个。

original: If you've run into her, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, she's at it again. Take a listen.
translation: 如果你碰到过她，你就知道你不能相信101号避难所的那个卑鄙的欺骗者。现在，她又来了。听一下。

original: If you've run into him, you know you just can't trust that despicable little Deceiver from Vault 101. And now, he's at it again. Take a listen.
translation: 如果你碰到过他，你就知道你不能相信101号避难所的那个卑鄙的欺骗者。现在，他又来了。听一下。

original: Just when you thought there was no charity, no good, no decency left in this world, everyone's favorite Model of Selflessness surprises ya.
translation: 就在你以为这个世界已经没有慈善、善良和正派可言的时候，大家最喜欢的“无私典范”却给了你一个惊喜。

original: Sometimes, in this cold, crazy world, you just want to make a buck. Like that penny-pinching Profiteer from Vault 101. Here's the latest.
translation: 有时候，在这个冰冷疯狂的世界，你只是想赚点钱。就像101号避难所里那个吝啬的奸商。下面是最新消息。

original: You think you're sad now, children? Just wait till you hear the latest on the Capital Wasteland's very own Bringer of Sorrow.  Cue the crying.
translation: 孩子们，你们觉得自己现在很悲伤吗？那就等着听听首都废土的“悲伤使者”的最新消息吧。哭吧。

original: What's the matter, kids? Feeling down? Low on vim, vigor, and the simple will to live? What you need is the latest news on the Restorer of Faith!
translation: 怎么了，孩子们？情绪低落？缺乏活力、朝气和简单的生活意愿？你们需要的是关于“信仰恢复者”的最新消息！

original: So here's the question. How's that smooth-operating Soldier of Fortune from Vault 101 getting along these days? Business, it would seem, is booming…
translation: 那么问题来了。101号避难所的那个“财富战士”最近怎么样了？似乎生意兴隆......

original: So what's new with that master of disaster, that duke of destruction, that bad to the bone… Architect of Doom? Here's what.
translation: 那么，这位灾难大师、毁灭公爵、坏到骨子里的……“末日缔造者”有什么新消息呢？接下来就是。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity herself, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类希望”的最新消息，她就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on the Last, Best Hope of Humanity himself, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类希望”的最新消息，他就是来自101号避难所的那孩子。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Paradigm of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类典范”的最新消息，就是那个来自101号避难所的孩子。

original: This just in, my friends. Looks like we've got an update on that Scourge of Humanity, the kid from Vault 101.
translation: 各位朋友，刚刚收到的消息。看来我们有了“人类公敌”的最新消息，就是那个来自101号避难所的孩子。

original: <whine>
translation: <哀鸣声>

original: Fuck that. Do your own dirty work.
translation: 他妈的，做你的脏活就好。

original: I’m sorry, my companion, but no. We all have our own destinies, and yours culminates here. I would not rob you of that.
translation: 抱歉，我们各有自己的命运，今天是你的终点，我不想改变你的命运。

original: Soldier, you ought to be ashamed of yourself. This is your fight! You gotta finish what your daddy started! Stand strong and get your ass in there!
translation: 士兵，你应该为自己感到羞耻，这是你的战斗！你应该完成父亲未完的使命，坚强地爬起来战斗吧！

original: Honey, you are out of your mind if you think I'm going in there. Find yourself another guinea pig.
translation: 亲爱的，要是你认为我会去那的话你就真是疯了，你重新找个实验品吧。

original: My friend... It's been my pleasure accompanying you, but we both know this is your fight to finish. Stay strong, and honor your father's memory.
translation: 很乐意能与你为伴，但我们都知道这是你的战斗，继承你父亲的遗志坚强地战斗下去吧。

original: That chamber? Right there? With all the radiation? Man, no way. I'll end up dead. Or worse. I could be one of them Ghouls! Ain't gonna happen.
translation: 那房间？就在那儿？充满所有辐射？兄弟，没门。我会死掉的，或者是变成尸鬼！我是不会去的！

original: You and I both know that's not going to happen. I've saved your sorry ass enough. This one's all you.
translation: 我对你已经仁至义尽了，这次我不会帮你了。

original: <pant> <pant>
translation: <喘气><喘气>

original: <pant> <pant>
translation: <喘气><喘气>

original: <whimper>
translation: <呜咽>

original: <whimper>
translation: <呜咽>

original: <whine> <whine>
translation: <哀鸣声><哀鸣声>

original: <whine> <whine>
translation: <哀鸣声><哀鸣声>

original: <bark>
<bark>
<bark>
<bark>
My child, you seem to have learned more in your brief time than I have in twenty years!
translation: 我的孩子，你在短短的时间里学到的东西似乎比我二十年来学到的还要多！

original: More than anyone else, I dare say. Certainly enough to know they're the greatest threat the Capital Wasteland has ever faced.
translation: 我敢说没人知道得比我多。当然只要明白他们是首都废土所面对的最大的威胁就够了。

original: The Brotherhood of Steel has encountered the Enclave before, you see. Over thirty years ago, back in California.
translation: 你知道，时间倒退30年，在加利福尼亚，钢铁兄弟会就已经和英克雷打过交道了。

original: Then, they were led by a President Richardson. Now we've got this Eden to contend with.
translation: 他们当时由理查兹总统领导，现在是伊登。

original: It matters not -- now, as before, they seek to control and destroy, all in the guise of restoring order. Your father, I fear, was just the beginning.
translation: 现在也一样，事情没什么变化。他们热衷控制和毁灭，却打着恢复秩序的幌子。恐怕，你父亲只是一个开始。

original: Y... You're asking me what I think of the Enclave?
translation: 你……你问我对英克雷的看法？

original: Well... The Brotherhood of Steel has actually faced the Enclave before. Back West. More than thirty years ago, according to our chronicles.
translation: 嗯……根据我们的编年史，早在30年前，钢铁兄弟会事实上就已经在西部和英克雷打交道了。

original: Judging from those records, I'd say their soldiers are outfitted in Advanced Power Armor Mark II. It's... pretty strong. Better than our Power Armor.
translation: 从那些记录来看，我得说他们的士兵配备了先进的二型动力装甲。它……相当坚固，比我们的动力装甲要好。

original: And some of their technology is amazing! Vertibirds! Plasma weapons that can turn a man to goo!
translation: 他们的一些技术令人称奇！飞鸟！等离子武器能把人变成灰烬！

original: Does... that help?
translation: 那些……有用吗？

original: As if we didn't have enough to worry about. Their weapons are better; their Power Armor is better. Is their training better? We'll see.
translation: 好像我们的麻烦还不够似的……他们武器更好；他们的动力装甲更好。他们的训练更好吗？我们等着瞧。

original: So they have Plasma weapons! Bah! It's strong technology, I'll give you that, but limited in modability.
translation: 对了，他们有等离子武器！呸！我承认那是强悍的技术，但功能有限。

original: I've already started removing the compensators on our laser weapons to cut through the black devil Power Armor of theirs.
translation: 我已经拔掉了我们激光武器上的调相器，让它能刺穿他们黑色而邪恶的动力装甲。

original: We'll drop them like any other meat, don't you worry.
translation: 我们会把他们像其它的肉一样打倒，你别担心。

original: They're sporting some pretty impressive Power Armor, I'll give them that. The Advanced Mark II.
translation: 他们穿着给人印象相当深的动力装甲。先进的二型动力装甲。

original: But that's all right. With a few modifications, our own armor will more than handle anything they throw at it.
translation: 但不要紧。等做些改进后，我们自己的装甲就能轻松应付他们的扔过来的任何东西了。

original: Quite a few, but most are distinctly unladylike, and unworthy of discussion.
translation: 相当多，但大多数人显然不像淑女，这也不值得讨论。

original: I will tell you that the Brotherhood has encountered the Enclave before, and their motives were just as sinister then as they are now.
translation: 我告诉你，兄弟会以前就与英克雷遭遇过，而他们的图谋和现在的一样险恶。

original: They're men. They're born, they live, they die. End of story.
translation: 他们是人，他们出生、活着、死去，故事结束。

original: There's meat under that armor, and meat can be ground…
translation: 穿着装甲的肉，也是能被打倒的肉。

original: Man, I don't know. Fighting Uglies is one thing, but we've never gone up against anyone that well trained or organized. Even their tech is better.
translation: 老兄，我不知道。跟丑八怪战斗是一回事，但我们从未和如此训练有素、组织严密的对手对抗过。他们的技术甚至也比我们好。

original: Don't get me wrong. The Pride's in it to win it, and I'll go down shooting if I have to. I just hope I don't have to.
translation: 别理解错了。“里昂斯的骄傲”既然加入战斗，那就必须获得胜利。如果有必要，我会一直战斗。我只是希望不必这么做。

original: Killing unarmed civilians... Makes me sick. Come over here, try fighting someone who shoots back. Fucking cowards.
translation: 杀害手无寸铁的平民……真无耻。到这来，和拿枪的人打啊。他妈的胆小鬼。

original: Honestly? I can't wait to see if one of those helmets can stop a hollow-point round at 100 yards. I'm thinking... not.
translation: 说真的？我等不及看那些头盔是否可以阻止100码外的空心弹射击了。我想……不可能。

original: I am, and have been since we first found him, well over twenty years ago.
translation: 我是，而且自从我们第一次发现他后一直如此，大约在20年前。

original: "Liberty Prime" is the designation we found on file for him. Magnificent, don't you think? At least he will be, once all systems are operational.
translation: “自由先锋”的设定出自我们发现的相关文件。多么宏伟啊，对吧？会是的，等所有系统都正常运作起来。

original: It's the energy consumption. Something that big, with such advanced weapons systems... we just don't have the means to power him. Not yet.
translation: 它的能量消耗很大，这样大的玩意，如此先进的武器系统……我们只是没有办法提供动力，至少目前还没有。

original: Ah yes. Everyone asks about the robot. Hard not to, I admit.
translation: 啊，是的，每个人都会问这机器人。好像不问会嘴痒。

original: His name is "Liberty Prime." Very patriotic. Built by a very proud nation, during a very desperate time.
translation: 他叫“自由先锋”，非常爱国。在混乱的时期，由一个高傲的国家建造。

original: We've had about as much success getting him working as they did. You should speak with Scribe Rothchild. He can tell you more.
translation: 我们已经做了许多工作以便他能成功运作。你应当和罗斯查德学士谈谈，他能告诉你更多情况。

original: Enclave strength is at 100%. They're getting reinforcements from somewhere, but we still haven't determined the location of their headquarters.
translation: 英克雷的兵力达到了100%，他们显然从其他地方获得了增援，但我们始终没法确定他们的总部位置。

original: Enclave troops have fortified the purifier complex. With those vertibirds, they're able to transport personnel at a remarkable rate.
translation: 英克雷军队加强了净化器的防守力度。利用那些飞鸟，他们能高效率地运送人员。

original: Really? Thank you. You're the first person willing to actually give me any of that.
translation: 真的吗？谢谢。你是第一个愿意给我这些的人。

original: Thank you... I'm starting to think Aqua Pura is even better than normal purified water.
translation: 谢谢……我开始觉得“纯净水”比普通纯化水更好。

original: Shouldn't someone be starting the purifier in order to prevent our imminent demise?
translation: 难道不应该有人启动净化器来阻止我们即将面临的死亡吗？

original: That seems incredibly juvenile.
translation: 这似乎太幼稚了。

original: Farewell, friend.
translation: 回见，朋友。

original: Standing by for further orders.
translation: 随时听候进一步命令。

original: I'll see to it that your posthumous awards are polished daily, soldier.
translation: 我会确保你的追悼奖章每天都被擦得锃亮，士兵。

original: This seems an illogical solution to our dilemma.
translation: 这似乎是解决我们困境的一个不合逻辑的办法。

original: After everything, this is how you let it end?
translation: 发生了这么多，你就这么结束了吗？

original: You're a disgrace to the service.
translation: 你是军队的耻辱。

original: That would seem impossible, given what you are about to do.
translation: 鉴于你要做的事，这似乎是不可能的。

original: I don't recall that being part of the plan.
translation: 我不记得这是计划的一部分。

original: I don't recall that being part of the plan.
translation: 我不记得这是计划的一部分。

original: That is contrary to what you just asserted.
translation: 这与你刚才的断言相反。

original: Now that's more like it!
translation: 这才像话！

original: This unit is more than equipped to handle the harsh combat environment.
translation: 这支部队装备精良，足以应付恶劣的作战环境。

original: Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll end this war.
translation: 士兵，循环那个气闸，我们就能结束这场战争。

original: Ah, of course. My immunity to radiation makes me a far better candidate for surviving in there.
translation: 啊，当然。我对辐射的免疫力使我成为那里生存的最佳候选人。

original: I would say that your destiny lies within that chamber, but you have already altered mine. The least I can do is return the favor.
translation: 我想说你的命运就在那个房间里，但你已经改变了我的命运。我至少能做的就是回报你。

original: Cycle the airlock, and we'll put an end to this.
translation: 旋转气闸，我们就能结束这一切。

original: But... you said...
translation: 但……你说过……

original: Ah, of course. My immunity to radiation makes me a far better candidate for surviving in there.
translation: 啊，当然。我对辐射的免疫力使我成为那里生存的最佳候选人。

original: I would say that your destiny lies within that chamber, but you have already altered mine. The least I can do is return the favor.
translation: 我想说你的命运就在那个房间里，但你已经改变了我的命运。我至少能做的就是回报你。

original: Cycle the airlock, and we'll put an end to this.
translation: 旋转气闸，我们就能结束这一切。

original: That would be fine. I'd be more than willing to take the responsibility, if it means surviving.
translation: 没问题，我很愿意承担责任，如果这意味着生存的话。

original: Just cycle the airlock for me, and I'll enter the code.
translation: 只需为我循环那气闸，我会去输入密码。

original: Sir, yes sir!
translation: 是的，长官！

original: My superior construction and programming will outlast your frail human form in that hostile environment.
translation: 在那个充满敌意的环境中，我卓越的结构和编程将比你脆弱的人类形态更持久。

original: It'll be a battlefield commendation for sure. Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll put an end to this.
translation: 这肯定会是一次战场表彰，士兵，循环那气闸，我们就能结束这一切。

original: Sir, yes sir!
translation: 是的，长官！

original: My superior construction and programming will outlast your frail human form in that hostile environment.
translation: 在那个充满敌意的环境中，我卓越的结构和编程将比你脆弱的人类形态更持久。

original: It'll be a battlefield commendation for sure. Cycle that airlock, soldier, and we'll put an end to this.
translation: 这肯定会是一次战场表彰，士兵，循环那气闸，我们就能结束这一切。

original: Please, relax. Everything is fine.
translation: 请放松。一切都好。

original: You were brought back to the Citadel after some sort of energy spike in the purifier. You and Sarah were both knocked unconscious.
translation: 在净化器发生某种的能量骤增后，你们被带回了大本营。你和莎拉都被震晕了。

original: Quite a bit has happened since then.
translation: 那之后发生了很多事。

original: Please, relax. Everything is fine.
translation: 请放松。一切都好。

original: You were found unconscious in the purifier control room, and brought back here for treatment.
translation: 你被发现晕倒在净化器控制室内，然后被带回这里治疗。

original: Quite a bit has happened since then.
translation: 那之后发生了很多事。

original: It's all right, you're safe now. You're in the Citadel.
translation: 没关系，你现在安全了。你在大本营。

original: There was some sort of energy spike as the purifier started. You and Sarah were knocked unconscious, and brought here to the infirmary.
translation: 当净化器开启时，产生了某些类型的能量泄漏。你和莎拉都晕了过去，然后就被送来这个医务室。

original: We've been watching over the two of you for days. I'm glad to see it's paid off.
translation: 我们已经看护了你们两个好几天了。我很高兴这有了回报。

original: It's all right, you're safe now. You're in the Citadel.
translation: 没关系，你现在安全了。你在大本营。

original: There was an explosion as the purifier started. You were knocked unconscious, and brought here to the infirmary.
translation: 当净化器开启时发生了爆炸。你晕了过去，然后就被送来这个医务室。

original: We've been watching over you for days. I am glad to see that our efforts weren't in vain.
translation: 我们已经看护了你们两个好几天了。我很高兴我们的努力没有白费。

original: Yes, yes. She's fine. Or, she will be.
translation: 是的。她很好。至少，她会好起来的。

original: I appreciate your concern for her, but really, don't worry. You've been through enough.
translation: 我很高兴你这么关心她，不过说真的，不用担心。你已经做得够好了。

original: It's all right, I understand.
translation: 没关系，我能理解。

original: I have no doubt she refused to allow you to put yourself in harm's way.
translation: 我想毫无疑问，她不会让你投身于危机之中。

original: We all owe her a great debt. And I... I could not be prouder.
translation: 我们欠她的太多了。而且我…我一点也自豪不起来。

original: As my employer, I am obliged to honor your request. Very well.
translation: 作为我的雇主，我有义务满足您的要求。那好吧。

original: As you wish.
translation: 如你所愿。

original: If you insist...
translation: 如果你坚持……

original: I wonder if you might be willing to aid us a bit further.
translation: 不知道你愿不愿意再帮我们一把？

original: While we've had a decisive victory, the Enclave threat hasn't been removed yet.
translation: 尽管我们取得了决定性的胜利，英克雷的威胁还没有消除。

original: Well, that's really up to you, isn't it?
translation: 这个，那可是取决于你了，不是吗？

original: The Brotherhood has a clear plan of action: the remnants of the Enclave must be swept away.
translation: 兄弟会有着明确的行动计划: 英克雷的余党必须被扫除干净。

original: The Pride has been working to this end ever since we took the purifier back.
translation: 自从我们把净化装置带回来，“骄傲”就一直在研究这个。

original: The only remaining question is whether we can count on you to help us.
translation: 最后的问题就是不知你是否能帮助我们。

original: She's right here. Unresponsive, but stable.
translation: 她就在这里。没有反应，但情况稳定。

original: To see that you've recovered gives me hope...
translation: 看到你恢复过来给了我希望…

original: I appreciate that.
translation: 非常感谢。

original: As a soldier and a leader, I know that losses are unavoidable in times of war.
translation: 作为军人和领袖，我知道在战争中损失是无可避免的。

original: But as a father...
translation: 但作为父亲…

original: Indeed it did. The Tidal Basin is full of fresh, clean water now.
translation: 确实起作用了。潮汐湖现在充满了清洁干净的水。

original: We've been working to see that it's distributed to as many people as possible across the Wasteland.
translation: 我们一直在努力，确保将这些水分发给废土上尽可能多的人。

original: In fact, I'm hopeful that soon we won't be referring to "the Wasteland" any longer.
translation: 实际上，我希望我们很快就不会再提起“废土”一词了。

original: None of this would have been possible without the efforts of both you and your father. I doubt we shall ever be able to truly repay you.
translation: 没有你和你父亲的努力，这一切都无法实现。恐怕我们永远也无法真正的报答你。

original: Yes, it did. We've been distributing the water as best we can.
translation: 是的，起作用了。我们正竭尽所能的分配这些水。

original: There have been reports of some... problems, but we're dealing with them.
translation: 有报告称出现了一些……问题，但我们正在处理。

original: Without your assistance, this never would have been possible. We all owe both you and your father a great deal of thanks.
translation: 没有你的帮助，这一切都不可能实现。我们非常感谢你和你父亲。

original: Yes, we most certainly did.
translation: 没错，我们就快胜利了。

original: Between your help in destroying their headquarters, and their subsequent defeat at the purifier, the Enclave was thrown into disarray.
translation: 先是在你的帮助下摧毁了他们的总基地，其后又是在抢夺净化器上击败了他们，英克雷现在已经陷入了一片混乱。

original: Liberty Prime has been assisting our forces in removing any remaining Enclave forces.
translation: 自由先锋正在协助我们消灭英克雷的残余势力。

original: Yes, we most certainly did.
translation: 没错，我们就快成功了。

original: After securing the purifier, our forces were sent to deal with the Enclave in full.
translation: 在保护了净化器后，我们的军力全都被派去对付英克雷了。

original: The Pride and Liberty Prime made short work of their base of operations, and have since been cleaning up pockets of resistance.
translation: “骄傲”以及自由先锋在短暂地维护了他们基地的运作后，接着又开始清扫小股的抵抗力量。

original: That's a shame. We could use your assistance.
translation: 真可惜。我们需要你的帮助。

original: And since you have done so much to aid our cause, and proven yourself more than capable, you have been named a Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 鉴于你为我们的事业做出了如此多的贡献，并证明了自己的能力，你已被命名为钢铁兄弟会的骑士。

original: Should you change your mind, Scribe Rothchild can brief you on what's been going on these last few weeks.
translation: 要是你改变主意，罗斯查德学士可以向你介绍过去几周的情况。

original: Indeed, we can use every able body available to us.
translation: 当然有，我们可以利用一切可用的人手。

original: To that end, I am going to circumvent our standard recruitment procedures and declare you a Knight of the Brotherhood of Steel.
translation: 为此，我将绕过我们的标准征兵程序，宣布你成为钢铁兄弟会的骑士。

original: Before you do anything else, please speak with Scribe Rothchild. I'm sure he'll be pleased to see you again.
translation: 在你做其他事情之前，请先和罗斯查德学士谈谈。我想他会很高兴再次见到你的。

original: He can brief you on the details of the last few weeks, as well as where our efforts are focused now.
translation: 他可以简要地告诉你最近几个星期的情况，以及我们最近的任务着重点。

original: I understand that you've been through quite an ordeal, but the sooner you can talk to him, the sooner we can put an end to all this.
translation: 我知道你经历了不少磨难，但你越早和他谈，我们就能越早结束这一切。

original: Just about two weeks.
translation: 大概两周。

original: Don't worry. We've been taking good care of you.
translation: 别担心。我们一直在照顾你。

original: I think I see one.
translation: 我好像看到一个。

original: At least they don't shoot back.
translation: 至少他们没有还击。

original: Come on, pop your head up one more time for me.
translation: 妈的，你再给我抬一次头。

original: Maybe we finally got them all.
translation: 也许我们确实把他们都杀完了。

original: God what a stink!
translation: 天哪！真臭啊！

original: This is worse than latrine duty.
translation: 这比扫厕所还恶心。

original: You won't see Elder Lyons down here pulling the putrid lurks out of the Basin.
translation: 里昂斯老家伙才不会来这把腐烂的变种蟹拖出这个地方的呢…

original: How many of these damn things were living down there?
translation: 不知道有多少该死的这玩意住在这里？

original: Yeah. They've got a whole lake of it just sitting there.
translation: 没错，一湖的蟹都在这里了。

original: I know. We run out in two days and then it's back to the radiated shit.
translation: 我知道，我们呆了两天，这些玩意就都化成辐射屎了。

original: There's more of them than I expected. They're really entrenched here. Something must be up...
translation: 这里的敌人比我想的要多。他们真的在这里扎根了，一定有事……

original: We're thinking if it's active, we can find out who they're talking to, and get the last of the locations nailed down.
translation: 我们想如果它还在运作，我们就能知道他们在和谁通话，把最后的位置确定下来。

original: Scribes pulled information about this place day before yesterday. Some communications facility.
translation: 学士们前天把这个地方的情报给了我们。是个通信设施。

original: The tin can does most of the work, honestly. I can't complain, it keeps our casualties down.
translation: 老实说，大部分工作都是铁罐完成的。我没什么好抱怨的。这样可以减少伤亡。

original: It's been pretty standard for the last week or so. We get intel on positions, go in and burn 'em out.
translation: 过去一周左右都是如此，我们得到的位置情报，进去把他们消灭。

original: Uh, yeah. "Water delivered to Megaton without incident." That's what my report will say.
translation: 噢，好。“水已经安全送到兆吨镇”。我的报告上会这么写。

original: You've still got plenty of water. Look, the brahmin is loaded with it. What you gave us won't last more than a few days!
translation: 你还有好多水。双头牛载满了。你给我们的水都不够喝几天！

original: Hey, it isn't my call. I just take the water where the Brotherhood tells me. Don't shoot the messenger, you know?
translation: 嘿，这事我说了不算。兄弟会让我把水运哪，我就运哪。别打邮递员，懂吗？

original: Look, they're giving the water away. What do you care whether you leave it all here or somewhere else?
translation: 看，他们要把水带走。你把水都留在这里或者拿到其他地方去，又关你什么事情呢？

original: I really don't care. I mean, you'll have to take it up with those boys...
translation: 是不关我的事情。我是说，你要和那帮伙计聊聊这个事情。

original: You're not leaving here with that water. We need it. We're taking it.
translation: 你不能带着水走，我们需要水。这水归我们。

original: I hope you're not thinking about getting stupid on me.
translation: 我希望你不要打算对我干什么蠢事。

original: We just need the water. All of it.
translation: 我们需要水，所有的水！

original: Sorry, pal, but you already got your quota. Our orders are to take the rest of this to Big Town.
translation: 对不起了，伙计们！你们已经拿到自己的那份了。我收到的命令就是把这些水带去大镇。

original: Alright, let's move out.
translation: 好吧，我们走吧。

original: Come on, Joe, help me get the water. They aren't really going to stop us.
translation: 嘿，乔，帮我弄下这些水。他们不会阻止我们的。

original: Typical waster.
translation: 典型的废柴。

original: Now you're talking! Come on, let's get that water!
translation: 你终于说话了！快，让我们把水拿走！

original: Ah... you're probably right. They wouldn't think twice about murdering the lot of us, would they?
translation: 啊…你说的也许没错。他们不会介意再多杀一批人，是吗？

original: We'll just have to make do until we can organize our own water caravans and get out from under the Brotherhood's thumb.
translation: 在我们组织自己的送水商队、不再受兄弟会这帮子人的气之前，我们只能如此了。

original: Then get out of my damn face.
translation: 那就赶紧滚开。

original: You, too? Fine! They can have the damn water! What do I care if Big Town doesn't get any?
translation: 你也？好吧！他们可以拿走水！大镇没有水管我什么事情！？

original: You mean... you don't want anything for it? I don't have any caps or anything...
translation: 你的意思是……白送？我可是一无所有……

original: I can just have it? For free?
translation: 我能得到它？免费的？

original: You... are you serious? I can't offer anything in exchange, you know?
translation: 你……是认真的吗？我没有东西拿来换，你知道吗？

original: I can just have it? For free?
translation: 我能得到它？免费的？

original: Giving it away only to certain people... and those people aren't giving it to me...
translation: 只把它送给某些人......而那些人没有给我......

original: Hey, I hear you guys are giving out good water. You got some for me and my family, don't ya?
translation: 嘿！我听说你们得到了一些好的水，能分些给我和我的家人吗，可以吗？

original: We don't give water to Raider scum. Don't make me waste ammo on killing you.
translation: 我们不给掠夺者人渣水。别逼我浪费弹药杀你。

original: Well then, why don't you and your two-headed girlfriend go fuck yourselves?
translation: 好啊，为什么不让你和你两个脑袋的女朋友见鬼去？

original: Okay. It's about time to move out.
translation: 好吧。差不多该行动了。

original: Well, you saw most of the fighting outside. The robot paved the way for us, we just mopped up the opposition while you and Sarah headed inside.
translation: 嗯，你在外面看到了大部分的战斗。机器人给我们铺平了道路，在你和莎拉则朝里面走去时，我们只是在清理反抗者。

original: After that... Hell if I know. Once we'd locked down the perimeter, and gotten word that the purifier was running, we headed in to look for you.
translation: 之后……我怎么知道。我们一封锁了周围地区 并得到消息说净化器正在运行，就进去找你们了。

original: Found you and Sarah both unconscious, and got you back to the Citadel fast as we could.
translation: 发现你和莎拉都昏迷了，就第一时间把你们带回了大本营

original: We'll strip the place for any usable tech, like always.
translation: 我们会像往常一样，搜刮这里所有可用的技术。

original: Anything after that depends on what we find in there.
translation: 至于之后要干什么，就要看我们有什么发现了。

original: If there's any information about other Enclave positions, we'll send that back to the Citadel and come up with a plan.
translation: 如果有任何关于其他英克雷基地的消息，我们会将其送回大本营并制定计划。

original: But like I said, we're pretty sure this is the last big holdout.
translation: 但就像我说的，我们很确定这是最后一个据点了。

original: Not like they did at the purifier, no.
translation: 没有，不像他们在净化器时那样。

original: We got the sense that after you took care of their headquarters, they didn't have anyone to give orders.
translation: 我们发现在你收拾了他们的总部后，就没有人指挥他们了。

original: So they haven't been as coordinated. Some surrendered, some tried to hold out... it's all ended the same.
translation: 所以他们没有那么协调。有些投降了，有些试图抵抗……不过结果都一样。

original: But don't let that fool you. If we can keep the pressure on them, we win. If not, we give them a chance to re-organize...
translation: 但别被骗了。如果我们能保持对他们的压力，我们能赢。否则就会给他们重新组织的机会……

original: Well, we don't want that to happen, do we?
translation: 嗯，我们不希望发生那种事情，对吧？

original: Not like they did at the purifier, no.
translation: 没有，不像他们在净化器时那样。

original: After we secured Project Purity, Liberty Prime was unleashed on their headquarters. It was a quick fight.
translation: 在我们保护净水工程后，自由先锋被派往了他们的总部。战斗很快就结束了。

original: Since then, their operations have been severely disrupted. We're trying to use that to our advantage -- we keep hitting them while they're down.
translation: 从那以后，他们的运转受到严重破坏。我们正试着利用这一点取得优势——对他们乘胜追击。

original: We can't give them a moment to breathe safely, or else they might pose more of a threat to us in the long run.
translation: 我们不能给他们任何喘息的机会，否则从长远来看，他们可能会对我们构成更大的威胁。

original: Well, we've got a bit of time. What's on your mind?
translation: 嗯，我们还有点时间。你在意什么？
