original: I'm outfitting your Pip-Boy with the same blood sampling device we usually give our Scouts.
translation: 我会给你的哔哔小子装上于我们的巡逻队配备相同的血样分析仪。

original: After you kill a Mutant, grab a sample from its corpse and bring it here. I'll see you're properly compensated for your ammo expenditure.
translation: 每杀一个变种人，就取一份血样回来。我给你弹药补给。

original: Just keep wiping out those Super Mutants and you'll be helping plenty.
translation: 只要坚持清除他们，你就是帮了我们的大忙了。

original: Yeah... actually, I think Rothchild is looking for stuff to rebuild Liberty Prime. You should ask him.
translation: 呃…实际上，我记得罗斯查德好像在找重建自由先锋的材料。你可以问问他。

original: Yes, yes please. Your help would be most welcome.
translation: 太好，我们欢迎你的帮助。

original: As you know, my main task is the reconstruction of Liberty Prime. A daunting task indeed, given his current state.
translation: 正如所见，你的主要任务就是重组自由先锋。鉴于他目前的状态，这是一个艰巨的任务。

original: To get him back on his feet will take not only a good deal of scavenged parts, but I need some special items for his complex systems.
translation: 要让他重新站起来，你不仅仅需要大量的材料部件，还需要一些特殊的玩意，因为他的系统太复杂了。

original: In your travels, be on the lookout for sensor modules. That will help me with restoring his electrical components.
translation: 在旅行中，你可以注意收集那些传感器模块。这可以帮助我修复他的电子元件。

original: But what I need most are old cameras. Prime's optics were completely destroyed in the explosion and I can use the components inside to replace them.
translation: 但是我最急需的是老式的照相机。先锋的光学设备完全被炸损了，我可以拆掉照相机，替换坏掉的元件。

original: Remember, I'm looking for sensor modules and cameras. Bring them back here if you discover any.
translation: 记住了，我要的是传感器模组和照相机。如果你找到，就带给我。

original: Well, the Pride's got the downtown area pretty well covered.
translation: 嗯，“骄傲”已经把市区控制得很好了。

original: You may want to talk to Paladin Tristan or Scribe Rothchild. They may have something for you to do. Good luck!
translation: 你可以找特里斯坦圣骑士和罗斯查德学士谈谈。他们也许有什么事情让你帮忙。祝你好运！

original: Although we've all but eradicated the Enclave, many difficult paths still stretch out before us.
translation: 尽管我们几乎消灭了英克雷，但是摆在我们面前的困难还有很多。

original: The Wasteland is still rife with peril, and I intend to dedicate the Brotherhood to maintaining it in a peaceful state.
translation: 废土依然遍布着危险，我希望指引兄弟会维护这里的和平状态。

original: I hold out high hopes for you; that you'll still wish to be a part of our future and help us in our struggles.
translation: 我对你的期望很高；你仍然对我们的未来以及我们的奋斗存有愿景。

original: Well, the Enclave might not be a threat anymore, but we're not done by a long shot.
translation: 嗯，英克雷也许不构成威胁了，但是我们依然任重道远。

original: We've still got Muties crawling all over the ruins like rats and they're multiplying every day.
translation: 变种人仍然像耗子一样在废土乱窜，他们的数量几乎每天都在成倍增长。

original: It's no picnic keeping their numbers down, but that's our job.
translation: 减少他们的数量并不是容易的事情，但那是我们的职责。

original: I've been amazingly busy ever since we began clashing with the Enclave. All their technology is amazing.
translation: 自从和英克雷冲突以来，我一直忙得昏天黑地的。他们的技术令人目眩神驰。

original: It's going to take me years to sift through the wreckage of their mobile platform alone.
translation: 光是他们的移动平台废墟就够我们研究几年了。

original: I suppose we have you to thank for that.
translation: 我想这都归功于你的帮助。

original: If you think this means the Pride has nothing to do anymore, you're crazy.
translation: 如果你以为以后“骄傲”就没有用武之地了，那就大错特错了。

original: We've still got the damn Frankensteins crawling all over D.C. and Rothchild's got us picking up every blinking gizmo from here to Virginia.
translation: 那些该死的科学怪人还在特区到处乱窜，罗斯查德要我们把从这到弗吉尼亚的所有闪烁小玩意儿都捡回来。

original: Quite a bit of work cut out for us, eh?
translation: 以后有的忙咯，唉？

original: Now? Now the real work begins.
translation: 现在？现在，有些工作才刚刚开始。

original: I've got just piles and piles of Enclave technology to take apart and put back together. Who do you think got our captured Vertibird flying?
translation: 我得到了不计其数的英克雷技术，需要研究如何把它们拆分再装配起来。你觉得我们让这个缴获的飞鸟再飞起来怎么样？

original: Now let me get back to work before Rothchild assigns me trash detail.
translation: 我现在要去忙了，罗斯查德还要告诉我那些该死的数据细节。

original: Don't worry about the remainder of the Enclave forces, we'll mop up the rest.
translation: 别担心英克雷的余党，剩下的我们会搞定。

original: Should be a hell of a show.
translation: 他妈的肯定很好看。

original: Good job. I'll inform Lyons of your progress.
translation: 干得漂亮。我会告诉里昂斯你所做的。

original: Fantastic. I'll get the Scribes to record your kills.
translation: 难以想象。我会让学士们记录下你的杀敌数量。

original: Nice work. Come back when you have more.
translation: 干得不错。如果你取得了更多的就回来找我。

original: Great! Keep them coming.
translation: 太好了！请再给我多带一些。

original: Performance is exceeding all our expectations.
translation: 表现超出了我们所有人的预期。

original: He's been especially effective against the Enclave's Vertibirds, for which we previously had no counter.
translation: 他在对付英克雷的飞鸟时尤其有效，而以往我们却无法对付它们。

original: We're fine-tuning his programming as we go, but on the whole I'm pleasantly surprised.
translation: 我们正在逐步调整他的程序，但总的来说，我很惊喜。

original: It's as I always suspected. Prime's real issue was energy management, and when Doctor Li helped us solve that problem, well, the rest was easy.
translation: 和我一直猜想的一样。先锋真正的问题在于能源管理，而当李博士帮我们解决这个问题之后，嗯，剩下的就简单了。

original: Well, you'll want to get to the floor above, and then make your way to the middle. That's where the mainframe is.
translation: 这样，你先要进入上面的一层，然后找到中层。中央电脑就在那里。

original: This is Paladin Tristan.
translation: 这是特里斯坦圣骑士

original: If you're listening to this, then you've made it through the Presidential Metro and Adams Air Force Base is all that stands in your way.
translation: 如果你听到这个，那么你已经通过了总统地铁，亚当斯空军基地是你的唯一障碍。

original: Our scouts report that the fire controls for the orbital missile satellite are located in the main tower of the Enclave Mobile Platform.
translation: 我们的侦察员报告说，轨道导弹卫星的火控系统位于英克雷移动平台的主塔。

original: The only way into the platform is by way of a ramp that lowers from a watch post the Enclave set up in the old air traffic control tower.
translation: 进入平台的唯一途径，是走英克雷在旧航空交通管制塔上设立的瞭望哨降下的坡道。

original: When you opened the crate it triggered a beacon. We'll pick up the signal and start the assault to cover your entry.
translation: 你打开板条箱时会触发信标。我们会接收到信号并开始攻击，以掩护你进入。

original: Good luck, and Godspeed.
translation: 祝你好运，一路顺风。

original: Whatever.
translation: 随便。

original: I started out in the Swords. I upped the output of a few Laser Rifles. Apparently some initiates couldn't handle the extra power. A few got hurt.
translation: 我首先从武器开始。我增强了几把激光步枪的能量输出。很显然有些新兵还适应不了这个修改。有些人因此受了伤。

original: Then I joined the Shields. Bowditch wasn't all that pleased with me proving him and his theories on forcefield resonance were a bit "antiquated."
translation: 之后我开始改进护盾。鲍蒂奇对于我的出现有些恼火，因为我证明他和他那套关于矢量场共振的理论有点"过时了。"

original: Then I found myself among the Quills. Jameson refuses to accept any fact that conflicts with her rose colored optimistic views.
translation: 接着我发现自己进退两难。詹姆森拒绝接受任何与他过于乐观的想法相悖的观点。

original: She likes to assign "contradictory" personalities to "field operations." Take for example myself here, or Yearling, exiled to that accursed library.
translation: 他喜欢安排些性格"自相矛盾"的人来进行"战地操作。"比如把握弄到这里，或者像Yearling，被发配到了那座该死的图书馆。

original: I used to think Rothchild and I were on the same page. Turns out he's happy to blindly follow the old man's orders like the rest of them.
translation: 我以前以为罗斯查德和我意见是一类人。可他现在却变成和其他人一样，对那些老家伙的命令一味盲从。

original: <Sigh.>
translation: <叹气。>

original: It's probably best if I don't answer that question.
translation: 我最好还是不要回答这个问题。

original: I literally can't remember the last time I got sleep... I must have dozed off recently though, if the drool on my desk is any indication. <Sigh.>
translation: 我都忘了上次睡觉是什么时候的事了……不过从桌子上的口水来看，我一定是打过瞌睡了<叹气。>

original: Yeah... that's a long story actually.
translation: 是的……实际上说来话长啊。

original: I follow orders, but I'm not exactly a "yes man." I figure a Scribe's job is to find the devil in the details. Consequently I seldom get promoted.
translation: 我服从命令，但我绝不是一只“应声虫。” 我认为一个学士的工作就是发现隐藏在细节中的危险。这让我很少获得晋升。

original: I think Elder Lyons finally had his fill of people questioning him.
translation: 我觉得里昂斯长老最终导致他的人民对他产生质疑。

original: And while Scribe Rothchild and I usually see eye to eye on things... it's apparently time to set an example for those who ask too many questions.
translation: 而与此同时罗斯查德学士和我经常能够想到一块去……显然是时候给那些一直有问题要问的人做个榜样了。

original: Tch. She apparently decided to pursue "more interesting projects" up north in the Commonwealth.
translation: 很显然她为了寻求"更多感兴趣的工程"而去了北面的联邦。

original: The real reason is that she couldn't handle us Scribes "improving" upon her work. She's the kind of woman who needs to be in charge of EVERYTHING.
translation: 说到底是因为她无法忍受我们学士对她的工作进行“改进”。她是那种什么事都要自己说了算的女人。

original: Good luck to her out there in the Wasteland; it's a long walk to the Commonwealth. Can't say she'll be missed.
translation: 愿她在废土中好运; 到达联邦的路途很遥远。说不清她是否能到达那里。

original: <Sigh.>
translation: <叹气。>

original: Yeah, well, when you remember what it was you were going to ask. Take it up with one of the other Scribes, okay? Thanks.
translation: 是的，好吧，等你记起来你要问什么的时候。去问问其他的学士吧，好吗？谢谢了。

original: You take a bottle, you dunk it under water, and glug glug glug, it fills up. Amazing.
translation: 你拿个瓶子放到水下，咕噜咕噜咕噜，装满了。神奇吧。

original: But you're right a machine would help. But all the Scribes are busy reverse engineering Enclave gear.
translation: 当然有台机器能帮不少忙。可是现在所有的学士都忙着研究英克雷的装备。

original: A machine that puts water in bottles just isn't on anyone's priority list at the moment.
translation: 现在没人愿意费事弄出一台用来把水装瓶的机器。

original: I'm sure you can imagine the chaos if we just let anyone who wanted to wade into the basin and fill up a jug?
translation: 我敢肯定你能想象如果我们让任何想要水的人来到池子边用水罐来装水的话，那会有多混乱。

original: Frankly, there just isn't the time or resources to deal with that crowd control nightmare.
translation: 坦白和你说吧，现在还不是时候，我们还没有能力对抗那操控人心的梦魇。

original: I don't think anyone really knows the answer to that. Seems to be going rather quickly though.
translation: 我认为没有人真正知道这个问题的答案。不过进展很顺利。

original: Umm... because it's not irradiated. Really? You couldn't work that one out for yourself?
translation: 嗯……因为它没有辐射。你连这个都不知道？

original: We have so much to do putting him back together again. I'm uncertain as to how long it might take. Months? Years?
translation: 我们要做的事情太多了，要把它重新组装起来。我不确定这需要多长时间。几个月？几年？

original: The only bright side in this is an opportunity to try and rebuild Prime from the ground up; make improvements on his original design.
translation: 唯一值得庆幸的是，我们有机会尝试从头开始重建先锋，并对其原始设计进行改进。

original: If only we hadn't exhausted so many of our supplies fighting the Enclave...
translation: 要是我们没有在与英克雷的战斗中耗尽大量物资，那该多好啊……

original: Don't even get me started...
translation: 别让我谈这个…

original: Trying to decipher Rothchild's schematics and wiring diagrams is exhausting. But we'll get there.
translation: 破解罗斯查德给的图纸并重写线路图真是要命的活。但是能完成的。

original: Like Rothchild says, "Liberty Prime will walk again!" I believe him, but I think it's going to take a really long time.
translation: 就像罗斯查德说的，“自由会站起来的！”我相信，但这需要很长的时间。

original: Yeah, you don't seem like the goody-goody type. But don't spread this around: So this ghoul, Griffon, comes in wanting to PURCHASE a bunch of water.
translation: 是啊，你看起来不像是那种假正经的人。但是不要到处宣扬：那个尸鬼，格里芬，进来想要买一大堆水。

original: What the hell does that droopy irradiated fool need with pure water? Thinks he can sell it in Underworld. Moron.
translation: 那个快腐烂的傻瓜要这么多净水干嘛？他以为他能在冥界卖掉这些水。蠢货。

original: But, he's the only one who's offered to PAY for water, in caps AND technology.
translation: 不过，只有他愿意用瓶盖和科技来换水。

original: And what Lyons doesn't know won't hurt him. There's plenty of water to go around.
translation: 里昂斯虽然不知道，但这对他没什么危害。这儿还有好多水。

original: And I can use it to pay Rivet City to provide security for all the caravans we can't escort ourselves. I'm lucky he came along.
translation: 我们还能用他给的钱让铆钉城的警力保护我们的旅队。他来找我可是我的运气。

original: Look, it's not that I don't trust you. I know you're trustworthy... but see, that's just it. I don't think you're capable of discretion.
translation: 听着，不是我不信任你。我知道你值得信任……但仅此而已。我觉得你不够谨慎。

original: Nothing immoral is going on, but I'm already in a lot of hot water with the Brotherhood. I need to be careful with what I say and to whom.
translation: 这里面没有什么不道德的事，但是我和兄弟会的麻烦已经够多了。我说话可得小心点。

original: Father is sending us into D.C. to scour the ruins and try and cleanse it of Super Mutants.
translation: 父亲派我们前往华盛顿特区去搜索废墟，并尝试清除那里的超级变种人。

original: He's calling it "our next great obstacle." Sometimes I wish we could just take a rest.
translation: 他称之为“我们的下一个大障碍”。有时我真希望我们能歇一会。

original: But I have to keep a stiff upper lip and help the machine run smoothly, so that's what I'm going to do.
translation: 但是我还是得咬紧牙关，帮助组织顺利运转，所以这是我要做的事情。

original: Nah. There'll be stragglers and patrols still wandering the Wasteland. They won't know what happened at Adams probably for months.
translation: 不。废土还有很多零散的士兵和巡逻队，他们几个月内都不会知道亚当斯基地发生了什么。

original: One thing I can tell you is they'll still shoot you on sight... so watch yourself.
translation: 可以肯定的一点是，他们看到你的话，还是会开枪的…所以，当心点。

original: It would be naive of me to assume the Enclave threat is completely eradicated from our future.
translation: 如果以为英克雷的势力已经被彻底消灭了，那就太天真了。

original: With their resources and advanced mobility, I wouldn't be surprised if we see them return to the Capital Wasteland one day.
translation: 由于他们掌握了资源和先进的机动性，如果未来有一天发现他们又重返在华盛顿，也不足为奇吧。

original: Yeah, for a while at least. You'll still bump into a few of them in the Wastes... deep scout patrols and outposts.
translation: 不过，至少能清净一阵子。你可能还会在废土遇到一两个散兵…可能会是巡逻得比较远的哨兵和前哨部队。

original: Hopefully, they'll stay far from here and let us do our job now that we kicked their butts!
translation: 这次赶走了他们后，希望他们别再来骚扰这里，让我们专心做自己的事情。

original: My father says we need to watch the borders for them to send reinforcements, but I think it'll be a long time before anything happens.
translation: 我父亲说，我们要盯紧外围防线，以免他们再派援军来，但是我觉得这要在一段日子以后了吧。

original: We dealt them a hell of a blow and it's going to take them a good amount of time to recover.
translation: 我们沉重地打击了他们，估计他们要很久才能恢复元气。

original: From the amount of equipment pouring in, I'd say if we didn't destroy them, we certainly threw a major wrench into their works.
translation: 从涌入的装备数量来看，我敢说，我们即使没有摧毁他们，也让他们有够受的了。

original: Ah, very nice. I'll have my assembling team get right on it.
translation: 啊，很好！我现在就让装配组去做！

original: We'll need a lot more where this came from to reconstruct Prime's electrical systems. Keep bringing more.
translation: 我们还需要更多的材料才能重新建造“先锋”的电子系统。请多带点过来。

original: It's but a drop in the bucket, but it'll have to do. Thanks.
translation: 杯水车薪啊，但是聊胜于无。多谢啦。

original: Good, good. Please keep bringing them to me... it's my only hope of getting Prime's optics rebuilt.
translation: 很好，很好。请再多带一些过来…只有靠这样我才能把先锋的光学系统修复。

original: Oh, splendid! Hopefully these will contain unbroken lenses unlike the last few I've acquired.
translation: 噢，太棒了！我希望这里面还有完好的镜头，可别像我上次拿到的那几个。

original: Excellent! I'll begin disassembling them immediately. Good work!
translation: 太棒了！我马上就把它们拆开。干得好！

original: Get the lead out, soldier! This place is about to get flattened!
translation: 快走，士兵！这里马上要被炸平了！

original: Quickly, just get on board before those missiles level this place!
translation: 赶紧的！登机！马上导弹就要把这里夷为平地！

original: Hurry, the orbital strike will be coming down any moment now.
translation: 快点，轨道打击随时会降临。

original: Still got that annoying sense of humor, huh?
translation: 你还是那么的爱开玩笑，哼？

original: Doesn't matter. You've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier.
translation: 这不要紧。我能说的是：你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！

original: Now it's my turn. It's my pleasure to order your ass onto the Vertibird before this whole place gets blown to hell.
translation: 该轮到我说了。我盛情邀请您上飞鸟！然后我们把会这个鬼地方炸翻！

original: He's told me everything you've done and the sacrifices your family's made for the sake of the Wasteland.
translation: 他告诉了我你的所有事情，你们一家人都为废土作出了极大的牺牲。

original: All I can say is that you've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier. A hell of a job!
translation: 我能说的是：你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！

original: Now it's time to do my job and to get your ass onto this Vertibird before it goes up like a nuke.
translation: 现在，我该要忙我的事情了，而你要在飞鸟起飞之前赶紧上去。

original: Well, we both have the Pride to thank for that. Without them, we'd both be dead.
translation: 我们都要感谢“骄傲”。如果不是他们，我们早死了。

original: But enough about me. You've done one hell of an outstanding job out here, soldier. A hell of a job!
translation: 别谢我。你的工作完成得太出色了，士兵！真是太出色了！

original: Now it's time to do my job and to get your ass onto this Vertibird before it goes up like a nuke.
translation: 现在，我该要忙我的事情了，而你要在飞鸟起飞之前赶紧上去。

original: Fine.
translation: 行啊。

original: This is Griffon recording. All you clowns listen up. I'm leaving you in charge of the bottling operation while I'm away doing my thing at Underworld.
translation: 这是格里芬录音。你们这些小丑听好了。在我到冥界去忙事情的时候，你们要继续负责装瓶流水线的运作。

original: Here are my instructions. First off, shoot anyone who isn't me or one of you. Don't want anyone nosing around inside.
translation: 下面是我的指示。首先，杀死任何不属于我们的人。我不想让任何人进来打听消息。

original: When Bigsley's men arrive from Project Purity pay them promptly but don't let them in.
translation: 当比格斯利的人从“净水工程”来后，马上支付给他们报酬，但别让他们进来。

original: Take the Aqua Pura, dump it into tubs and sinks to hold for later, then fill the empty bottles with the treated irradiated water.
translation: 拿到纯净水，把它倒进大桶里沉淀一段时间，然后把这些处理后发光的水装进空瓶里。

original: When you get enough bottles to make it worthwhile, make a trip over to Underworld. I'll take the new bottles and give you your cut.
translation: 当你们装好足够的瓶子后，运到冥界来。我会收下这些新货并给你们应得的。

original: Oh, and leave the wigs alone. I don't want your greasy heads touching them. I mean it!
translation: 对了，别碰那些假发。我可不希望让你们油腻的脑袋碰它们。我是认真的！

original: All right, let's do this!
translation: 好吧，让我们上吧！

original: Fall in, fall in!
translation: 集合，集合！

original: Fall back!
translation: 撤退！

original: Get out of here!
translation: 从这儿滚出去!

original: Move it!
translation: 快去！

original: Come on Sparky, Hoover. Let's go.
translation: 来吧史帕基, 胡佛。我们走。

original: I "made" you do nothing. You chose to imbibe the Waters of Light of your own volition. A choice most wise, indeed.
translation: 我没"让"你任何事。是你自己的意愿选择饮下那圣光之水的。毫无疑问，这的确是一个很明智的选择。

original: As for your threats to my person, I fear not. I am aglow with Atom's Holy Light. You may do violence to this vessel, but my spirit is inviolable.
translation: 至于你威胁我的子民这件事，我可不怕你。我与原子的圣光同在。你可以摧残我的肉身，但是我的精神是不可侵犯的。

original: I shall smite thee, heathen. Atom fill me!
translation: 我应该狠狠的教训你，异教徒。原子赐予我力量！

original: Nonsense! The Eternal Light is faultless and blameless. It cleanses our bodies as it cleanses our transgressions.
translation: 荒谬！这永恒之光是毫无缺点，无可指责的。他通过清除我们体内的罪恶来净化我们的身体。

original: Walk in Atom's Glow, and you have nothing to worry about.
translation: 走进原子的荣光，你就不用为任何事操心了。

original: That is what the unbelievers from that so called "Project Purity" call it before we fill it with Atom's Holy Light.
translation: 那就是异教徒们把它称作"净水工程"的原因，之前他们会在水中装满原子的圣光。

original: Give it time, child. Soon Atom will enlighten your eyes and you will come to realize the truth for yourself.
translation: 让时间来证明，孩子。很快，原子就会点亮你的眼睛，你自己也会明白真相。

original: Why... you ARE the Prophet of Atom! I didn't recognize you until now... Your eyes are aglow, your very skin radiates with Atom's Heat!
translation: 为什么……您就是原子先知！我刚才没认出您来……您的双眼散炯炯有神，您的皮肤散发着原子之热！

original: I didn't realize... My Lord, now that you have revealed yourself to me, I do... I see the errors of my ways.
translation: 我没有意识到……吾主啊，现在您向我昭示了您的身份，我……我知道了自己的错误。

original: Forgive me, for I knew not what I was doing... we will spread your word without the use of the holy water... we will return the Aqua Pura to Megaton.
translation: 请原谅我，我不知道我在做什么……我们会在不使用圣水的情况下传播您的旨意……我们会将纯净水送还给兆吨镇。

original: It shall be a test: the worthy will seek us out, and finding us they will find the Message of Atom, drinking the Waters of Light in their souls. Yes!
translation: 这将是一个试炼：那些有资质的人会来皈依我等，追寻我们，他们即追寻到了原子之教诲，即以圣光之水灌沃灵魂。没错！

original: I leave you now, Lord. I can not bear to look upon your shining face any longer.
translation: 请原谅在下的离开，我主。 在下不敢再直视您了。

original: You may not agree with us, but you need not mock our beliefs.
translation: 你可以不相信，但你没必要嘲笑我们的信仰。

original: The Prophet of Atom would be so aglow as to outshine the sun. You are not he.
translation: 原子先知的万丈光芒能让太阳相形见绌。你不是他。

original: You may not agree with us, but you need not mock our beliefs.
translation: 你可以不相信，但你没必要嘲笑我们的信仰。

original: The Prophet of Atom would be so aglow as to outshine the sun. You are not she.
translation: 原子先知的万丈光芒能让太阳相形见绌。你不是她。

original: I suppose it's a fair question... Ever since I was a girl, I knew I was destined for something special. I always resisted the feeling. Me? Special?
translation: 我想这是个不错的问题…当我还是个小姑娘时，我就感觉到我命中注定要些点不平凡的事。我总是抗拒这种感觉。我？不平凡？

original: But one day I fell asleep during one of the Confessor's sermons. And I had a dream.
translation: 但是有一天我在听一个信徒说教的时候睡着了。并且我做了一个梦。

original: A dream of the Prophet of Atom. Ablaze with Holy Light! He told me of my destiny. Of my mission. I was called to service, and I answered.
translation: 我梦见了原子的先知。周身燃烧着圣光！她向我昭示了我的命运。以及我的任务。她要我去为人类服务，我便答应了。

original: The only being able to convince me I was wrong, would be the Prophet of Atom himself.
translation: 唯一能说服我错了的人，就只有原子先知她自己了。

original: I suppose it's a fair question... Ever since I was a girl, I knew I was destined for something special. I always resisted the feeling. Me? Special?
translation: 我想这是个不错的问题…当我还是个小姑娘时，我就感觉到我命中注定要些点不平凡的事。我总是抗拒这种感觉。我？不平凡？

original: But one day I fell asleep during one of the Confessor's sermons. And I had a dream.
translation: 但是有一天我在听一个信徒说教的时候睡着了。并且我做了一个梦。

original: A dream of the Prophet of Atom. Ablaze with Holy Light! She told me of my destiny. Of my mission. I was called to service, and I answered.
translation: 我梦见了原子的先知。周身燃烧着圣光！她向我昭示了我的命运。以及我的任务。她要我去为人类服务，我便答应了。

original: The only being able to convince me I was wrong, would be the Prophet of Atom herself.
translation: 唯一能说服我错了的人，就只有原子先知她自己了。

original: Me? Well, I figured after all the work we already put into this place, we could help the Brotherhood keep things running smoothly.
translation: 我？这个嘛，我想在为这个地方付出了这么多辛勤与汗水之后，我们可以帮助兄弟会把这里稳定的运作下去。

original: It's worked out pretty well so far, I think. They're not necessarily the friendliest bunch, but I've been doing what I can to get along with them.
translation: 我想，迄今为止这里运行的很好。这群家伙不是那么友好，但我一直在尽最大努力和他们好好相处。

original: What's it look like? I'm doing my work, same as I've always done.
translation: 我在干什么？我在工作，就像往常一样。

original: These Brotherhood "scribes" wouldn't know what to do with half the equipment here if their lives depended on it.
translation: 如果说这些兄弟会的“学士们”要靠这儿的设备生活，而他们对如何操作它根本就是一知半解 。

original: I'm basically running this place from behind the scenes, no matter what Bigsley tells you.
translation: 不管比格斯利是怎么跟你说的，其实是我在背后掌管一切。

original: Oh. Well, she... After what happened to you when the purifier started, I think she just kind of had enough.
translation: 哦。其实，她…在知道了净化器启动时那些发生在你身上的事之后，她有点无法忍受了。

original: It was really hard on her, you know? First losing your dad, and then the Enclave, and then the Brotherhood taking over here.
translation: 这一切对她来说太残酷了，知道吗？先是失去了你爸爸，然后又来了那群英克雷，之后兄弟会又接管了这里。

original: It was really just too much for her. So I guess she packed up a few things and headed off north, towards the Commonwealth.
translation: 这一切对她来说真的有点难以接受。所以我猜她收拾行李往北方走了，去了邦联了。

original: Rumor has it there's a scientific community up there. I sure hope she finds what she's looking for.
translation: 有传言说那里有一个科学团体。我真心希望她能找到她想要的

original: You haven't heard? I guess I shouldn't be surprised.
translation: 你没听说么？我想我不用对此感到惊讶。

original: She basically folded. After the purifier was started, she decided she'd had enough, and headed up north.
translation: 她基本上放弃了。在净化器启动后，她觉得自己受够了，然后去了北方。

original: Said she was looking for the Commonwealth. Like she'd ever make it on her own.
translation: 她说她要去找邦联。就像她自己能成功一样。

original: Tell you what. You run into her, you tell her Daniel sends his regards.
translation: 这样吧。你遇到她，告诉她丹尼尔向她问好。

original: Children of the Light, hear my words and feel Atom's warmth!
translation: 光之子们啊，聆听我的话语，感受原子的温暖吧！

original: For too long, our world has been barren, and our people have become empty.
translation: 长久以来，我们的世界贫瘠荒芜，我们的人民空虚沉沦。

original: Their hearts have become dry and cold, and thirst consumes the weak and the strong alike.
translation: 他们的心变得干凅而冰冷，而饥渴燃尽了一切孱弱或强壮的生灵。

original: But we can save them! For Atom's bounty has granted us the gifts of mercy and compassion!
translation: 但是我们能救他们！因为原子的慷慨授予了我们宽容和怜惜这两样礼物！

original: Oh, my brethren, let us share with them the Waters of Light!
translation: 噢，我的同胞们，让我们与众凡人分享圣光之水吧！

original: Let them be fulfilled by Atom! Let them know his glow and be truly Enlightened!
translation: 让他们因原子而得到满足！让他们知晓原子的荣光并得到真正的指引！

original: And let them live forever, and walk with us in the grace of Atom's Glow, and never be empty again!
translation: 并让他们得到永生，并和我们一道在原子的光辉中前行，而不再任由自己空虚腐化！

original: Oh... Is that truly possible? Yes, that would purge all of Megaton in Atom's Holy Fire. I shall pray for your success!
translation: 噢……真的能行吗？好吧, 那将会让原子的圣火净化整个兆吨镇。我祈祷你能成功！

original: No! No you mustn't! We left Cromwell's church precisely because we DON'T believe in the Great Division.
translation: 不！不！你不可以！我们离开克伦威尔的教堂正是因为我们不信大分裂的那一套。

original: Atom calls us to reach Enlightenment through becoming one with his Glow. We believe in transformation - not destruction.
translation: 原子让我们通过启发来获得它的荣光。我们相信那是改变——不是毁灭。

original: Please, leave the Great Symbol of Atom alone. Let the Confessor preach his misguided message to the heathens. Join us here. Gain enlightenment.
translation: 请不要去动原子的象征。让神父为教徒们布道。加入我们，获得新生。

original: If that's how you want to do this, fine. But be quick about it.
translation: 如果你想这么做，没问题，但动作要快。

original: Great, then get him in there. We don't have time to waste.
translation: 很好，那就把他弄进去，我们没时间浪费了。

original: If that'll work, then great. But we have to do this quickly.
translation: 如果能成功，那就太好了，但我们得快点。

original: If someone finds this... please get this to my lover at the La Maison Beauregard Hotel in East Georgetown... he'll want to hear what I have to say.
translation: 如果有人发现了这个……请把这交给我住在乔治敦东部，拉·迈松·博勒加德酒店的爱人……他会想听我说了什么的。

original: My darling... they've found me. I... I tried to get away... tried to get away so we could be together once again...
translation: 亲爱的……他们找到我了。我……我试着逃走……试着逃走，这样我们就又能在一起……

original: I know you risked your life to get it to me.... combing the ruins, avoiding the Super Mutants... all for me.
translation: 我知道你冒着生命危险为我找到它……搜寻废墟，避开超级变种人……这一切都是为了我。

original: It seems I shall never lay my eyes upon your gift... you... you'll have to keep it and remember me every time you see it.
translation: 看来我永远也见不到你的礼物了……你……你要好好保存它，每次看到它都要记住我。

original: I'm so sorry my darling... so... so... sorry I've let you down. So many have died for this thing... so many hearts have been broken.
translation: 对不起，亲爱的……真的……真的……对不起，让你失望了。太多人为这东西而死……太多人因此心碎。

original: Please remember, I'll always love you... you will be with me forever in my spirit... I... I...l-love... you...
translation: 请记住，我会永远爱你……你会永远在我心里……我……我……我爱……你……

original: Aheh. Um... yeah, look at that. We practically have the same hair cut. What are the chances of that? Aheh.
translation: 呵呵。嗯……好吧，看着。事实上我们剪了同样的发型，这样的可能性有多高？呵呵。

original: Look, this wasn't how it was supposed to go down.
translation: 听着，事情不该是这样的。

original: It was a good idea at the time, y'know? Figured we'd try and set ourselves up down here. Just like Underworld, only better.
translation: 当时这是个好主意，你知道吗？想想我们试着在这里建立起我们自己的地盘，就像冥界那样，而且比那里更好。

original: Who's gonna bother a bunch of ghouls living underneath Old Olney, right? So we get down here, we start knockin' some walls down...
translation: 谁会去惹一大群住在老奥尔尼地下的尸鬼，对吧？所以我们来到这里，开始试着推倒几堵墙……

original: And the next thing you know we're getting our faces chewed off by Deathclaws.
translation: 而接下来的事你也知道了，我们的脸被死亡爪嚼碎了。

original: Heh. We ran faster than the others, that's how.
translation: 呵。我们跑得比别人快，仅此而已。

original: Ain't nothin' honorable about it, but we're still alive and they ain't. I can live with that.
translation: 这并不光彩，但我们还活着，他们却死了。我可以接受的。

original: Listen, this wasn't my fault, okay? It wasn't my idea to tunnel down here, I just went along with it.
translation: 听着，这不是我的错，好吧？在这里挖地道不是我的主意，我只是随大流而已。

original: But whatever. What's done is done. Me and Kidd, we're getting out of here. You came in that way, that means we can get back out.
translation: 但不管怎样。做就是做。我和基德，我们要离开这里。你从那边进来，那就意味着我们可以回去了。

original: See ya later, kid.
translation: 下次再见，小子。

original: Yeah? Well then you're stupid.
translation: 啊？那你就傻了。

original: Where you think they're all comin' from, huh? Goddamn nest down here.
translation: 你认为他们来自哪里，嗯？该死的窝点就在这里。

original: Take it from me, kid. You stay down here, you're gonna die.
translation: 把它从我这里拿走，小子。你呆在这里的话，你会死的。

original: But hey, it's your funeral, right? Me and Kidd, we're getting out of here. Figure the way you came's gotta be pretty clear if you're still alive.
translation: 不过，嗨，这是你的死期，不是吗？我和基德，我们会从你来的路上逃走。你还活着就证明了这条路很安全。

original: Oh yeah, yeah. Sure thing. Just right through here.
translation: 喔，是的，是的。没错。只要穿过这里就到了。

original: Only there's a few Deathclaws down here that might have other ideas. You know what I'm sayin'?
translation: 这里只有一小部分死亡爪有所不同。你明白我说的意思吗？

original: Yeah, nice to see you too. Listen, I'd love to chat but I'm kind of trying to avoid getting killed.
translation: 啊，很高兴见到你。听着，我很乐意聊聊，不过我可不想因此被干掉。

original: This place is crawlin' with Deathclaws, and they're always hungry. You'd do best to turn around and head back.
translation: 这地方到处是死亡爪，而且他们永远都吃不饱。你最好还是回去吧。

original: Hey, uhh... I'm Wint. This is Kidd. We're, well it's kind of a long story.
translation: 嗨，呃…我是温特。这是基德。我们，呃，关于我们的来历，可是个很长的故事。

original: Only thing that matters now is that we're trying to steer clear of the Deathclaws on account of not wantin' to be lunchmeat.
translation: 现在我们唯一要做的是为了不变成他们的午餐，尽量避开死亡爪，。

original: I don't know yet. Some kind of virus that attacks the body on a cellular level. I've never seen anything like it.
translation: 我还不清楚。某种病毒正在消灭身体内的细胞。我从未这种情况。

original: It's strange, because Ghouls are immune to almost any known disease.
translation: 真奇怪，因为尸鬼应该是对所有已知的疾病免疫的。

original: Neither did I. Doctor Barrows is working on it, but it doesn't look good. They're getting worse by the day.
translation: 我也不知道。巴罗斯医生正在研究，但看上去情况不太好。他们的情况正越来越糟。

original: There's something going around, all right, but it isn't anything I've ever seen before. Definitely not contagious.
translation: 确实有某种非正常活动，没错，但我从来没见过。不过肯定不会传染的。

original: Maybe something in the water, but that seems unlikely since I've tested it and this is the cleanest water we've ever had.
translation: 也许问题出在水里，但是水我已经测试过了，再说这是目前为止我们喝过的最干净的水了。

original: Be damned ironic if we were so used to the crap we've been drinking that actual pure water was killing us.
translation: 真他妈的讽刺啊，我们看来是喝惯了脏水以至于喝纯净的水会要了我们的命啊。

original: I have no idea how to help these people and it's really taken the shine off my normally sunny disposition.
translation: 我不知道怎么帮助这些人 而现在的惨景真的让我的内心布满阴霾啊。

original: So unless you have an actual medical problem, maybe you could stop distracting me from my work.
translation: 所以除非你真的有什么病，那么也许你不该在这里妨碍我工作。

original: Oh no... I'm fairly certain it's not contagious. Though, we are burning the bodies of the deceased, just in case...
translation: 噢不……我很肯定它是不传染的。尽管如此，我们还是在焚烧病死者的尸体，只是为了以防万一……

original: I just wish I knew how to treat these people. It's like their immune system is killing them. I don't know what to do about it!
translation: 我真想知道到底该怎么治疗这些人。看上去他们的免疫系统正在杀死他们。我不知道该如何处理这个问题！

original: You bastard! I'll make you PAY for this! You hear me?! PAY!
translation: 你这个混蛋！你会为此付出代价的！你听到了么！你会有报应的！

original: Haha, what? You serious?
translation: 哈哈，什么？你说真的？

original: Okay, you know what? Fine. Go ahead. Way things have been workin' out, if you don't kill me they will.
translation: 好吧，你知道吗？很好，继续走。你会知道的，如果你不杀了我，他们也会。

original: But I am getting out of this place. If that means you're gonna do me in, be my guest.
translation: 但我要离开这地方。如果这表示你要杀了我的话，那就请便。

original: Yeah, well. We're not gonna get a better chance than this, so we're gonna take it.
translation: 是的，好吧。我们从没遇到这么好的机会，我们要把握住。

original: Me and Kidd are getting the hell outta here. If you're not comin', then good luck to you.
translation: 我和基德要离开这鬼地方。如果你不一起，那就祝你好运吧。

original: Help you?
translation: 帮你？

original: You kiddin' me, kid? We couldn't even help ourselves. Been stuck here for who knows how long.
translation: 你开玩笑啊，小子？我们甚至连自己都帮不了。鬼才知道我们要困在这里多久。

original: But hey, you got here in one piece, right? So now's our chance to get the hell outta here.
translation: 不过，嗨，你安全地来到了这里，不是吗？所以这是我们离开这里的机会。

original: You got any brains, you turn right around and go back the way you came. Otherwise, best of luck to ya!
translation: 如果你还有脑子的话，转身离开这里。不然，只有祝你好运了

original: Yes, yes. I received a message from her. It's here somewhere... Well, no matter where it is, I know what it said.
translation: 是的，是的。我收到她的讯息了。应该在这的……嗯，算了，我知道上面说了什么。

original: <Sigh.> The Initiates just finished itemizing a requisition of confiscated Enclave gear. There were a few items that we didn't immediately send out.
translation: <叹气。>新兵们刚刚完成了一份对收缴的英克雷装备的征用清单。有几样东西没有立即送出去。

original: I suppose you are welcome to those...
translation: 我觉得你会喜欢……

original: The Brotherhood thanks you for your efforts. Now if you don't mind? I think I'll just take a brief nap here at my desk...
translation: 兄弟会感谢你付出的努力。现在如果你不介意的话……我想我能在这儿打个盹……

original: <Sigh.> The Initiates just finished itemizing a requisition of confiscated Enclave gear. There were a few items that we didn't immediately send out.
translation: <叹气。>新兵们刚刚完成了一份对收缴的英克雷装备的征用清单。有几样东西没有立即送出去。

original: I suppose you're welcome to those...
translation: 我觉得你会喜欢……

original: The Brotherhood thanks you for your efforts. Now if you don't mind? I think I'll just take a brief nap here at my desk...
translation: 兄弟会感谢你付出的努力。现在如果你不介意的话……我想我能在这儿打个盹……

original: Heard about that. News traveled fast. I couldn't believe it. I mean, everyone knew it was crazy building a city around that bomb...
translation: 这事传的很快，我听说了。不过我不敢相信。我是说，是人都知道围着炸弹建房子肯定是脑子进水了……

original: But I don't think anyone expected the bomb to actually go off...
translation: 但我觉得没人会相信那炸弹能真正安全……

original: I didn't expect things to end like this... but it did get Lyons off my back about it, so here. Might as well take the money I was going to give you.
translation: 我没料到这事会这样如此结束……但这确实让里昂斯不再为这件事烦我了。给你。不如把我要给你的钱拿走吧。

original: A cult? There's something about Megaton, isn't there. It's apparently THE place to start a cult these days.
translation: 邪教？兆吨镇果然有古怪，不是么。显然那就是这些天开始冒邪教的地方。

original: Guess I can start sending them water again. Hopefully they can keep their grubby hands on their shipments this time.
translation: 看来我又能给他们送水了。希望这次他们的脏手不要来碰这些货物。

original: Here. It's not much. Most of the assets have been exhausted, but take this. It's definitely worth getting Lyons off my back. Thanks.
translation: 给。不算很多。大部分资产已经耗尽，但收下这个。让里昂斯不再烦我，这很值得。谢谢。
